availability.p: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 license.

witness.label: ka
witness.desc: The first edition of the Pampabhārata, published in 1898.
1898neya isaviyalli maisūru sarakāradinda prakaṭavāda pampabhāratada accina prati.

witness.label: kha
witness.desc: A palm-leaf manuscript in the Mysore Royal palace.
maisūru aramaneya sarasvatī bhaṇḍārada tāḷeyōleya prati.

witness.label: ga
witness.desc: A palm-leaf manuscript at the Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute.
īga pūnā bhaṇḍārkar ōriyaṇṭal risar insṭiṭyūṭnalliruva tāḷeyōḷeya prati.

witness.label: gha
witness.desc: A palm-leaf manuscript at the Central Jain Oriental Library in Arrah.
ārā seṇṭral jainā ōriyaṇṭal laibreri yallina tāḷeyōḷeya prati.

witness.label: gha1
witness.desc: Readings between haṁsapādas in the Arrah manuscript.
āra pratiyalli haṁsapāda hāki koṭṭiruva pāṭha.

witness.label: sa
witness.desc: A reading that appears in all (sa = sarva) of the witnesses.
mēle hēḷiruva sarva pustakagaḷalliyū doreyuva pāṭha.

witness.label: pa
witness.desc: The reading of the Karṇāṭak Sāhitya Pariṣat.

div.head:
prathamāśvāsaṁ
sūcane — (1) ga. pratiyalli modalaneya āśvāsavu doreyuvudilla.(2) gha. pratiyalli modalaneya patrada bala bhāgavu nālkaṅguladaṣṭu hōgiruvudarinda modalina 18 padyagaḷalli kelavakke adara pāṭhavu doreyuvudilla.

lg.l: jjaḷa jasamaṅga saṅgata lasadbhasitaṁ prabhuśakti śakti ni
koṇḍu nirantaraṁ taguḷdu kīrtise mikkeseva pracaṇḍamā
sahajada celvinoḷ ratiya sōlada kēḷiyoḷ podaḻdu sa
rvisuvinamokku nēlva karuḷōḷiye bāḷa mr̥ṇāḷamāge mi
puguvudu pokka mārgadoḷe taḷvudu taḷtoḍe kāvyabandhamo
ppugumeḷamāvu kendaḷira pūvina biṇpoṟeyiṁ baḻaldu tuṁ
nyāsamanēka lakṣaṇa guṇa prabhavaṁ mr̥du pādamāda vā
kate piridādoḍaṁ kateyameygiḍalīyade muṁ samasta bhā
kateyoḷoḍambaḍaṁ paḍeye pēḻvoḍe pampane pēḻgumendu paṁ
lalitapadaṁ prasanna kavitāguṇamillade pūṇdu pēḻda be
ḷgaḷa kr̥tibandhamuṁ barepahakāṟara kaigaḷa kēḍu nuṇṇana
ppaḷakada kēḍu pēḻisidoḍarthadadanarthada kēḍene pēḻdu bīgi po

ṭṭaḷisi negaḻtegāṭisuva duṣkaviyuṁ kaviyemba lekkamē
12neya padyavāda mēle, gha. pratiyalli mātra munde hēḷuva padyavannu koṭṭide ; patravu hariduhōgiruvudarinda padyavu samagravāgilla —
byāsamunīndranīśvarana pēḻdupadēśadoḷondu dibya kai
ḷāsadoḷirdu ti ......................................
............................ śiṣyaneyde janamējayanemba nr̥paṅge pēḻdiḷā
śāsanamāge māḍidudanintitihāsakathāprabandhamaṁ
vipuḷa yaśō vitāna guṇamilladanaṁ prabhu māḍi pūrva bhū
mipara padaṅgaḷaṁ pugisi pōlipoḍītapōldesedītapōliparīnudātta pūrva bhū
rdavārya vīryaṅgerdavirala vīraṅgerdurutara vīraṅge baddegaṁ piriya magaṁ
vanadhi parīta bhūtaḷadoḷītane sōlada gaṇḍanemba peṁ

ī padyavannū gha. pratiyalli haṁsapāda hāki sēriside —
surabhi dēvaniyemba gōsane māḻpudēṟuvudondadaṁ
harige mannisu dēva vāraṇamēḻeyuṇṭavu pōdoḍā
kharakaraṅgaridendu māṇise māṇdavāhavadalli pē
ḻariyavāduvo bhadradēvana cāgadoḷveṟagāduvō
surabhi dēvateyemba kāpinetāpanetāpine māṇdudēṟuvudondadeṁ
dirade māṇdudude dēva vāraṇavēḻe uṇṭagoṇḍavu pōdoḍā
nātmajanābhavaṁ nahuṣa pr̥thu bhagīratha naḷa mā

raṅkuśamenisidudu munisu bhadrāṅkuśanānaṁ
ī padyavu ka. kha. pratigaḷalli munde hēḷuvantide —
mantarisaṟivu guru vaca
dantuṭu samapāḻiyeḍege poṇardire calamaṁ
tintoḷe mārppoḍe guṇamō
rante nisarggame subhadra munipuṅgavanā
ḷtiṟidēṟaṁ pēḻe kēḷdudeṟapantave kēḷdu pēḻdu maṇḍalaminnuṁ
hīndra radārinnarī narēndraṁ sākṣāroḷēnī narēndra cakraṁ nayadoḷroḷēnī narēndra cakrado
toḍagi calaṁ negaḻe ripu balaṅgaḷane paḍa
sōlavu kaṇ para balābdhigaṁ para vadhugaṁ
kramadoḷ svasti samadhigata pañca mahāmāmaha śa
cāgada kambamaṁ niṟisi bīrada śāsanamaṁ negaḻci kō
ene sanduṁ vīra vairi kṣitipa gaja ghaṭāṭōpa kumbhasthaḷī bhē

p.s:
gha. pratiyalli idannu ‘pr̥thvi’ endu baredide. vr̥ttavu hīgirabahudu—
adantene samunmiṣa dvividha ratnamālā prabhā
bhidāruṇa jalaplavāviḷa viḷōḷa vīcī raya
pradāṭhita kuḷācalōdadhi parītavāgirda jaṁ
budīviyōḷaguṇṭu nāḍu kurujāṅgaṇaṁ nāmadiṁ
andentene – samunmiṣamunnatamunviśadvividhadīpyadvividha ratnamālā prabhābhīlābhēdāruṇa
jalaplavāvaviḷa viḷōḷavīcīrayavēḷā payaḥ pradārita kuḷācalōdadhi parītamāgirda
jambūdvīpadoḷaguṇṭu nāḍu kurujāṅgaṇa nāmadiṁ antā kurujāṅgaṇa viṣayadoḷ—

lg.l: dila posavū podaḻda posa naidila kampane bīṟe kāyta keṁ
goleyoḷe jōlva śāḷinavavana śāḷige pāyva śukāḷi tōṟe ke
yvolagaḷinoppināva nāḍu sarimā tōṟiṟe siri nōḍugumā viṣayāntarāḷadoḷ

53-54neya padyagaḷannu bēre bēreyāgi koṭṭiruvudu gha. pratiyalli mātra. mikka pratigaḷalli 53neya padyada pūrvārdhavannū 54neyadara uttarārdhavannū sērisi koṭṭide. avugaḷalli 54neya padyada mūraneya pādada modalalliruva ‘beḷevudu’ embudakke badalāgi ‘vaḷigaḷe’ endide.beḷedeṟagirda keyvolane keyvolanaṁ baḷasirda pūta pū
laḷita vicitra patra phala puṣpayutāṭavi sorkidāneyaṁ
beḷevudu dēvadeyva mātr̥kamenippa polaṁ nava gandha śāḷiyaṁ
beḷevudu ramya nandanavanāḷi viyōgi janakke bēṭamaṁ

p.s:
antu sogayisuva kurujāṅgaṇa viṣayakke rājadrājadhāniyāgirdurda
hara jaṭājūṭakke candralēkheyirpantetirda dikkarikaṭa taṭakkekaraṭa talakke madalēkheyirpanteyante
kaiṭabhārātiya viśālōrasthaḷakke kaustubhamirpante sogayisutirdudu hastinanāpura
vembudu poḻalalli—

lg.l: adaṟa poṟavoḻala viśāḷa kanaka kr̥taka girigaḷiṁ phaḷaprakīrṇaprasūnakīrṇa tarugaḷiṁ
naneya koneya taḷira muguḷa vanalatānikuñjadiṁlatāḷi kuñjalatāḷi puñja prasūna rajada puñjadiṁ
gaganataḷame paṟidu biḻdudenipa bahu taṭākadiṁ kukilva naliva kōkadiṁ
suriva surayiyarala muguḷge mogasidaḷikuḷaṅgaḷiṁ todalvatodaḷvaśiśu śukaṅgaḷiṁ
tegeye bīra ravadaḍa mēletegeyadabdha samitivōle pariva madagajagaḷiṁ caḷatturaṅga maṅgaḷiṁ
lavaṇa jaḷadhi baḷasidante baḷasidagaḻa nīḷadindudagrakanaka śāḷadiṁdurga śaiḷadiṁ
doḷage kula nagaṅgaḷenipa dēvakulada bhōgadiṁ sarāgamāda rāgadiṁ
dhanada bhavanamenipa siriya baccarāpaṇaṅgaḷiṁṟāṭaṇaṁ podaḻda kāvaṇakēvikaṅgaḷiṁ
viṭajanakke toḍarva cāriyenipa sūḷegēriyiṁ vidagdha hr̥daya hāriyiṁ
kanaka gōpuraṅgaḷoḷagaṇeraḍu deseya guṇaṇegaṇaneyiṁ viḷāsiniyara gaḍaṇeyiṁ
kanakaśailamenisi negaḻda bhūmipāla bhavanadiṁ samasta vastu bhuvanadiṁ

p.s:
antu mūṟu lōkada celvellamaṁ vidhātranondeḍege teraḷcidante samasta
vastu vistāra hāramāgirda hastinapurave nijavaṁśāvaḷambamāge negaḻda
bharatakulatilakara vaṁśāvatāramentādudendoḍe—

antu hiraṇyagarbha brahma manassambhavadoḷ puṭṭidaṟuvarmakkaḷoḷage
marīciya magaṁ kaśyapananēka bhuvanōtpatti nāṭakakke sūtradhāranādanātana
maganavāryavīryaṁ sūryanātanindavyavacchinnamāgi banda vaṁśaṁ
sūryavaṁśamembudāytu—

avaroḷage dēvāpi nava yauvana prārambhadoḷe tapaścaraṇa parāyaṇanādaṁ
pratimanuṁdanapratimanuṁ pratāpa prasara prakaṭapaṭuvāgi palavu kālamarasugeydu saṁsārārasāratege
pēsi tapōvanakkabhimukhanāgalbagedu—

antu bhuvanakkellamāyamumaḷavumaṟimaṇmuṁ puṭṭuvante puṭṭi
navayauvanaṁ neṟeya neṟeye—

lg.l: hālambaṁ bhuja vīśaurya vikramayutaṁ gaṅgātmajanmaṁ jayagāṅgēyanirdante bhū

p.s:
antu kaltu munname cāpavidyeyoḷārindamītanedaṁ tāne bhārgavanenisida
bhārgavaṅge tāne bhārgavanāgi yuvarājakaṇṭhikā parikalita kaṇṭhaluṇṭhanumāgi
pramāṇa nija bhuja daṇḍadaṇḍitārāti maṇḍalanumāgi gāṅgēyaṁ
sukhadoḷarasugeyyuttirpannegamitta gaṅgādēśadoḷuparicaravasuvembarasaṁ puṭṭida
girijeyemba kanneyanātaṁ kaṇḍu kaṇbēṭaṅgoṇḍu maduveyaṁ nindondu divasa
mindranōlagakke pōgi r̥tukālaprāpteyāgirda nallaḷallige baral paḍeya
dākeyaṁ nenedindriya kṣaraṇeyādoḍadanondu kadaḷīpatradoḷ pudidu tanna
naḍapida giḷiya kaiyoḷōpaḷalligaṭṭidoḍadaṁ tarparagiḷiya nondu
giḍuganeḍegoṇḍu jaguneyaṁ pāyvāgaḷugibagi māḍidāgaḷadaṟa kaiyiṁ barduṅki
toṟeyoḷage biḻdoḍadanondu bāḷemīnnuṅgi garbhamaṁ tāḷdidoḍondu
divasamā mīnanorva jālagāṟaṁ jāladoḷ piḍidalligarasappa dāśanalliguydu
tōṟidoḍadaṁ vidārisi nōḻpannegaṁ bāḷeya garbhadoḷirda bāḷeyaṁ bāḷanumaṁ
kaṇḍettikoṇḍu matsyagandhiyuṁ matsyagandhanumendu pesaraniṭṭu naḍapi
yamunānadītīradoḷirpannegamalligorme brahmara mommanappa vr̥dda
parāśara munīndranuttarāpathakke pōguttuṁ bandu toṟeya taḍiyoḷōḍamaṁ
naḍeyisuva matsyagandhiyaṁ kaṇḍemmanī toṟeyaṁ pāyisembuduṁ sāsirvarēṟi
doḍalladīyōḍaṁ naḍeyadembudamāmanibara biṇpumappemēṟisendoḍante
geyvenendōḍamēṟisi naḍeyisuvalli divya kanneyanaḻkartu nōḍi—

antu nīlāmbuda śyāmanuṁ kanakapiṅgaḷa jaṭābandhakaḷāpanuṁ daṇḍa
kapāḷakaḷāpakaḷāhastanuṁ kr̥ṣṇa mr̥gatyakparidhānacarma pidhānatparidāmanumāgi vyāsabhaṭṭārakaṁ puṭṭuvudu
mātananoḍagoṇḍu satyavatige punaḥ kanyābhāvamaṁ dayegeydu parāśaraṁ
pōdanittal—

lg.l: mr̥gayā vyājadinorme śantanu toḻaltarpaṁ paḷañcalke talvinaṁcalvetaṁ
nmr̥mr̥gaśābākṣiya kampu taṭṭi madhupambōl sōltu kaṇmanaṁsōltu kaṁḍoldu naḍoleduṁḍoge
lmege dibyambiḍidibhyambiḍinalumige dibhyambiḍivantevōl piḍidu nīn bā pōpamendaṅge me
llage tatkanyake nāṇci bēḍuvoḍe nīvemmayyanaṁ bēḍirē

p.s:
embuduṁ śantanu poḻalge maguḻdu vandavarayyanappa dāśarājanallige
kūsaṁ bēḍa pergaḍegaḷanaṭṭidoḍe gāṅgēyaṁ doreya piriya maganuṁ
kramakramārhanumirdantenna magaḷaṁ kuḍevemmakuḍuvoḍemma magaḷge puṭṭidātaṁ rājya
kkoḍeyanuṁ piriya maganuṁ kramakkarhanumappoḍe kuḍuvemene tadvr̥ttāntamaṁ
mantrigaḷiṁ śantanu kēḷdu—

lg.l: kramamaṁ vikramadinde tāḷduva magaṁ gāṅgēyanirdante nō
ḍa maruḷ śantanu tannadondu savigaṁ sōlakkamittaṁ nija

p.s:
endu tanna nāṇgāṇipane bagedatanu paritāpitaśarīranumāgi śantanu
karaṅgerdegiḍe tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ gāṅgēyanaṟidu—

lg.l: tpanna vimōhadindaḻidapaṁ pati sattoḍe satta pāpame

p.s:
endu niścayisi gāṅgēyaṁ dāśarājanallige vandātana manada toḍarpaṁ
piṅge nuḍidu—

lg.l: kūḍidanuydu satyavatiyaṁ satiyaṁ patiyoḷnija bhūpatiyoḷ nadīsutaṁ

p.s:
antu śantanuvuṁ satyavatiyumanyonyāsaktacittarāginya cittarāgi kelavu kālamirpanne
gamavara bēṭada kandalgakavalgaḷante citrāṅgada vicitravīryaremba makkaḷ puṭṭi mahā
pracaṇḍaruṁ pratāpigaḷumāgi baḷeyuttirpannegaṁ śantanu paralōka prāptanādoḍe
gāṅgēyaṁ taducita paralōka kriyegaḷaṁ māḍi munne tanna nuḍida nuḍivaḷiyemba
prāsādakkadhiṣṭhānaṅgaṭṭuvante citrāṅgadaṅge paṭṭamaṁ kaṭṭi rājyaṁ geyisuttu
mirpageyvutippannegamorva gandharvanoḷe citrāṅgadaṁ dvandvayuddhamaṁ poṇarci
kurukṣētramaṁ kaḷambēḻdu kādi sattoḍe vicitravīryanaṁ gāṅgēyaṁ
dharābhāradhurandharanaṁ māḍi—

lg.l: sakaḷa kṣatriya mōhadiṁ nijabhuja prārambhadiṁ pōgi tā
gine kelar‌ nondoḍe kādi rājasutaroḷkāśi rājapuradoḷkādirāja puradoḷ tannaṅkadondugrasā
bikeyambāleyaremba bāleya ranēṁrumaṁ bhīṣmaṁ yaśō bhāgiyōgadoḷ

p.s:
antu tandu tanna tammaṁ vicitravīryaṅgā mūvarkanneyaraṁ
pāṇigrahaṇaṅge yvāgaḷellariṁ piriyāke ninnanallade peṟaranollenendirdoḍe
mattinirvarumaṁ maduveyaṁ māḍi gāṅgēyanambeyanintendaṁ—

endu nuḍida gāṅgēyana nuḍiyoḷavasaramaṁ pasaramaṁ paḍeyade tanage
kiṟiyanduṅguraviṭṭa sālvalanesālvanembarasanallige pōgi nīnennaṁ kaikoḷa
vēḻkumendoḍātanintendaṁ—

endu sālvalaṁ tanna paribhavadoḷāda siggaṁ sālvinamuṇṭu
māḍidoḍātana manamanoḍambaḍisalāṟade paraśurāmanallige pōgi bhīṣmanenna
svayaṁvaradoḷ neredarasumakkaḷellarumanōḍisikoṇḍu bandennaṁmaduveyaṁ
nilalollanilladoḍenna devasadadoṭṭi kaḷedoḍenna devasamuṁ javvanamumaḍaviyoḷage pūta pūvinante
kiḍalīyadātananennaṁ pāṇigrahaṇaṁ geyvantu māḍu māḍalāṟadoḍe kiccaṁ
dayegeyvudendambe kaṇṇanīraṁ tumbe—

lg.l: rṇayamaṁ naccuvoḍennanugra raṇadoḷ mēṇ mīṟi mārkoṇḍanā
raye kajjaṁ peṟatilla śantanu sutaṅgennaṁ karaṁ nambidaṁ

p.s:
endu nāgapurakke varpa paraśurāmana baravaṁ gāṅgēyaṁ kēḷdirvandu
kanaka rajata pātraṅgaḷoḷarghyamaṁ koṭṭu poḍamaṭṭu—

lg.l: pasurvandar paseyembivaṁ samedu nīṁ kaikoḷ koḷalkāgadeṁ

p.s:
endu nuḍida paraśurāmana nuḍiyaṁ gāṅgēyaṁ kēḷdenage vīraśrīyuṁ
kīrtiśrīyumalladuḻida peṇḍir moṟeyalli nīvida nēkekāgrahaṁ geyvireṁ
doḍentumemmoḷ kādalvēḻvudendu—

antu gāṅgēyanoḷ paraśurāmaṁ kādi basavaḻidusiralappoḍamāṟade
mūrchevōgirdanaṁ kaṇḍambeyemba daduṇḍurumbe ninage vadhārthamāgigavadārteyenāgi puṭṭuve
nakkendu kōpāgniśōkāgnisōlāgniyindamagniśarīreyāgi drupadana mahādēvige maganāgi puṭṭi
kāraṇāntaradoḷ śikhaṇḍiyāgirdaḷitta bhīṣmara bembaladoḷ vicitravīryanu
mavāryavīryanumāgi kelavu kālaṁ rājyalakṣiyaṁ tāḷdi rājayakṣmajyalakṣmi taptaśarīranātmaja vigatajīviyāgi paralōka prāptanādoḍe gāṅgēyanuṁ
satyavatiyumatyanta śōkānala dahyamāna mānasarkaḷāgi ātaṅge paralōkakriyegaḷaṁ
māḍi rājyaṁ naṣṭarājajyamādudarke mammalamalumala maṟugi yōjanagandhi
sindhuputrananintendaḷ—

lg.l: maganembantu dharitri ninnanujaraṁ kaikoṇḍu muṁ pūṇda na
mugilaṁ muṭṭidudalte namma kuladoḷ makkaḷpeṟar nīnē ja

p.s:
endu ninnanāninitaṁ kaiyoḍḍi bēḍidenenda satyavatigamarāpagā
nandananintendaṁ—
endu tanna nuḍida pratijñeyanēgeyduṁ tappidanilla—

antacalita pratijñārūḍhanāda gāṅgēyananēgeydumoḍambaḍisalāṟade
satyavati tānumātanumāḷōcisi niścita mantrarāgi kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyananaṁ nenedu
barisidoḍe vyāsamunīndranēgeyvudēnaṁ tīrcuvudendoḍe satyavatiyintendaḷ
hiraṇyagarbha brahmariṁ taguḷdavyavacchinnamāgi banda sōmavaṁśamīgaḷemma
kulasantatiga mārumilladeḍe vaṟiḷilladoḍe aḻiḷilladaḍevaridu kiḍuvantāgirdudadu kāraṇadiṁ nimma tammaṁ
vicitravīryana kṣētradoḷambikegamambālegaṁ putrarappantu varaprasādamaṁ
dayegeyvudene antegeyvenendu—

lg.l: tridaśa narāsurōraga gaṇa prabhu niścita tattvayōgi yō
gada balamuṇmi poṇmi nile putra varārthigaḷāgi tanna ka
ṭṭidiroḷe nindaraṁ nayade nōḍe munīndrana divya dr̥ṣṭi maṁ
tradoḷe podaḻdudā satiyarirvaroḷaṁ nava garbha vibhramaṁ

p.s:
antu divya saṁyōgadoḷirvaruṁ garbhamaṁ tāḷdar mattorva maganaṁ
varamaṁ bēḍendambikege pēḻdoḍākeyuṁ vyāsabhaṭṭārakanallige pōgalalasi tanna
sūḻāyteyaṁsūḷeyaṁ tannavole kaygeydu baravaṁ bēḍalaṭṭidoḍākege varadanāgi
vyāsamunīndraṁ satyavatigaṁ bhīṣmaṅgamintendanenna vara prasāda kāladoḷennaṁ
kaṇḍambike kaṇṇaṁ muccidaḷappudaṟindākege dhr̥tarāṣṭranemba maganatyanta
sundarāṅganāgiyuṁ jātyandha
ī nakṣatra cihnegaḷa madhye iruva bhāgavu ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.nakkumambāle madrūpamaṁ kaṇḍu mogamaṁ
pāṇḍuraṁ māḍidaḷappudaṟindākege pāṇḍurōga saṅgatanumanēka bhadra lakṣaṇa
lakṣitanumatyanta pratāpanumāgi pāṇḍurājanemba maganakku
ī gurutugaḷa madhye iruva bhāgavu gha. pāṭhadalli mātra ide ; ka. pāṭhadalli “likeyennaṁ kaṇḍu mukhaṁ pāṇḍuvarṇamāda kāraṇadiṁ pāṇḍurājanemba kumāranakku” endu mātravide ; kha. pratiyallū sumāru hīgeyē ide.mambikeya
sūḻāyteyappāke darahasita vadanāravindeyāgi baravaṁ kaikoṇḍaḷappudaṟindākeya
magaṁ viduranembananaṅgākāranumācāravantanuṁ buddhivantanumakkumendu pēḻdu
munipuṅgavaṁ pōdanittaṁ—

lg.l: ttaraṁ baḷeva māḻkeyiṁ baḷeva garbhamaṁ tāḷdiyā
daraṁ berasu pettarandu dhr̥tarāṣṭra vikhyāta pāṁ

p.s:
antavarge jātakarma nāmakaraṇānnaprāśana caulōpanayanādi ṣōḍaśa
kriyegaḷaṁ gāṅgēyaṁ tāṁ muntiṭṭu māḍi śastra śāstraṅgaḷoḷati pariṇataraṁ
māḍi maduveyaṁ māḍalendu dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅge gāndhārarāja saubalana
magaḷappa gāndhāriyaṁ śakuniyoḍavuṭṭidaḷaṁ tandukoṭṭu—

antu koṭṭaydu mantrākṣaraṅgaḷanāhvānaṅgeydu ninna bagege banda
pōlveya makkaḷaṁ paḍeveyendu besasidoḍondu divasaṁ konti—

antu nabhōbhāgadiṁ bhūmibhāgakkiḻidu tanna munde nindaravinda
bāndhavanaṁ nōḍi nōḍi—

āgaḷādityanākeya manada śaṅkeyamaṁ naḍuguva meyya naḍukamumaṁ
kiḍenuḍidintendaṁ—

antu naḍanaḍa naḍugi jaladēvategaḷappoḍaṁ manaṅgāṇbarendu nidhāna
manīḍāḍuvante kūsaṁ gaṅgeyoḷīḍāḍi bandaḷitta gaṅgādēviyumā kūsaṁ
muḻugalīyade tanna teregaḷemba naḷitōḷgaḷinoyyanoyyane taḻkaisi tare
gaṅgātīradoḷirpa sūtanembavaṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: bāḷa dinēśa bimbada neḻal jaladoḷ nelasittode neḻalgeṇeyāgire biḷdudō mēṇ phaṇīṁ

p.s:
antu kaṇḍu manaṅgoṇḍettikoṇḍu manege tandu rādheyemba tanna nallaḷa
sōṅkiloḷ kūsaniṭṭoḍāke rāgisi sutana sūtakamaṅkoṇḍāḍeḍi—
āgiyātaṁ śastraśāstra vidyeyoḷati pariṇatanāgi navayauvanārambhadoḷ—

lg.l: poḍedudu billa jēvoḍeye mīṟuva vairi narēndraraṁ siḍi
kaḍikaḍidittaponne budhamāgadhavandi janakke koṭṭa kōviprajanakkene kōḍi kōḍino
ḍeḷpaḷeḍararade bēḍi resp="#ed">mōnōḍimidudu cāgada bīrada mātu karṇanā

p.s:
antu bhuvana bhavanakkellaṁ negaḻda karṇana pogaḻteyaṁ negaḻteyumanindraṁ
kēḷdu munde tannaṁśadoḷ puṭṭuvarjunaṅgamātaṅgaṁ dvandva yuddhamuṇṭembudaṁ
tanna divya jñānadindamaṟiduvintalladītananātaṁ gelal bāradendu—

antu tanna sahaja kavacamaṁ nettar pana pana pariye tidiyugivantugidu
koṭṭoḍindranātana kalitanake mecci—

antindranitta śaktiyaṁ kaikoṇḍu nijabhujaśaktiyaṁ prakaṭaṁ māḍalendu
rēṇukānandananallige pōgi—

lg.l: ḷā rāmananugra paraśu pāṭita ripu vaṁ

p.s:
antu dhanurdharāgragaṇyanāgirdondu divasaṁ tanna toḍeya mēle
taleyaniṭṭu paraśurāmaṁ maṟedoṟagidā prastāvadoḷā munige munisaṁ
māḍalendindranupāyadoḷaṭṭida vajrakīṭaṅgaḷ karṇaneraḍuṁ toḍeyumanuḷiya
nūṟi koḍantiyoḷ beṭṭidantattamittamurci pōgeyumadanaṟiyadante guruge
nidrābhighātamakkumendu taleyanugurusuttu mireyire—

anteḻcattu nettara ponaloḷ nāndu naneda maiyyumaṁ toydu taḷpoyda
jaḍeyumaṁ kaṇḍī dhairyaṁ kṣatriyaṅgalladāgadu pārvanendennoḷ pusidu
viddeyaṁ kaikoṇḍukoṇḍudakedarke daṇḍaṁ peṟatilla ninagānitta brahmāstramemba divyāstra
mavasāna kāladoḷ besakeyyadirkendu śāpavanittanantu karṇanuṁ śāpahatanāgi
maguraḻdu bandu sūtana maneyoḷirpannegamittal kuntigavaraḷamāvanappatandeyappa kuntibhōjanuṁ svayambaraṁ māḍe—

lg.l: sogayipa tamma javvanada tamma vibhūtiya tamma tamma ce
ṣṭigevare pāṇḍurājanane kunti manambuge māle sūḍidaḷ

p.s:
antu svayambaradoḷ neṟedarasumakkaḷoḷappukeyda kuntiyoḍane
madrarājana magaḷ śalyanoḍavuṭṭida mādriyumanonde paseyoḷirisi gāṅgēyaṁ
vidhātraṁ muṇḍāḍuvante tāṁ maduveyaṁ māḍi—

lg.l: baḷasida vēda pāragaṭhakara sandaṇiyembivaṟiṁ vivāha maṁ
tuṟugeme nīḷda purvu niḍugaṇ poṟeyallade baṭṭitappa bā
ydeṟetanugele rēkhegoṇḍa koraloḍḍida parmole teḷvasiṟ karaṁ
kiṟudoḍeyendu dhātri pogaḻguṁ pogaḻvannare kunti mādrigaḷ

p.s:
antākegaḷirvarumeraḍuṁ keladoḷire kalpalategaḷeraḍaṟa naḍuvaṇa
kalpavr̥kṣamirpantirda pāṇḍurājaṅge dhr̥tarāṣṭranaṅgahīnanendu vivāhadosageyoḍane
paṭṭabandhadosageyaṁ māḍi nelananāḷisesi—

lg.l: ypāṟeṟi nabhakke pāṟidudu gaṇḍara nettiyoḷotti bāḷarani

p.s:
antu pāṇḍurājanadhika tējanumavanata vairi bhūbhr̥tsamārōjanumāgi
negaḻuttilcutirdondu divasaṁ tōpina bēṇṭeyanāḍalaḻtiyiṁ pōgi—

lg.l: pinenna nereyalke divyamuniyuṁ mr̥gayormmigamāgi maraldu kūḍe me
llane mr̥gamendu sāpārdu neṟanaṁ naḍe nōḍi narēndraneccu bhōṁ
kane mr̥gacāriyaṁ tanage māṇade tandanadondu māriyaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ praḷayaduḷkamuḷkuvante tanneccambu munikumārana kaṇṇoḷa
merdeyoḷa mukke pēḻimennanāvaneccanemba muniya munida saramaṁ kēḷdu
billanambumanīḍāḍi tanna munde nindirda bhūpanaṁ muni nōḍi—

lg.l: ginnene raudra śāpa paritāpa viḷāpadoḷā mahīśvaraṁ

p.s: enna geyda kāmākrāntakkekāmātrakilki kāma kr̥tamēṁ piridaltu—

endu cintisuttuṁ poḻalge maguḻduvandu gāṅgēya dhr̥tarāṣṭravidurarkaḷge
tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ pēḻdu samasta vastugaḷaṁ dīnānāthana rāda janaṅgaḷge sūṟegoṭṭu
nija parivāramaṁ barisi—

lg.l: rvāra parākramaṁ taḷare bārisi vārisi kunti mādriyar

p.s: benna bennane bare binna binnane pōgi—

lg.l: tuṅga vanya mataṅgaja dantāghāta nipātita sallakī
bhaṅgamaṁ maṇimauktika nīḷa sthūḷa śilā pravibhāsitō
ttuṅgamaṁ muni mukhya mukhāmbhōjōdara nirgatamantra pū

p.s:
ā parvatada vipuḷa vanōpakaṇṭhaṅgaḷoḷ tāpasakanyenneyar naḍapideḷalate
gaḷoḷeṟagi tuṟugi sāmavēda dhvaniyoḷ moreva tumbigaḷumaṁ paṇteṟagida
tadāśramada tarugaḷa mēgirdu pugil pugilenditta bannimirimemba pombaṇṇada
kōgilegaḷumaṁ munikumārapuṅgavarōduva vēdavēdāṅgantaṅgaḷaṁ tappuviḍidu jaḍidu
baggisuva padumarāgada baṇṇadaragiḷigaḷumaṁ surabhigaḷa toreda molegaḷanuṇbavaṟanumbanava
maṟigaḷaṁ pōge nūṅki kūṅki molegaḷanuṇba kiśōra kēsarigaḷumaṁ tammoḍane
nalidāḍuva kiśōrakēsarigaḷaṁ piḍidu tegeva karikaḷabhaṅgaḷumanāgaḷāpaḷuvaṅgaḷinde
pāyva puligaḷa maṟigaḷoḷ paridāḍuva taruṇa hariṇaṅgaḷumaṁ mattaṁ mutta
kuruḍatavasitapasvigaḷa kaiyaṁ piḍiduydavarayduvana guhegaḷaṁ pugipa poṟamaḍipa capaḷa
kapigaḷumaṁ hōmāgniyaneṟaṅkeya gāḷiyiṁ nandalīyaduripuva rājahaṁse
gaḷumaṁ munigaṇēśvararoḍanegaṇēśvararoḍanedāḷivūdhāḻiḍute pūgoyvoḍane varpa gōḷāṅgūḷaṅgaḷumaṁ
nōḍi tapōvanada tapōdhanara tapaḥprabhāvakke cōdyambaṭṭu—

endu meccuttumenage nelasiralī tapōvaname pāvanamendu tapōvanada
munijanada paramānurāgamaṁ percisimeccisi kāmānurāgamaṁ bercisi
ī bhāgavu ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.
tadāśramadoḷāśramakke guruvāgi pāṇḍurājanirpannegamitta dhr̥tarāṣṭrana
mahādēviyappa gāndhāri nūrvarmakkaḷaṁ paḍevantu parāśara munīndranoḷ
barambaḍedaḷembudaṁ kunti kēḷdu tānuṁ putrārthiniyāgal bagedu—

lg.l: pasarisaluṁ karaṁ neṟeva makkaḷanīyade nōḍe nāḍe nō
yisidapudikṣu puṣpadavolennaya niṣphala puṣpadarśanaṁcāpadoḷemunname nīṁ paḍeyēṁ taḷōdarī

p.s:
ī vacanavu gha. pratiyalli mātra ide.endu cintākrānteyāgirda kuntiyaṁ kaṇḍu pāṇḍurājanēkānta
doḷintendaṁ—

lg.l: ī padyavu gha. pratiyalli mātra ide.cinteyidēno santatige makkaḷe neṭṭane bārteyappoḍi
tyanta pativratā guṇadinarcisi meccisu nīṁ diganta vi
śrānta yaśarkaḷaṁ vara tanūbhavaraṁ paḍe nīṁ taḷōdari

p.s:
endoḍe kontiyintendaḷenna kannikeyā kāladoḷ nānenna māvaṁ
kontibhōjana maneyoḷ baḷevandu durvāsa mahāmuniyaremma manege niccakkaṁ
barparavarenna vinayakkaṁ bhaktigaṁ besakeyvugeydukeydudarkaṁ mecci mantrākṣaraṅgaḷanaydu
varavittarīyaydu mantrakayvarmakkaḷaṁ ninna bagege bandavara nāhvānaṁ geyyalavara
ī bhāgavu ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.
pōlvedolmeya makkaḷaṁ paḍeveyendu besasidoḍīgaḷenna puṇyadiṁ dorekoṇḍu
doḷḷittembudaṁ divya muni vākyamamōgha vākyamakkumadarkēnuṁ
cintisalvēḍendoḍante geyvenendu tīrtha jalaṅgaḷaṁ mindu daḷimbavanuṭṭu
muttina toḍigegaḷaṁ toṭṭu darbhaśayanadoḷirdu—

lg.l: jñānadinirdu niṭṭipoḍe divya munīndrana koṭṭa mantra saṁ
jānane jānadiṁ barise bandu yamaṁ besanāvudāvudā

p.s:
embuduṁ tathāstuvendu tannaṁśamanākeya garbhadoḷavatarisi yamabhaṭṭāraka
nantardhānakke sandanannegamā kāntege—

lg.l: himadhavaḷātapatramane pōle mukhēnduva beḷpu pūrṇa kuṁ
bhamane nirantaraṁ gele kucaṅgaḷa tōrpukarpu patākeyondu vi
bhramamane pōle purvina poḍarpoḷakoṇḍudavaḷge garbha ci
hname gaḷa garbhadarbhakana sūcipa mundaṇa rājyacihnamaṁ

p.s:
antu kontiyatanna garbhabhāramuṁ tāpasāśramadanurāgamumoḍanoḍane
baḷeye bandhujanada manōrathaṅgaḷumombattaneya tiṅgaḷumoḍanoḍane neṟeye—
antu pesaraniṭṭu parakeyaṁ koṭṭu—

embudumadēviridittenendu viyattaḷakkogedoḍātanaṁśamākeya
garbhasarōvaradoḷage candrabimbadante sogayise—

lg.l: duva kaḍuveḷpu kūsina negaḻteya beḷpuvolāytu munnennaba
ḷḷuva naḍu tōrpa meyyanoḷakoṇḍudunāḍe tōrpanoḷakoṇḍudu poṅgoḍanaṁ tamāḷa pa

p.s:
antu garbhanirbharanirbhara garbha pradēśadoḷarātigaḷgantakālaṁ dorekoḷvante prasūti
kālaṁ dorekoḷe—

antu bharatakulatilakarappirvarmakkaḷaṁ pettu konti santasadantama
neydirpudumatta dhr̥tarāṣṭrana mahādēviyappa gāndhāri kēḷdu tanna garbhaṁ
taḍedudarke kinisi kiṅkirivōgi—

avaṁ kaṇḍu kinisi kirceḻdivellavaṁ poṟage bisuṭu bannimembuduṁ
vyāsabhaṭṭārakaṁ bandu gāndhāriyaṁ baggisi—

lg.l: odavuge ninna santatige nūrvarudagra sutarkaḷonde ga
ṇade muni nūṟupiṇḍamumanāgaḷe tīvida kammanappa tu
ppada koḍadoḷ samantu maḍagiṭṭoḍe sr̥ṣṭige cōdyamappinaṁ

p.s:
antu nūrvaroḷorvanagurbu parbi pararikalise sampūrṇa vayaskanāgi
ghr̥ta ghaṭa vighaṭanumāgidinaghaṭamānanāgi puṭṭuvuduṁ—
antogedanēkōtpātaṅgaḷaṁ kaṇḍu mundaṟiva cadura viduranintendaṁ—

endoḍaṁ putramōha kāraṇavāgi dhr̥tarāṣṭranuṁ gāndhāriyu mēgeydu
moḍambaḍadirdoydapevendoḍutpāta śāntika pauṣṭika kriyegaḷaṁ mahā brāhmaṇarindaṁ baḷeyisi
baddavaṇamaṁ bājisi maṅgaḷamaṁ pāḍisi kūsiṅge duryōdhananendu pesaraniṭṭu
mattina kūsugaḷgellaṁ duśyāsanādiyāgi nāmaṅgaḷaniṭṭu parakeyaṁ koṭṭu—

lg.l: lakaninnorvananugra vairinaṁ dōrvala dr̥pta madavanmātaṅga kumbhābhasthaḷō ||......jvala rdadrimau
ktika lagnōjjvala bāṇanaṁ pravilasadgīrvāṇa dātavya sāpravīṇanaṁ nirvāṇanaṁ dibya sā

p.s:
antu sarva lakṣaṇa sampūrṇanappa magananamōghaṁ paḍevenembu
dyōgamanettikaikoṇḍu pāṇḍurājanuṁ tānuṁ—

lg.l: daṟivara pēḻda nōmpigaḷanorme palarmeyumintu tamma me
alasade māḍi bēsaṟade sālgumidennade meysogakke paṁ

p.s:
antondu varṣambaraṁ bharaṅgeydu nōntu pūrvakramadoḷondu
divasamupavāsamanirdagaṇya puṇyatīrtha jalaṅgaḷaṁ mindu daḷimbamanuṭṭu
darbhaśayanadoḷirdu—

lg.l: jjvala muktābharaṇaṁ tarattaraḷatārōdāra bhā bhāśōbhā bhāravābhīladāramaṁ
galatālālitarā sita sāndra candanarasaṁ beḷdiṅgaḷembondu paṁ

p.s:
antu tanna kaikoṇḍa beḷpasadanadoḷ kīrti śrīyaṁyuṁ vākśrīyumana
nukarisi mantrākṣara niyamadoḷindranaṁ barisesi—

embudumākeya bageda bageyoḷoḍambaḍuvante kulagirigaḷa biṇpumaṁ
dharātaḷada tiṇputaḷeda tiṇpumanādityana tējadaguntiyumaṁdaleyumaṁ candrana kāntiyumaṁ madanana
saubhāgyamumaṁ kalpataruvinudāraśaktiyumanīśvarana prabhuśaktiyumaṁ javana
ballāḷtanamumaṁ siṁhada kalitanamumanavaravaranantavara desegaḷiṁ tegedondumāḍi
kontiya divya garbhōdaramemba śukti puṭōdaradoḷ tanna divyāṁśavemba
muktāphalōdapabinduvanindraṁ saṅkrami
ī bhāgavu ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla. “iṭṭu tānumākrami” (ka.).si nijanivāsakke pōdanannegamitta
kontiyumandimondi naṁna beḷagappa jāvadoḷ sukhanidreyāgi—

lg.l: ḷdaḍarvudanondu bāḷa ravi tannaya sōgila mēge rāgadiṁ

p.s:
antu kaṇḍu munikumārarōduva vēdaninādadiṁ vigatajanada pādapadmaṅgaḷoḷ vigata nidreyāgi
pāṇḍurājaṅgamalliya munijanaṅgaḷgamaṟipidoḍavarā kanasugaḷge
santōṣambaṭṭu—

intappa maganaṁ nīnamōghaṁ paḍeveyendu munijanaṅgaḷ pēḻva
śubhasvapnaphalaṅgaḷoḍanoḍane garbhacihnaṅgaḷuṁ tōṟe pagevara peṇḍira
mogaṅgaḷumāḷākeya kucacūcukaṅgaḷumoḍanoḍane kandiduvākeya vaḷitra
yaṅgaḷuṁ pagevara śaktitrayaṅgaḷumoḍanoḍane keṭṭuvākeya bāsegaḷuṁ pagevara
bāḻvāsegaḷumoḍanoḍanasiyavāduvākeya mandagamanamuṁ pagevara
manaṅgaḷumoḍanoḍanalasikeyaṁ kaikoṇḍuvākeya naḍuvina baḍatanamuṁ pagevara
siriyumoḍanoḍane keṭṭuvā samayadoḷ—

lg.l: perci dhanurlatā guṇa ninādamanālisi kēḷalu manaṁ

p.s:
mattamēḻuṁ samudraṅgaḷa nīranondumāḍi mīyaluṁ vēḷāvana
latāgr̥hōdara puḷinasthaḷa parisarapradēśadoḷ toḻalalumaḻtiyāge—

ī vacanavū padyavū ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.antu tekkane tīvida meyyoḷalarda sampageyaralante beḷarta baṇṇaṁ
guṇārṇavaṅge māḍida baṇṇadante sogayisi baḷedu—

lg.l: ī vacanavū padyavū ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.tuḍugegaḷoḷ sarigeyumaṁ

p.s:
antā baḷeda garbhadoḷ sampūrṇaprasavasamayaṁ dorekoḷe grahaṅgaḷellaṁ
tantammucca sthānaṅgaḷoḷirdu ṣaḍvarga siddhiyanuṇṭumāḍe śubhalagnōdaya
doḷ—

antu moḻaguva suradundubhigaḷuṁ parasuva jayajaya dhvanigaḷuṁ
berasu dēvēndraṁ bare dēvavimānaṅgaḷellaṁ śataśr̥ṅgaparvatamaṁ musuṟikoṇḍu—

antu hiraṇyagarbhabrahmaṁ modalāge vyāsa kaśyapa vasiṣṭha vālmīki viśvāmitra
jamadagni bhāradvājāgastya pulastya nārada pramukharappa divya munipatigaḷumēkādaśa
rudraruṁ dvādaśādityarumaṣṭavasugaḷumaśvinīdēvaruṁ modalāge mūvatta
mūdēvaruṁ indraṁ berasu vaimānika dēvaruṁ neredu pāṇḍurājanumaṁ
kuntiyumaṁ parasi kūsiṅge janmōjanmakaraṇōtsavamaṁ māḍi—

antu piridumosageyaṁ māḍi dēvasabheyuṁ brahmasabheyumoḍanirdu
nāmakaraṇōtsava nimittaṅgaḷappa nāmaṅgaḷoḷītaṁ sakala bhuvana saṁstūyamānaṁ
cāḷukyavaṁśōdbhavaṁ śrīmadarikēsari vikramārjunanudāttanārāyaṇaṁ
pracaṇḍa mārtāṇḍanudāra mahēśvaraṁ kadanatriṇētraṁ manujamāndhātaṁ pratijñā
gāṅgēyaṁ śaucāñjanēyanakaḷaṅkarāmaṁ sāhasabhīmaṁsābharaṇaṁ pratyakṣa jīmūta vāhanaṁ
jagadēkamallaṁ parasainyabhairavaṁ atirathamathanaṁ
ī bhāgavu ka. kha. pratigaḷallilla.vairigajaghaṭāvighaṭaṭṭanaṁ vidviṣṭa
vidrāvaṇanarāti kāḷānaḷaṁ ripukuraṅgakaṇṭhīravaṁ vikrāntatuṅgaṁ parākrama dhavaḷaṁ
samaraikamēru śaraṇāgata jalanidhi vinayavibhūṣaṇaṁ manunidādhānananūnadāni
lōkaika kalpadrumaṁ gajagamanagamana rājaputranārūḍhasarvajñaṁ gandhēbhavidyādharaṁ
nr̥paparamātmaṁ vibudha vanajavanakaḷahaṁsaṁsurata makaradhvajaṁ sahajamanōjaṁ
āndhrīadri kucajakaḷaśa pallavaṁ karṇāṭī kaṭakarṇapūraṁ lāṭīṭa lalāmaṁ kēraḷīḷakēḷi
kandarpaṁ saṁsārasārōdayaṁ maṟurevakkadallaḻaṁ nōḍuttegelvaṁ pāṇbaraṅkusaṁ
ammanagandhavāraṇaṁ paḍemecce gaṇḍaṁ priyagaḷḷaṁpragaḷbhaṁ guṇanidhi guṇārṇavaṁ sāmanta
cūḍāmaṇiyendintivu modalāge palavumaṣṭōttara śatanāmaṅgaḷaniṭṭu viśēṣā
śīrvacanaṅgaḷiṁ parasi—

lg.l: gvyāptaśvāptivyāpti yaśōviḷāsinigeviḷāsinī vadhuge vallabhanāgu nirantara sukha

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
vara prasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīravacanaracana
catura kavitāguṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
prathamāśvāsaṁ

div.head: dvitīyāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
antu guṇārṇavana puṭṭidosageyoḷosagegege maruḷgoṇḍu kuntiyuṁ
pāṇḍurājanumire mādri tanage makkaḷilladudarke virakteyāgi posedu bisuṭa
raktāśōka pallavadante karaṁ koragi cintisutirdoḍākeya binnanādakhinnavāda mogadandamaṁ
kaṇḍu kunti karuṇisi putrōtpatti nimittaṅgaḷappa mantrākṣaraṅgaḷanupadēśaṁ
geydoḍākeyuṁ tadukta kriyeyoḷaṁ niyama niyamitegaḷiṁ niyamiteyāgi—

āgaḷā pāṇḍurājanā kūsugaḷge jātakarmamaṁ munigaḷiṁ baḷeyisi
nakula sahadēvarendavargamaḷvesaraniṭṭu putra sampūrṇa manōrathanāgirpinamayvar
kūsugaḷumēḻgevāḍivada candranantuttarābhivr̥ddhiyoḷ sogayisi baḷeye
bharatakulakke viśada yaśōṅkuraṅgaḷuṁ bandhujanakke puṇyāṅkuraṅgaḷuṁ vandijanakke
kalpavr̥kṣāṅkuraṅgaḷumarātijanakke kāḷakūṭāṅkuraṅgaḷumaṁ pōltu pañcāṅga
mantraṁ svarūpadoḷ mūrtimantatraṁ gaḷādante sogayisi baḷeye—
antātaṁ baḷeyevaḷeye—
antātaṁ baḷeye—

lg.l: verasida todaḷodave nuḍivasu todaḷnuḍiva nuḍiya nuḍi nagemogadoḷ
geyva balaṁ bāḷa kāladoḷ toḍarda poḍa

p.s: antā kūsugaḷ nija jananī janakara manamaniḻkuḷigoḷisiyuḷeyu marātijanaṅgaḷa manamanasuṅgoḷisiyuṁ baḷeye baḷeye—

lg.l: alardadirmutte pūta posa mallige kampanavuṅkutirpa teṁ

p.s:
āgaḷā basantarājana baraviṅge guḍigaṭṭidante baḷvaḷa baḷeda miḷirvaśōkeya
taḷirgaḷumātana baraviṅge tōraṇaṅgaṭṭidante banda māmaraṅgaḷanaḍardu
toḍardeḷakombugaḷviḍidu maradiṁ marakke dāṅguḍiviḍuva mādhavīlategaḷumātana
baraviṅge neṟeye sogayise keygeyva nallaḷante naneya birimuguḷgaḷa tuṟuga
ḷoḷeṟagi tuṟugida kalpalategaḷumātana baraviṅge baddavaṇaṁ bājipante bhōrgaredu
moreva tumbigaḷumātana baraviṅge raṅgavaliyikkidante puḷinasthaḷaṅgaḷoḷudirda
kaḻivūgaḷumātana baraviṅge vanavanite mecci neṟeye keygeydante niṟiniṟigoṇḍu
sogayisuva niṟigana niṟidaḷira goñcalgaḷumātana mēlvāye rāgisi rōmāṅkura
mogedantogeda kaḷikāṅkuraṅgaḷumātanaṅgasaṅgadoḷ kāmarasamuguvantuguva
soneyasōgeyasogeya sōnegegaḷumanoḷakoṇḍu tadāśramada nandanavanaṅgaḷ janaṅgaḷa
nanaṅgaṅgenaṅgaṅgeḷananaṅgaṅge toḻtuvesaṅgeysiduvu—

lg.l: lgavilanuvāgi banda malayānilanūdenōḍenōḍi teraḷva cūta pa
llavada teraḷke tadvana viḷāsiniyuṭṭa dukūladondu pa
bāgire sōrva sōne madamāgire māvina banda kōḍe kō

p.s:
antu banda basantadoḷ mādri tāṁ garvavyāleyuṁvyālōle krīḍānu
śīleyumappudaṟiṁ vanakrīḍā nimittadiṁ pōgi—

lg.l: ḻpalvanitane māḍi toṭṭubandu karamoppidaḷāke basanta kāntevōl

p.s: antu toṭṭa pūduḍuge madanana toṭṭa pūgaṇegeṇeyāgire—

lg.l: miḷirva kuruḷgaḷoḷ toḍardu dēsiseyanāvagamīva cenna pū
baḷasuva tumbiyaṁ piḍida neydiloḷoyyane sōvutuṁ beḍaṁ

p.s: tāpasāśramadiṁ poṟamaṭṭante banamaṁ toḻalva pāṇḍurājaṁ kaṇḍumādriyaṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: sogayise toṭṭa pūduḍuge mellerdeyoḷ taḍamāḍe gāḍidi
ṭṭage koḷe mēle pāydavaḷanappidanā vibhu tanna śāpamaṁ

p.s:
antappuvuduṁ viṣama viṣavamalliyanappidante taḷta nallaḷa mr̥dumr̥ṇāḷa
kōmaḷa bāhupāśaṅgaḷe yamapāśaṅgaḷāge—

lg.l: bigidamardirda tōḷ saḍile jōle mogaṁ mogadindamoyyago
yyage nagegaṇgaḷāli mamuguḻdantitare muccire suyyaḍaṅge me
llage maṟasondidandadoḷe jōlda nijēśananā latāṅgi to
ṭṭage koḷe nōḍi keṭṭeniniyaṁ maṟasondidanō baḻaldanō

p.s:
endu paṟipaṭṭa suyyumaṁ kōḍuva meyyumaṁ kaṇḍu paralōka
prāptanādudanaṟitu—

endu vanadēvategaḷgellaṁ karuṇamāge paḷayisuva mādriya saramaṁ
kunti kēḷdu bhōṅkanerdedeṟedu—

lg.l: daḻutuṁ peṟa peṟaganante paritare muḍi bi

p.s:
antu tanna nallana kaḷēvaramaṁ taḻkaisikoṇḍu tanna sāvaṁ paricchēdisi
pallaṁ suliyuttumirdarppa mādriyaṁ kaṇḍu kunti neladoḷ meyyanīḍāḍi
nāḍāḍiyallade paḷayisi—

endu nīnī kūsugaḷaṁ kaikoṇḍu naḍapu nallananenagoppisānātanādu
danappenene mādriyintendaḷ—

endu tapōvanada munijanamuṁ vanadēvatājanamuṁ tannaṇmaṁ
pogaḻe mādri pāṇḍurājanoḍane dāḍāhōttaradante(?) kirciṅgercaṁ puge kuladoḷaṁ
caladoḷamāvadakanduṁ kundumillade tannoregaṁ doregamārumillenisidāgaḷ
kunti śōkākrānteyāgire tapōvanada tapōvr̥ddharākānteyanintendu santaisidar—
antumallade—

nīnintu śōkākrānteyāgi saṁsāra sthitiyanaṟiyadajñānigaḷante
vipraḷāpaṅgeydeyappoḍī kūsugaḷ manamikkiyumerdeyikkiyuṁ kiḍuvarendanē
kōpaśāntavacanaṅgaḷindamākeyubbegamanāṟe nuḍidumalliya munijanamellamā
kūsugaḷumaṁ kuntiyamaṁ mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu nāgapurakke vandu gāṅgēya
dhr̥tarāṣṭra vidurarkaḷgamambālegaṁ pāṇḍurājana vr̥tāntamanaṟipidoḍāgaḷ—

āgaḷ putra snēhadindati praḷāpaṅgeyvambāleyumaṁ bandhu jana
nirīkṣaṇadiṁ śōkaṁ maṟukaṇisekoḷise bāyaḻidu paḷayisuva kuntiyumaṁ gāṅgēya
dhr̥tarāṣṭra vidurarkaḷumaṁ satyavatīdēviyumaṁ santaisi pāṇḍurājaṅge
jaḷadānādikriyegaḷaṁ nirvartisi tadanantaradoḷaduve nirvēgamāge vyāsavacana
doḷ satyavatiyumambikeyumambāleyuṁ saṁsāraviśīrṇeyarāgi munivanamanā
śrayisidaritta gāṅgēyanayvar kūsugaḷumaṁ tanna toḍeye toṭṭilāgi
naḍaputtamire duryōdhana prabhr̥tigaḷ nūrvaruṁ dharmaputrādigaḷayvaruṁ
sahapāṁsukrīḍitarāgi—

antā kūsugaḷ kūsāṭavāḍuttirdondu divasaṁ maragerasiyāḍalendu
munde tamma page parvuvante pannirmattarpayinpattar parvidālada marada modalge vandu
bhīmanaṁ maṟemāḍimattanitaroḷaṁ maṟe kōlanīḍāḍi palavu sūḻ kāḍi—

antu biḻdu sulida moḻakālgaḷuṁ kaḻalda palgaḷumelvaḍagādamēṇbaḍavāda
meyguḷumuḍida keygaḷumāgi berasaḻuttuṁ bandu gāṅgēya dhr̥tarāṣṭrarge
kāraṇambēḻdoḍavarinditta bhīmanoḍanāḍadirimendu mudugaṇgal bārise tamma
nonda siggiṅganibarumondāgi pōgi poṟavoḻala marada keḷage maṟasondida
bhīmananaḍasi piḍidu nūrvaruṁ gaṇṭalaṁ meṭṭi—

antaḻduvuduṁ gaṅgādēviya varaprasādadoḷ viṣama viṣadharaṅgaḷ
pariye koraloḷ toḍarda śileyaṁ paṟidīḍāḍi gaṅgeya nīraṁ tōḷoḷ
tuḷuṅki maguḻdu bandaṅge viṣada laḍḍugeyanikkiyumenitānumupadravaṅgaḷoḷ
toḍarikkiyuṁ gelalāṟade manamikkiyumerdeyikkiyumirdarantayvar kūsugaḷgaṁ
gāṅgēyaṁ caulōpanayanādi kriyegaḷaṁ māḍi sukhamirpannegamitta
gaṅgādvāradoḷ māyāpuramemba r̥ṣyāśramadoḷ gautamanembaṁ brahmar̥ṣi
tapaṅgeyyutirpinamā r̥ṣige billumambuṁverasorva magaṁ puṭṭidanātaṅge
śaradvatanendu pesaraniṭṭu naḍape baḷedu tapaṅgeyvātanallige jalakrīḍā
nimittadindindranaccarase jalacareyembavaḷ bandoḍākeyaṁ kaṇḍu kāmāsakta
cittanāgi kūḍi—

annegamā tapōvanakke bēṇṭeyāḍalbanda śantanuvinoḍaneyavarā
śarastambadoḷ parikalisirda munīndranindriyadoḷogeda peṇgūsumaṁ
gaṇḍugūsumanavaṟa keladoḷirda divya śarāsana śaraṅgaḷumaṁ kaṇḍu koṇḍupōgi
śantanuge tōṟidoḍātanumā śiśudvayamaṁ nija gajapurakkuydu kr̥peyiṁ
naḍapidanappudaṟiṁ kr̥panuṁ kr̥peyumendu pesaraniṭṭu naḍaputtirpannegamavarayyaṁ
śaradvatanallige bandu kiṟiyātaṅge caulōpanayanādi kriyegaḷaṁ māḍi
dhanurvidyōpadēśaṅgeyye sarva vidyā viśāradanādanā kr̥pācāryara pakkadoḷ
kūsugaḷaṁ vidyābhyāsaṅgeyse—

lg.l: nereduvu tannoḷār gaḷaḷaggaḷa guṇārṇavanantu kuśāgratuṣāgraśukāgra buddhigaḷ

p.s:
antu pañcāṅga vyākaraṇada vr̥ttibhēdamappachandovr̥ttivicitivicittiyoḷaṁ
śabdālaṅkāra niṣṭhitamappalaṅkāradoḷaṁ vyāsa vālmīki kaśyapa prabhr̥ti viracitaṅgaḷappa
mahākāvyaṅgaḷoḷaṁ nāndī parōcanāprarōcanapravacana prastāvanētivr̥ttanānivr̥ttinivr̥ttinitivr̥tti sandhi pravēśa
viṣkambha kapōtikā vyāḷikādi lakṣaṇōpētaṅgaḷappa nāṭakaṅgaḷoḷaṁ padineṇṭu
dharmaśāstraṅgaḷoḷaṁ nālku vēdadoḷamāṟaṅgadoḷamaydu teṟada
mantraṅgaḷoḷamāṟuṁḷaṁ mūṟu darśanadoḷaṁ pratyakṣānumāna pramāṇaṅgaḷoḷaṁ bharata
praṇīta nr̥tyaśāstradoḷaṁstraṅgaḷo nāradādi praṇīta gāndharvavidyāviśēṣaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
gajāgamajña rājaputra gautama vādvāki pāḷa kaśyapapāḷakāpyapāḷaka supatisumati śrīharṣādi purāṇa
puruṣaviracitaṅgaḷappahastiśāstraṅgaḷoḷaṁ citrakarma patracchēda graha gaṇita
ratnaparīkṣegaḷoḷaṁ dārukarma vāstuvidyāpūrva yantraprayōgamiśraprayōgacitraprayōga viṣāpaśāpa viśāpaviśāpa
haraṇasapusurabhēda ratitantēndrajāla vividha vidyegaḷoḷamanēkākṣara svarūpaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
cāpa cakra paraśu kr̥pāṇa śakti tōmara musala musuṇḍi bhiṇḍivāḷa mudgara
gadādi vividhāyudhaṅgaḷoḷamati pravīṇanurumārūḍha sarvajña mahēndra
jāṇa(?)numāgi —

endu lōkamellaṁ pogaḻte negaḻda pogaḻtegaṁ negaḻgegaṁ tāne
guṟiyāgi—

antadayvaruṁ samasta śastra śāstra prayōga pravīṇarāge dharmaputraṁ
dharmaśāstraṅgaḷoḷaṁ śrutismr̥tigaḷoḷaṁ pravīṇanādaṁ bhīmasēnaṁ vyākaraṇa
doḷārindamaggaḷaṁ kuśalanādaṁ nakulaṁ kunta śastradoḷati pravīṇanumāgi
aśvavidyeyoḷārindaṁ piriyanādaṁ sahadēvaṁ jyōtirjñānadoḷati pariṇatanādaṁ—

lg.l: caḷaśikharaṅgaḷaṁ masuḷevanduvu parvida vakṣamī kṣamāmī sukuṁvikṣukuṁmikṣakuṁ

p.s:
antu sogayisuva rūpinoḷ ponna baṇṇadantappa tanna meyya
baṇṇamaḷavalladoppe—

lg.l: goḷe karamoppidaṁ daśa sahasra madēbha baḷaṁ vr̥kōdaraṁ

p.s: antoppuva gaṇḍa gāḍiyoḷindra nīladantappa baṇṇaṁ kaṇgevare—

lg.l: śaradada candranaṁ vimala candrike bāḷadinēśanaṁ tamō
harakiraṇaṁ kiśōra hariyaṁ navakēsara rāji mikka di
kkariyananūna dāna pariśōbhe manaṅgoḷe porduvante suṁ
dara navayauvanaṁ neṟeye porde guṇārṇavanoppi tōṟidaṁ

p.s:
antu navayauvanaṁ neṟeye neṟeye niṟi niṟigoṇḍa guṇārṇavana
talenavirgaḷ lāvaṇyarasamaniḍidiḍidu tivida kamalāsanana beralaccugaḷannavāduvu
mūṟuṁ lōkada mūṟu paṭṭamanāḷalke takka lakṣaṇa sampūrṇamappa sahaja
manōjana lalāṭaṁ paṭṭaṅgaṭṭida nosalge lakṣaṇamanaṟasalvēḍembantādudu karbina
billa koṅkinante koṅkiyuṁ paravaniteyarerdege kora dese koṅkilladeyuṁ sogayisuva
surata makaradhvajana parvugaḷ kāmadēvana vijaya vaijayantigaḷantāduvu nīḷpaṁ
beḷpumaṁ tāḷdi paravaniteyara desege kisugaṇcidante kisu serevaridu sogayisuva
śaucāñjanēyana kaṇgaḷembaralambugaḷ gaṇikājanaṅgaḷerdeyaṁ naṭṭu keṅkamādaṁ
tāduvu ripujanada perciṅgaṁ parāṅganā janada mecciperciṅgaṁ mūgiṟivante
sogayisuva gandhēbha vidyādharana mūgu tanna suyya kampanallade peṟara
kampanāsevaḍadantādudu posa javvanada mumbaṇṇabayaṇadante karpaṁkappaṁkeppaṁ kaikoṇḍu
katturiyalyiṁ baredantappa vikrānta tuṅgana mīsegaḷātana tīvra pratāpānaḷa
dhūmalēkheyantāduvu puḷiyoḷaleda pavaḷada baṭṭinante sogayisuva
saṁsārasārōdayana bimbādharamanaṅgarāgarasa duruḷiyantādudu rasadāḍimadaḷimbaḍimba bittumaṁ posa muttumaṁ mukkuḷisidantappa vibudhavanajavana kaḷahaṁsana
dantapaṅktigaḷamr̥takiraṇana kāntigaḷaniḷisuvantāduvu maḍidu tandiṭṭa posaneydila
kāvanāvagaṁ gelda ratnakuṇḍalaṅgaḷa poḷapanoḷakoṇḍante nasunēlva karṇāṭīṭa
karṇapūrana pālegaḷunālagevālegaḷuṁkarṇapālegaḷuṁ sarasvatiyāḍuva līlāndōḷadantāduvu baḷvaḷa
beḷedeḷagauṅginante lōkada celvellamanoḷakoṇḍu rēkhegoṇḍa lāṭīṭa lalāmana
pariṇaddha kandharaṁ yuvarāja kaṇṭhikābharaṇamaṁ kaṭṭuvudarke nōntu tanna celvanallade
peṟara celvanāsevaḍadantādudu kulada calada maimeyoḷ tannane nōḍida
santōṣadoḷutsāhamādante sogayisuva samaraikamēruvina bhujaśikharaṅgaḷ
kula śikhari śikharayuttuṅga śikharaṅgaḷantāduvu vyāḷagajaṅgaḷumanaṅkada bardeyarumanugibagi
māḍida santōṣadoḷ baḷvaḷa baḷeda vikrāntatuṅgana niḍudōḷgaḷ gaṇikājanakke
kāmapāśaṅgaḷumarātijanakke yamapāśaṅgaḷumāduvu raktāśōka pallavadante
toḷatoḷagutaḷa taḷa toḷaguvāndhrī kucakalaśa pallavana karataḷapallavaṅgaḷ samada gajakumbha
sthaḷāsphāḷana karkaśaṅgaḷāduvu poḍarva pagevaranuṟade koṇḍakonda santōṣadoḷaṁ
śrīyanoḷakoṇḍa santōṣadoḷaṁ tekkane tīvida kēraḷīḷa kēḷi kandarpanagalulduraṁ
lakṣmige kulabhavanamuṁ nivāsabhavanamumādudu poḍarva maṇḍaḷikara manadante
karamasidāda parākramadhavaḷana madhyapradēśaṁ nārāyaṇaṁ tannāḷdaṁ māḍi
tānāḷmāḍiyuṁ tānaḷḷāḍeyuṁ bardeyara manavanaḷḷāḍisuvantādudu
gambhīraguṇadoḷamāvartana siddhiyoḷaṁ jaḷanidhiyane pōlva śaraṇāgata jaḷanidhiya
nimna nābhi celviṅge tāne nābhiyādudu siṁha kaṭitaṭamaniḷisuva ripukuraṅga
kaṇṭhīravana kaṭitaṭamoldu nōḍuva gāḍikārtiyara kaṇge kāmananoḍḍaṇadante
doḍḍittāgi mīṟuvudvr̥tta vr̥ttateya nīḻduneḷadukoṇḍantudvr̥ttaṅgaḷāduvu
udāttanārāyaṇanūru yugmaṅgaḷ māniniyara manōgajaṅgaḷaṁ kaṭṭalkālāna
stambhaṅgaḷāduvu antapūrvaṅgaḷāgi toḷaguva kiṟudoḍegaḷuḍuvaḍardarvannamārūḍha
sarvajñana doḍḍaḍḍi mārgaṅgaḷeḷavāḻeya didaṇḍinoḷ sāṇegaṭṭidantāduvu
gūḍhagulphagūḍugoḷvapārṣṇigaḷanoḷakoṇḍa manujamāndhātana poṟa aḍigaḷ virōdhi
bhūpāḷaranaḍigeṟagisida santōṣadoḷunnataṅgaḷādante kūrmōnnataṅgaḷāduvu
nosalaṁ suṭṭi tōrpannavappuṅguṭaṅgaḷoḷ miñcaṁ kīlisidante toḷagi poḷeva
pracaṇḍamārtāṇḍana pādanakhaṅgaḷ gaṇḍara peṇḍirañjidaḷkida mogamaṁ nōḍalke
kannaḍigaḷannavāduvu posatalarda kendāvareya kempumaṁ melpubeḷpumaniḻkuḷigoṇḍu
toḷaguvarikēsariya pādataḷaṅgaḷaḍigeṟagidari narapālara makuṭamāṇikyamarīcijāla
bāḷātapaṅgaḷanaledu keṅkamādantāduvu posavesaṟageya baṇṇadante sogayisuva
sāmanta cūḍāmaṇiya meyya baṇṇaṁ vidhātranemba cittāriya varṇakramaṅgeyda
kadaḷīgarbhaśyāmamemba baṇṇadantādudu—

antu nakula sahadēvar sahitamayvaruṁ navayauvanada paramasukhamaneydi
santōṣadinirdaritta gaṅgādvāradoḷ bharadvājanemba brahmar̥ṣi—

antu kāṇbudumamr̥tābdhiyembaccaraseya kanakakāñcīkaḷāpadoḷ
toḍarda dēvāṅga vastraduḷḷuḍeyoḷuliva sūsakadanūlatoṅgalveraseḻalva mundaṇa
sōge kārgālada sōgeyante sogayise—

antu kantuśaraparavaśanāgi dhairya kṣaraṇeyumindriya kṣaraṇeyu
moḍanoḍanāge—

antu bharadvājanātmatanūjaṅge pesaraniṭṭu tanna keḷeyaṁ pāñcāḷa
dēśadarasaṁ pr̥ṣatanembanātana magaṁ drupadanumaṁ drōṇanumanoḍagūḍi
yajñasēnanemba brahmar̥ṣiya pakkadoḷ bilviddeyaṁ kalalvēḻdoḍe drōṇanuṁ
drupadanuṁ dhanurdharāgragaṇyarāge bharadvājaṁ drōṇaṅge kr̥pana taṅgeyappa
śāradvateyaṁ tandu maduveyaṁ māḍidoḍātaṅgamākegaṁ triṇētranaṁśadoḷorva
magaṁ puṭṭi—

antu negaḻdu tammayyana kaiyoḷ dhanurvidyōpadēśadoḷ
dhanurdharāgragaṇyanumāgi sandaṁ drupadanuṁ tanna rājyadoḷ nindaṁ drōṇanuṁ
tanage baḍatanamaḍase aśvatthāmananoḍagoṇḍu nāḍu nāḍaṁ toḻaldu
paraśurāmanallige vandaṁ—

antu valkalāvr̥ta kaṭitaṭanumāgirdarddu jaṭākalāpanumāgi tapōvanakke
pōpa bhārgavaṁ dravyārthiyāgi banda kumbhasambhavanaṁ kaṇḍu kanakapātrakkupāya
millappudaṟiṁ mr̥tpātradoḷarghyamettimane pūjisi—

embuduṁ drōṇanenage vidyādhaname dhanamappudaṟiṁ divyāstraṅgaḷaṁ
dayegeyvudene vāruṇa vāyavyāgnēya paupurandarādi pradhānāstraṅgaḷaṁ kuḍe
koṇḍu paraśurāmanaṁ bīḻkoḍu tannoḍanāḍiyappa keḷeyaṁ drupadaṁ
chatrāvatiḷiyoḷarasugeydapanendu kēḷdā poḻalge vandu drupadanaramaneya
bāgiloḷ nindu paḍiyaṟanaṁ karedu nimmoḍanāḍida keḷeyaṁ drōṇanemba pārvaṁ
bandanendu nimmarasaṅgaṟiye pēḻembudumātanā māḻkeyoḷe bandaṟipuvuduṁ
drupadaṁ rājyamadirāmadōnmattanuṁ garvagrahagaḷagrahavyagravyagrahacittanumāgi mēgillade—

antu nuḍidudaṁ paḍiyaṟaṁ bandāmāḻkeyoḷaṟipe drōṇa
nottambadindoḷagaṁ pokku drupadanaṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: neṟaṟigoḷe kumbhasambhavananā drupadaṁ kaḍu siggu māḍidaṁ

p.s:
antu māḍidudumalladī nāṇili pārvananeḻedu kaḷeyimembuduṁ
drōṇanintendaṁ—

lg.l: nuḍi taḍavappudondu mogadoḷ maṟukaṁ dorekoḷvudondu nā

p.s: endu sairisade—

endārūḍhapratijñanāgi nāgapurakke vandu tamma bhāvaṁ kr̥pana maneyoḷa
pagatapariśramanāgirdondu divasaṁ pāṇḍavaruṁ kauravaruṁ poṟavoḻaloḷ—

endu tanna maganappaśvatthāmanaṁ karedī lakṣyamaṁ tegeyembudu
mātanantegeyvenendu naiṣṭhikamemba muṣṭiyoḷaṁ puṅkhānupuṅkhamemba śara
sandhānadoḷavayavadoḷe tegedoḍanibaruṁ cōdyambaṭṭu gāṅgēya
dhr̥tarāṣṭrargaṟipidoḍe nadītanūjaṁ bhāradvājaṅge baḻiyanaṭṭi barisi pūrva
sambhāṣaṇārghyametti madhuparka vētrāsana tāmbūla dānādigaḷiṁ santasaṁ baḍisi
tadīya kula vidyāśalōdyōgaśa śalavedyośalavidyāvr̥ttigaḷaṁ besagoṇḍu—

lg.l: ggada bāḍaṅgaḷanāydu koṭṭu taṇideṁ pō sālgumembannamaṁ

p.s: embudumantegeyvenendu kalaśajananibara mogamaṁ nōḍi—

embudumā mātiṅge mecci jagadēkamallanaṁ toḍeyanēṟisikoṇḍu
kumbhasambhavaṁ gāṅgēyananillintendaṁ—

antu drōṇācāryanācāryapadaviyaṁ kaikoṇḍu pāṇḍava kauravarge
caturaṅga dhanurvēdamumaṁ divyāstraṅgaḷumaṁ śakti tōmara musala musuṇḍi
bhiṇḍivāḷa mudgara gadādi vividhāyudhaṅgaḷumaṁ gaja ratha turaga padāti
yuddhaṅgaḷumanupadēśaṁ geyyuttumireyire—
antu bandu vairigajaghaṭāvighaṭananoḷ vighaṭisi bilgaltu—

antu karṇaṁ guṇārṇavanoḷ seṇasi pageyanabhyāsaṅgeyvante
vidyābhyāsaṅgeyye—

antu bhāradvājanāgāmika saṅgrāmaraṅgakke pātraṅgaḷaṁ sameyisuva
sūtradhāranante śastravidyābhyāsaṁ geysuttire dēśādhīśvararappa palambar‌
rājakumārara naḍuve tārāgaṇaṅgaḷa naḍuvaṇa sakaḷa kaḷādharanante śastrakaḷādharanāgi
tannumaṁ gelevanda sāmanta cūḍāmaṇiya śarapariṇatiyanārayalendu—

antu pogaḻdu tanna pagevanappa drupadananītanamōghaṁ gelal neṟegumendu
niścaisi—

lg.l: kṣiṇeyadu bēgamā drupadanaṁ gaḍa kōḍagagaṭṭugaṭṭi taṁ

p.s: embudamī besanadāvudu gahanamendu pūṇdu pōgi—

lg.l: ḍḍoḍedōḍuttire sūse bīḻva talegaḷ sūḻpaṭṭakaipaṭṭināgaḷ javaṁ
deḍeyoḷ māṇaduruḷci kaṭṭi ripuvaṁ mundikkidaṁ drōṇanā

p.s:
āgaḷā kumbhasambhavaṁ parākramadhavaḷana parākramakke mecci kadampaṁ karci
drupadanaṁ tanna mañcada kāloḷ kaṭṭavēḻdu taleya mēle kālanavaṣṭambhadiṁ nīḍi—
endu sāye sarasaṁ nuḍidu mattamintendaṁ—

odedu ninnaninitu paribhavambaḍisidudu sālguṁ ninnaṁ kolalāgadu
kondoḍe mēlappa pagegañji kondantāgirkumendu kaṭṭida kaṭṭugaḷellamaṁ tāne
biṭṭu kaḷedu pōgembuduṁ drupadaṁ paribhavānaḷanaḷavalladaḷure ninnaṁ kolvanna
norva maganumaṁ vikramārjunaṅge peṇḍatiyappannaḷorva magaḷumaṁ paḍedalladire
nendu mahā pratijñārūḍhanāgi pōdanitta bhāradvājaṁ pāṇḍava kauravarkaḷa meyyoḷe
viddeyaṁ neṟeye saṅkramisida tanna vidyāmahimeyaṁ meṟeyalke bāhlīka
bhūriśravassōma datta gāṅgēya dhr̥tarāṣṭra vidurarkaḷgintendaṁ—

endoḍantegeyvayvemendanibarumoḍambaṭṭu poṟavoḻaloḷuttara
diśābhāgadoḷ sama caturasramāge nelananaḷedu kallaṁ pullumaṁ sōdisi śubhadina
śubhamuhūrtadoḷ—

antu sameda vyāyāma raṅgakke gāṅgēya dhr̥tarāṣṭra vidura sōmadatta
bāhlīka bhūriśravādi kulavr̥ddharuṁ kunti gāndhārigaḷuṁverasu bandu kuḷḷire—
āgaḷ kumbhasambhavaṁ—
antu bandu raṅgabhūmiya naḍuve nindu—

antu dharmaputranaṁ muntidiṭṭu bhīmārjuna nakula sahadēvaruṁ
duryōdhananaṁ muntiṭṭu yuyutsu duśyāsana dussaha dussaḷa jarāsandha satyasandha
nissaharājasandha vinda anuvinda durmati subāhu dusparśana durmarṣaṇa
durmukha duṣkarṇa vikarṇa viviṁśati sulōcana sunābha citra upacitra nanda
upananda sucitrāṅgada citrakuṇḍala suhasta dr̥ḍhahasta pramāthi dīrghabāhu
mahābāhu pratima supratima sapramāthi durdharṣaṇa duṣparājaya mitra upamitra
cauḷōpa dvandvahasta pratīpa supratīpa prahasta pratāpa pramada sadbāhugaḷ
modalāgi nūrvaruṁ bandu—

lg.l: rmodale janaṁ pogaḻe negaḻe jaḷanidhi ninadaṁ

p.s: antavariṁ baḻiyaṁ—

antirvarumorvarorvaroḷ seṇasi bahuprayōga gadā kauśalamaṁ
tōṟalendu—

antu mēredappal bageda mahāsamudraṅgaḷeraḍaṟa naḍuve
kulagiriyirpantirdaśvatthāmanaṁ kaṇḍirvarumeraḍuṁ desege tolagi nindāgaḷ—

lg.l: ṇgādaṇgē yeṇgeseyeme bare bandu munde nindaṁ harigaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ kumbhasambhavanuliva janada kaḷakaḷa ravamumaṁ moḻaguva
paṟegaḷumaṁ bārisi—
ā prastāvadoḷ—

lg.l: boḍanoḍanītoḍedoḍaninambanambugaḷu taḷudoḍaninambugaḷu taḷtoḍa vinambanambugaḷ taḷtoḍaninoḍanīduvembambuvembanitu sandeyamappinamastra jāladiṁ

p.s: mattamaindra vāruṇa vāyavyāgnēya pārvatādi bāṇaṅgaḷaṁ tuḍe—

lg.l: kaviduvu kāḷa nīḷa jaḷadāvaḷi vāridhigaḷ dharitriyaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷā parākramadhavaḷana śarapariṇatiyaṁ kaṇḍu duryōdhanana mogaṁ
talenavira gaṇṭiṁ kiṟidāge drōṇa bhīṣma kr̥pa vidura prabhr̥tigaḷa mogamaralda
tāvareyiṁ piridāge—

bandu drōṇācāryaṅge poḍamaṭṭu śaradhiyiṁ divyāstraṅgaḷa
nurcikoṇḍu—

lg.l: deraḍillade bageḍiradēvalbageḍillade valu bagaderaḍillade valdadu muḷisumēvamumerdeyoḷ

p.s:
antu tōṟeyumerdeya muḷisu nālagege vare sairisalāṟade vidviṣṭa
vidrāvaṇananintendaṁ—
embudumatirathamathananintendaṁ—
embuduṁ drōṇanuṁ kr̥panumeḍege vandu karṇananintendar—

lg.l: māvudo nīṁ ninna tāya tandeya deseyaṁ

p.s:
embudumā mātiṅge maṟuvātuguḍalaṟiyade pandeyaṁ
pāvaḍardantummane bemaruttumirda karṇanaṁ duryōdhanaṁ kaṇḍukaikoṇḍu drōṇanumaṁ
kr̥panumanintendaṁ—

endu nuḍidu karṇananīgaḷe kulajanaṁ māḍi tōrpenendu keyyaṁ
piḍidoḍagoṇḍu pōgi kanakapīṭhada mēle kuḷḷirisi kanaka kaḷaśadalllililu tīvidagaṇyapuṇya
tīrthōdakaṅgaḷaṁ caturvēdapāragarindabhiṣēkaṅgeysi—

antittu nityadānakke dēva sabaḷada padineṇṭu kōṭi ponnumanittu
nīnenagondanīyalvēḻpudendudiravēḻpudeveḷpu—

endu bēḍikoṇḍu karṇanaṁ mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu pōgi dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅgaṁ
gāndhārigaṁ poḍamaḍisidāgaḷ—

lg.l: intu suyōdhanaṁ ninage māḍida rājya vibhūtigunte mu
bantevolandu mundaṟidu tanna magaṅge samantu buddhivē

p.s:
āgaḷ duryōdhananaṁ mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu dhr̥tarāṣṭra karṇa śalya śakuni
saindhava prabhr̥tigaḷ nelaṁ mūriviṭṭanteḷellaṁ mūleḷanellaṁ mūleḷanellaṁ māriṭṭante sabhākṣōbhamāge taḷerdu nānā vidha
vāhanaṅgaḷanēṟi nija nivāsaṅgaḷge pōdaritta dharmaputranaṁ mundiṭṭu bhīmārjuna
nakula sahadēvaruṁ gāṅgēya drōṇa kr̥pa vidura prabhr̥tigaḷ nānā vidha
vāhanaṅgaḷanēṟi bare purajanaṅgaḷellamōrōrvarane piḍiyaccuviḍidu nuḍiye
kelaranāgatamanaṟiva buddhiyoḍeyarintembar—

lg.l: ḍavaranakāraṇaṁ keṇakidī posa poḻtaṟoḷāda kircu kau
ravargidu nāḍeyuṁ tiṇukanāgisadēṁ gaḷa saytu pōkumē

p.s:
endorvarorvarondondane nuḍiyuttuṁ pōge beḷaguva kaidīvigegaḷ
kaḻtaleyaṁ taledōṟalīyade pracaṇḍamārtāṇḍana tējōṅkuraṅgaḷ beḷaguvante
beḷage pāṇḍavar nijanivāsakke pōdarāgaḷ—

āgaḷ duryōdhanaṁ bhīmasēnana ballāḷtanadaḷavumaṁ vikramārjunana
divyāstra kauśaḷamumaṁ kaṇḍu tannerdeyuṁ poḷḷumaranaṁ kircaḷurvantoḷagoḷa
gaḷure sairisalāṟade karṇanaṁ karedāḷōcisi tammayyanallige pōgi poḍamaṭṭu
kaṭṭēkāntadoḷintendaṁ—

lg.l: piriyar‌ nīmire pāṇḍurājane valaṁ muṁ paṭṭamaṁ kaṭṭe bhū
gare paṭṭakke taguḷdu pālaneṟevir pāviṅge dāyādyaraṁ

p.s: adalladeyuṁ—

lg.l:
male taledōṟadendudane koṭṭudaḍaṅgamaḍaṅgi bandoḍokoṭṭu [du] ḍaṅgamaḍaṅgi baṁ[dudo]
ḍi.el.en. kannaḍa grantha sampādane : puṭa 197.koṭṭu [du] dhaṅgamaḍaṅgi bandoḍo]
karnāṭaka bhārati, sampuṭa 5, sañcike 3, oregallu
kkaligavesarge pūṇdudu kuṟumbu taṟumbade mikka śatru maṁ

p.s:
antu vikramārjunaṁ bilgoḷaluṁ bhīmasēnaṁ gadegoḷalu
māmpudaridupāṁśuvadhasuvadede keyge māḍuvuduttamapakṣamantumalladeyuṁ—

lg.l: ardharājyaharaṁ bhr̥tyaṁ yō na hanyātsa hanyatē

p.s: embudarthaśāstra sadbhāvaṁ—

endu tanna manadoḷoḍambaḍe nuḍida magana mātaṁ dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ
manadegoṇḍu—

endu duryōdhananaṁ bīḍiṅge pōgalvēḻdu pāṇḍavarayvarumaṁ barisi
dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ toḍeyanēṟisikoṇḍu duryōdhananappoḍe pollamānasanātanuṁ
nīmumondeḍeyoḷire kisuṟuṁ kalahamumenduṁ kundadadukāraṇaṁ gaṅgānadiya
dakṣiṇa taṭadoḷ vāraṇāvatamembudu poḻal kurujāṅgaṇa viṣayakke tiḷakamappaṁ
tirdudallige pōgi sukhamirimendoḍantegeyvemendu bīḻkoṇḍu bīḍiṅgevandu
gāṅgēya drōṇa kr̥pa vidurarkaḷgaṁ kuntigaṁ tadvr̥ttāntamanaṟipidarannegamitta
duryōdhananavara pōganaṟidu purōcananemba tanna manadannanappa pergaḍeyoḷ
lākṣāgr̥hōpāyamaṁ carcisi vāraṇāvatamanondē divasadoḷeydu vantāge
rathamaṁ samakaṭṭi nālku lakka balamaṁ nerambēḻdu kaḷipidanāgaḷ—

ā prastāvadoḷ maṅgaḷa pāṭhakara maṅgaḷa vr̥ttōccāraṇegaḷindaṁ
pāṇḍavarayvarumunmīlitanayanarāgi nityaniyamaṅgaḷaṁ nirvartisi maṅgaḷavasadanaṁ
goṇḍu mahābrāhmaṇar parasuva parakegaḷumanikkuva sēsegaḷumanāntukoḷuttuṁ
palavuṁ teṟada prayāṇa paṭahaṅgaḷeseye śubha lakṣaṇa lakṣitaṅgaḷappājānēya
kāmbhōja vājirājigaḷoḷ pūḍida divya rathaṅgaḷanēṟi divyabāṇāsana
bāṇapāṇigaḷāgi nijaparijanaṁ berasu gāṅgēya drōṇa kr̥pa vidurar kaḷiputtuṁ
bare purajanaṅgaḷellaṁ neredavara pōgiṅgaḻaldu sairisalāṟade—

lg.l: ḍḍenisi toḻalva pāṇḍavara pōginoḷunte beḍaṅgugeṭṭu ha

p.s: endu kaṇṇanīraṁ negape—

antu poḻalaṁ poṟamaḍe baḻiyane taguḷdu barpa tammoḍanāḍigaḷappa
mēḷadavada sabbavada nageya tegaḻinavaranemma baḻiyaṭṭidandu bannimendu priyaṁ
nuḍidirisi kiṟidantaraṁ bandondu tāvaregeṟeya modaloḷ nindu bhīṣma drōṇa
kr̥pa vidurarkaḷanemage takka buddhiyaṁ pēḻdu maguḻimene—

lg.l: naḍe pāṇḍuḍa pāḍeḍe pāḍiḍe pāḍuḍa pāṇḍusutaragalkege

p.s:
āgaḷ viduraṁ kelanaṟiyadantumavaraṟivantuṁ sāmānya sthitiyoḷe
baṭṭeya nañjina kircina desege karaṁ prayatnapararāgimendoḍante geyvemendavara
niralvēḻdu payaṇambōgi—

lg.l: poḷapane sairisadade kusuma daḷa sukumaṇḍaḷikasat samandaḷakamārar

p.s:
āgi tāvādigarbhēśvararappudaṟiṁ taḷardeḍeyeḍeya maraṅgaḷa toṟegaḷa
bāḍaṅgaḷa pesargaḷaṁ besagoḷuttuṁ mahāgrahāraṅgaḷa mahājanaṅgaḷa koṭṭa ponna
jannaviraṅgaḷumanavara parakeyumaṁ keykoḷuttumavarge bādheyāgadantu kāpaṁ
niyamisuttuṁ kālūrgaḷa gaṇḍara peṇḍira naḍeyuḍeya nuḍiya muḍiya gāmpiṅge
muguḷnage naguttumalligalligoḍeda keṟegamaḻidāyatanakkaṁ dhanamanittu
jīrṇōddhāraṅgaḷaṁ māḍisuttuṁ bīḍudāṇaṅgaḷoḷikkida baḷḷigāvaṇaṅgaḷoḷaṁ
naneya jompaṅgaḷoḷaṁ viśramisuttuṁ bandu—

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
varaprasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitāguṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
dvitīyāśvāsaṁ

div.head: tr̥tīyāśvāsaṁ

lg.l: ktōtōtoyadhiyoḷ paḍeda vīranuṟadarigaḷanānuḻu dariyaranādaviraṁ muḷidarinādaviraṁ muḷidariyaranā

p.s: ā poḻala poṟavoḻalaneyde varpāgaḷ—

lg.l: muttina raṅgavali miḷirva dugulada guḍi saṁ

p.s:
antāgaḷonduttaraṁ baḷeye sogayisuva poḻaloḷaṣṭaśōbheyaṁ māḍi
duryōdhanana saṅkētadoḷ munname samedirda purōcanaṁ gōrōcanā
siddārtha dūrvāṅkura mātuḷuṅga śr̥bhr̥ṅgāradarpaṇa pūrṇakaḷaśa kaḷamāvr̥ta
karapallaveghana kuca pallaveyarappa purandhriyaruṁ baddavaṇada paṟegaḷuṁ berasidirvandu meyyikki
poḍamaṭṭu pāṇḍavarumaṁ mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu bandu poḻalaṁ pugise pokku
bīḍanelli biḍuvamene nimmayyaṁ dhr̥tarāṣṭrana besadal munname māḍamaṁ
samediṭṭenallige bijayaṅgeyyimene—

tāne mundiṭṭoḍaṅgoṇḍu bandu pugise pāṇḍavarayvaruṁ kontiverasu
kiṟidānuṁ bēgamirdu dāna sanmānādigaḷiṁ santasambaḍisi purōcananaṁ bīḍiṅge
pōgalvēḻdu dharmaputranā maneyaṁ parīkṣisi nōḍaloḍamaṟidu nijānuja
sahitaṁ kontiverasēkāntadoḷintendaṁ—

adalladeyumatyādarassambhramamutpādayaśaṅkāsambhaḷivatiyembudī purōcananemba
būtu suyōdhanana besadiṁ namaginitādaraṁ geyvudellaṁ nammaṁ meḷpaḍisalende
māḍidaṁ nāmidanaṟiyadantu bēṇṭeya nevadoḷ baṭṭegaḷaṁ sōdisuvamendu
niccaṁ bēṇṭevōge purōcananuṁ peṟagaṇa kāpaṁ kaṇgāpi nale kādirpannegaṁ
vidurana viśvāsa dāsaṁtaṁ kanakanembaṁ bandu pāṇḍavaraṁ kaṇḍēkāntadoḷ viduranaṭṭida
vinnāṇaṅgaḷaṁ pēḻdu nambisi nīmentuṁ ballirante poṟamaṭṭu pōgimendumenduṁmembuduṁ jatugr̥ha kavāṭapuṭa sandhigaḷogaḷugaḷaḷ suraṅgamaṁ gaṅgeyoḷ mūḍuvantāge samedu
pēḻdu pōpuduṁ pāṇḍavaruṁ purōcanaṁ tammaṁ maṟudivasaṁ chidrisuvenenaluṁ
munnina divasamoḷagaṇa parijanamellamaṁ pārvaranūḍuva nevadoḷe poṟamaḍisi
sūryāstamayadoḷ pārvaranūḍi niṣāditiyemba bēḍitigamayvar
magandirgamuṇalikkidoḍe taṇiyuṇḍu beṇḍu maraldu maṟasulundida‌r
purōcananumā maneyoḷondōvariyoḷ maṟakendidanā prastāvadoḷardharātri
yādāgaḷ kontiverasayvarumaṁ munnamoyyanoyyane suraṅgadiṁ poṟamaḍisi
bhīmasēnaṁ purōcanaṁ maṟakendirdōvariyoḷ kiccaṁ koḷisaloḍaṁ—

āgaḷ bhīmasēnaṁ tanna taleyoḷaṁ meyyoḷaṁ karagi surivaragi nuriya
bambalgaḷaṁ posedu bidirdu kaḷedu suraṅgadoḷagaṇindame tannoḍavuṭṭidar kūḍe
vandanannegamittaṁ—

nōḍi rūpaṟiyalāgadantu karimurikanāgirda bēḍitiyumanavaḷayvar‌
makkaḷumaṁ kontiyuṁ pāṇḍavarumapparēnuṁ tappappillendu purapradhānarkaḷ
tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ pēḻdu dhr̥tarāṣṭaṅgaṁ pēḻalaṭṭidoḍe—

āgaḷ nadī tanūja bhāradvāja kr̥paraviraḷa bāṣpavāri durdina
dīnānanarāgire viduraṁ tānaṟidumaṟiyadante śōkākrāntanāgi dhr̥tarāṣṭrana
besadoḷ vāraṇāvatakke pōgi tadardha dagdha kaḷēvaraṅgaḷaṁ saṁskarisi jaḷadānādi
kriyegaḷaṁ māḍi maguḻe vandanannegamitta pāṇḍavar suraṅgadiṁ poṟamaṭṭu
tārāgaṇaṅgaḷ ninda neleyiṁ deseyaṁ poḻtumanaṟidu teṅka mogade
payaṇambōgi—

lg.l: adu madadanti danta musala pravibhagna mahāmahīruhā
spadamadu siṁhanāda janita pratiśabda mahā bhamahadbhamahādbhāyānaka
pradamadu nirjharōccaḷita śīkara śītaḷa vāta nartitō

p.s:
ā vanāntarāḷa madhyasthita viśāḷa vaṭa viṭapiyaneytandadaṟa keḻagayvaru
maniḻipidoḍadhvānapada pariśrama śrāntar nidrābharacaraṇacaralasa paravaśarāgire bhīmaṁ
jāvamirdu tannoḍavuṭṭidargāda pravāsāyāsaṅgaḷgaṁ desegaṁ manyumanaṁmaṁnumikku bare
kaṇṇa nīraṁ tumbi—

lg.l: bharatana vaṁśadoḷ negaḻda pāṇḍugevuṭṭiyumī samasta sā
sari kari kaṇṭha garjita mahāṭaviyoḷ maṟakendi nīmumī

p.s:
endu nuḍiyuttirpannegaṁ kōkanada bāndhavanudayācaḷaśikhara
śēkharanādanāgaḷā banamanāḷva hiḍimbanembanavara baravanaṟidu tanna taṅge
hiḍimbeyembaḷaṁ karedu—
embudumantegeyvenendu—

antondambuvīḍineḍeyoḷ kāmanambuvīḍivanambinimbiṅgoḷagāgi tāṁ kāma
rūpeyappudaṟiṁ divya kanyakāsvarūpamaṁ keykoṇḍu tannatta mogade barpaḷaṁ
kaṇḍu—

embannegamāke madanana keyyiṁ barduṅkidaralambu barpante bandu bhīma
sēnana keladoḷ kuḷḷire nīnārgēnembeyēke bandeyendūḍākeyendaḷeraḍaṟi
yadoldu ninnoḷeraḍaṁ nuḍiyalāgadenage yī banaṁ hiḍimbavanamembudidanāḷvaṁ
hiḍimbanembasuranemmaṇṇanānuṁ hiḍimbeyenembenātana besadiṁ nimminibarumaṁ—

endī maṟalundidarārgendoḍenna tāyvirumoḍavuṭṭidarendoḍe hiḍimbaṁ
bandavaraṁ tindoḍaṁ tinge nīnenna pegalanēṟu gaganataḷakkuyvenene bhīmasēnanā
mātiṅge muguḷage nakku—

lg.l: yaḻinuḍi barkeyakkeyalke ninna piriyaṇṇane paṇṇane nōḻpamātano

p.s:
kaṇḍu kaṇgaḷiṁḷoḷ keṇḍada taṇḍaṅgaḷumuriya taṇḍaṅgaḷuṁ sose
nīnorvayennoḷagēṁ kāduve ī maṟalundidaranettinibarumanormeye
posedu mukkuvenenesāhasa bhīmaṁ mallantigeyategeyatiyanappoḍaṁ saḍalisadavana
navayavadoḷintendaṁ—

embuduṁ hiḍimbanāḍambaraṅgeydu tumburukoḷḷiyatambarambaraṁ
siḍildu—

lg.l: kaḍupine pottu pāsaṟeyaneytare bhīmanumōtti kiḻtu bē
roḍane mahījamondaniḍeyuṁ biḍe poyyeyumā banaṁ paḍa
lvaḍutire kalloḷaṁ maradoḷaṁ baḍidoyyane jōldaṁ daityanaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷā kaḷakaḷakke maṟalundidayvarumeḻcattidēnendu besagoḷe
tadvr̥ttāntamellamanaṟipi hiḍimbe ḍambavillade bhīmasēnanoḷappoḍambaḍaṁ nuḍiye
kontiyuṁ dharmaputranumīke sāmānya vaniteyallivaḷ rākṣasa strīyendu
bhāvisalvēḍīkeyaṁ keykoḷvude kajjamendākegaṁ bhīmasēnaṅgaṁ gandharvavivāhamaṁ
māḍidoḍe hiḍimbe nīmilliralvēḍa parvatada mēle kaṟaṅgi kaḻtalisida maradu
ṟugala naḍuve sudhā dhavaḷitōttuṅga ramya harmyaṅgaḷaṁ kāṇbirappoḍadu
hiḍimbapuramembudemma puramallige pōpaṁ bannimendu mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu
pōgi mahāvibhūtiyiṁ poḻalaṁ pugisi tanna sampattumaṁ śrīyumaṁ meṟedu
majjana bhōjana tāmbūla lēpanaṅgaḷiṁ patha pariśramamellamaṁ kaḷedu
bhīmasēnanuṁ tānuṁ—
antu ramiyisi poḻalge maguḻdu bandoḍākegaṁ bhīmaṅgaṁ—

antu puṭṭuvudumīśvarakalpitadiṁ rākṣasarge sadyōgarbhamuṁ sadyaḥ
prasūtiyuṁ sadyōyauvanamumuḷḷa kāraṇadindāgaḷe ṣōḍaśa varṣada
kumāranāgire pāṇḍavarumalli mūṟu varuṣamirdu kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyanōpadēśa
dindēkacakrakke vōpa kajjamanāḷōcisi—

lg.l: barisi hiḍimbeyaṁ karedu sāre ghaṭōtkacanaṁ manōmudaṁ

p.s:
antu mecci tammutayvaruminnavu poḻalgaḷillī poḻalge nālku
yugadoḷaṁ vasumati padmanagaramēkacakraṁ bahudhānyamemba nālku pesarādudendu
manaṅgoṇḍu nōḍuttuṁ banda caturvēdapāragara maneya mundaṇa catuśyāle
yoḷ bīḍaṁ biṭṭu dharāmara vēṣadoḷondu varuṣa mirpannegamondu
divasaṁ—

āgaḷ sandhyāvandanege dharmaputrārjuna nakula sahadēvar
pōdarannegamitta bīḍinoḷirda kontiya bhīmana karṇōpāntadoḷ—

lg.l: sāreyoḷaḻva mahā dvijabare tadvijayoḷaḷuva mahā dvijayoḷaḷuva mahā dvija

p.s:
adaṁ kēḷdēnānumondu kāraṇamāgalevēḻkumī puyyalanāraydu
barpenendu bhīmananirisi konti tāne pōgi—

lg.l: aḻeḻiḷi kuḍalāda kūsu neladoḷ poraḷuttire dharmapatni bā
yaḻidu koralge pāydu paridāḍuva bālakanāda śōkadiṁ
gaḻagaḻa kaṇṇanīr suriye cintipa pārvana śōkadondu poṁ
puḻiyane nōḍi nāḍe karuṇaṁ tanagāgire konti cinteyiṁ

p.s:
ninagintī piridu śōkamentādudembudamā pārvaṁ kontigintendaṁ
bakanembanorvasuranī poḻala teṅkaṇa beṭṭadoḷirpanātaṅge niccamondu
maneyoḷeraḍemmevōṟiyoḷ pūḍida pannirkaṇḍugadakkiyakūḻumanadarke takka
parikaramumanorva mānasaṁ koṇḍu pōpanantātaṁ berasadellamaṁ tindu taṇiyade
pallaṁ timbanadondu divasaṁ tappidoḍī poḻalanitumaṁ timbaṁ nāḷina bāriyemma
mēle bandudemma maneyoḷānumemma dharmapatniyuṁ maganuṁ magaḷumintī
nālvare mānasaremma peṇḍatiyapārvantiyanīvenappoḍākeyiṁ baḻiyimī kūsugaḷaṁ
naḍapuvarilla magaḷanīvenappoḍe koḍagūsembudu peṟaroḍave magananīvenappoḍe
santaticchēdamuṁ piṇḍacchēdamumakkumadaṟindennane kuḍalvēḻkumembuduṁ
kontiyintendaḷ—

embuduṁ pārvanintenalvēḍa makkaḷoḷāda mōhamellā jīvakkaṁ
samānamembuduṁ nīmaṟiyirusiradirimadarke takka savakaṭṭaṁ māḍimendu bandu
tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ bhīmasēnaṅgaṟipidoḍe nāḷinuṇisanenage dorekoḷisi bandudu
karamoḷḷitāytendubandu karamoḷḷikeydirendu nagutirpannegaṁ mattina nālvaruṁ bandu tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ
kēḷdu namagī poḻaloḷondu parōpakārārthaṁ saypiniṁ dorekoṇḍudendi
ruḷellaṁ bakana paḍemātane nuḍiyuttirpannegaṁ—

āgaḷ sāhasabhīmaṁ tanna sāhasamaṁ tōṟalendu bandu pārvana maneya
mundaṇa baṇḍiya kūḻaṁ keykoṇḍu nilvuduṁ pārvantiyuṁ pārvanuṁ parasi
sēseyanikki kaḷipe poḻaliṁ baṇḍiyanaṭṭikoṇḍu rakkasanirdeḍegeytandu—

antu tanna tanda baṇḍiya kūḻellamaṁ patteṇṭu tuttinoḷe sameye
tuttuvudaṁ kaṇḍu rakkasanivana pāṅgaṁ meccalāṟenennumanintu sameye tuttugumendu
bakaṁ bakavēṣadiṁ peṟagaṇa desege mellanōsarisi bandu—
antu poydoḍe poḍeseṇḍaṁ poydante mēgogedu seṇase—

lg.l: bāriyaniṭṭu kūḍe poḻalaṁ tave tindananārtarillaṇaṁpe bāḻtegellaruṁvārttegillāruṁvārte diṭṭaruṁ
bārisalārumin javanabārisalāñjavaṁbārisalāṁ javaṁ bāriyoḷikkuvenendu parve bhō
rbhōrene bīse tadvadana gahvaradiṁ bisunettaruṇme bhō

p.s:
antu kondu nīlagiriyane piḍideḻevante rakkasana kariya piriyoḍalaneḻedu
tandu poḻala naḍuvikkidāgaḷ poḻalellaṁ cōdyambaṭṭu baddavaṇada paṟegaḷaṁ
poysi sāhasabhīmana sāhasamanaḷavallade pogaḻdu tammāḷdanumaniṣṭa daivamumaṁ
koṇḍāḍuvantayvarumaṁ koṇḍāḍe kelavu divasamirpannegamondu divasama śisaṁ śiśira kiraṇanapara jalanidhi taṭanudayagiri taṭa nikaṭavartiyādanāgaḷorva pārvaṁ vistīrṇa
jīrṇa karpaṭāvr̥ta kaṭitaṭanumāgi bandu kaṇmuccaleḍevēḍe tanagavar‌ pāsalkoṭṭa
kr̥ṣṇājinamaṁ pāsipaṭṭirdanaṁ dharmaputranāva nāḍiṁ bandirellige pōdapi
rendoḍuttarāpathada hastinanāpuradiṁ bandemendoḍalli pāṇḍavara paḍe mātāvudu
dhr̥tarāṣṭra suyōdhanarirpandamāvudendu besagoḷe—

lg.l: nanadoḷ maḻgidarennaḷmunidar‌ tīṟidarḷmuḷigirdennayamaggidananadoḷ puṇyamaṟiyar vēmāṟa(?)rinnāro bē
dhananāḷuttire sanda hastinapuraṁ santaṁ basantaṁ karaṁ

p.s:
adalladeyuṁ yajñasēnanemba modala pesara pāñcāḷadēśadarasaṁ
drupadanembaṁ drōṇanoḷāda paribhavamaṁ nenedātanaṁ kolvannanorva maganumaṁ
vikramārjunaṅge peṇḍatiyappannaḷorva magaḷumaṁ paḍedalladirenendu pūṇdu
pōgi payōvratanemba divya munipatiyiṁ putrakāmēṣṭi geyse hōmakuṇḍadalli
dhagadhagisuva jvālāmālegaḷoḷ kiḻtabāḷumattaparamumabhēdya kavacamuṁ
berasogeda dhr̥ṣṭadyumnanemba maganumaṁ jvāḷāmāḷiniyogevantogeda kr̥ṣṇeyemba
magaḷumaṁ paḍedanā hōmāgniyoḷ puṭṭidondu divya cāpamumaydu divya
śaramoḷavā billanēṟisi ā saralgaḷindātana maneya munde nabhadoḷ
nalinalivaridāḍuva jantrada mīnaneccanumākege gaṇḍanakkumendādēśamantappa
sāhasapuruṣaṁ vikramārjunanallade peṟarillembaradaṟindinnu pāṇḍavaroḷaremba
mātugaḷaṁ buddhiyoḍeyarārānuṁ nuḍivar‌ drupadanumīgaḷā kūsiṅge
sayambaramaṁ māḍalendu neladoḷuḷḷarasumakkaḷellargaṁ baḻiyanaṭṭidoḍe
duryōdhanādigaḷ modalādanēka dēśādhīśvararellaṁ chatravatiyembudu drupadana
poḻalā poḻalge vandirdarānallindaṁ bandenendu pēḻe tadvr̥ttāntamellamaṁ
kēḷdu tammoḷāḷōcisi—

endu niścayisi tamma bageda bageyoḷ parāśaramunīndrōpadēśa
moḍambaḍe pāṇḍavarēkacakradiṁ poṟamaṭṭu śakunaṅgaḷellamuttarōttaraṁ
tirduvinamuttarābhimukharāgi payaṇaṁ bōgi kelavānuṁ divasakke yamunānadī
taṭanikaṭavartiyappaṅgadaparṇagāravarṇagādaparṇṇagādarppaṇa venembaḍaviyoḷagane barevare dinakarabimbāmbuja
mambara sarōvaradiṁ pattuviḍuvuduṁ kavida kaḻtaleyagurvāge tamōpaśamana
nimittamuriva koḷḷiyaṁ piḍidu jaguneyaṁ pāyvāgaḷā banamanāḷva
kubēranāyakanaṅgadaparṇaravaṇnadarppaṇanemba gandharvaṁ jaḷakrīḍeyāḍutirdanibariṁ munde
barpa vikramārjunana pādābhighātadoḷuccaḷisuva nīra sappuḷumaṁ kēḷdu piḍida
koḷḷiya beḷagumaṁ kaṇḍu beḷagaṁ kaṇḍa pataṅgadante māṇadeytandu—

antu tāgi bāgidantāgi gandharvaṁ kontiverasaṟuvarumaṁ tanna
bīḍiṅgoḍagoṇḍoydati prītiyiṁ birdanikki—

ittoḍivannegamemagāgirkendu priyaṁ nuḍidaṅgadaparṇaravaṇnaṁnaniravēḻdu
mārtāṇḍōdayame nijōdayamāge payaṇambōgi—

antu tadviṣaya viḷāsinige piḍida kanakacchatradante sogayisuva chatravatīpurada
poṟavoḻalaneytarpāgaḷ—

lg.l: pāḍuva tumbi kōḍuva puḻil naḍapāḍuva rājahaṁse baṁ

p.s: antu nōḍuttuṁ barevare—

lg.l: rmodale payōdhimanthana mahāravamaṁ gele taḷta baṇṇava

p.s: antu nōḍuttuṁ meccuttuṁ barevare—

lg.l: ī trijagaṅgaḷoḷ negaḻda peṇḍirumaṁ gelevanda padmanī

p.s:
antu sogayisuva poḻalaṁ pokkelliyuṁ bīḍu biḍaleḍevaḍeyadondu
bhārgavaparṇaśāleyoḷeḍemāḍikoṇḍu brahmalōkamirpantirda brahmasabheyoḷage
dēva brāhmaṇarāgirdarannegaṁ drupadanittal—

lg.l: tna racitamāge māḍisi sayambarasālesayambara śālesvayambaraśāleyanōḷiyiṁ narē
berasida baṇṇadoḷ meṟeye kaṭṭisi puṭṭisi raṅgabhūmiyaṁ

p.s:
ā neleya caupaḷigegaḷoḷanēka prāsādada mēle citrada paḻavigegaḷaṁ
tuṟugaluṁ bambalgaḷumāge kaṭṭisi pacceya hārada tōraṇaṅgaḷaṁ dugulada
guḍigaḷaṁ kaṭṭisi kambhaṅgaḷoḷellaṁ suyyāṇada cinnada paḻiya sakaḷayesakadavaṭṭegaḷaṁ
suttisi muttina maṇḍavigegaḷaneḍeyaṟidettisi ponna māṅgāya goñcalgaḷumaṁ
muttina bumbhukaṅgaḷumaneḻale kaṭṭisi mattamā prāsādaṅgaḷa caupaḷigegaḷa ponna
poṅgaṟigeṟigerege nīḷpuṁ beḷpumaṁ tāḷdi karpinoḷupāśrayambaḍedu—

lg.l: yteṟagida māvugaḷa beḷeda kauṅgina gone ta

p.s: āgi maṟudivasaṁ nēsaṟ mūḍe—
āgaḷ drupadaṁ tanna purakkamantaḥpurakkaṁ parivārakkaṁ—

antu meṟedu kūsaṁ neṟeye keygeysimendu munnaṁ keyge ysutirda
taṟada guṟugeysi tarpa...ysi tappa tarada guḍigeysi tappu karida guṟugeysi tappu tareda guregeyarappantaḥpura purandhriyaraṁ karedu pēḻvudumantegeyvemendu—
endu neṟeye pasadanaṅgoḷisi—

lg.l: tuḍisadesida hāramaṁmuṁdiṁ moleya biṇpinoḷaṁ naḍu baḷkidappudī
biḍu kaṭisūtramaṁ toḍeya biṇpu padāmburuhakke tiṇṇamēṁ

p.s:
endendōrorvarākeya rūpaṁ vakrōktiyoḷe pogaḻdu maṅgaḷa
vasadanamikkiyuṁ posa madavaḷigeyappudaṟiṁ tuḍisalevēḻkumendu neṟeye
pasadanaṅgoḷise—

antu neṟeye pasadanaṅgoḷisi biḍumuttina sēseyanikki tāygaṁ tandegaṁ
poḍamaḍisi—

endu parasi kanatkanaka khacitamuṁ mauktika stambhamumappa sarvatōbhadramemba
sivigeyanēṟisi cāmarada kuñcadaḍapada ḍavakeya vāra viḷāsiniyareraḍuṁ keladoḷ
suttiṟidu baḷasi bare talevaridōjeya piḍiyanēṟi peṇḍavāsadoḷveṇḍir baḷasi
bare taḷtu piḍida kanaka padmada sīgurigaḷa neḻaleḍevaṟiyade bare drupadanuṁ
dhr̥ṣṭadyumnanuṁ muttina māṇikada maṇḍanāyōgaṅgaḷoḷ neṟeye paṇṇida
madāndha gandhasindhuraṅgaḷanēṟi bare munde pariva dhavaḷacchatra candrāditya
pāḷikētanādi rājya cihnaṅgaḷu moḻaguva maṅgaḷa tūryaṅgaḷeseye peṟapeṟagane
draupadi śr̥ṅgāra sāgarame mēredappi barpante bare—
āgaḷ—

lg.l: nuḍiye kelar nōḍadante nōḍe kelar pā

p.s:
āgaḷ pāṇḍavar tammaṁ peṟaraṟiyadantu brāhmaṇavēṣadoḷe
brahmasabheyoḷ bandire—

lg.l: iḷeyoḷudagra vīra bhaṭa tuṅga mataṅgaja vāji rāji cau
paḷigegaḷoḷ dharādhara dhurandhara bandhura rājakaṁ viya
ttaḷadoḷanēka kimpuruṣa kinnara khēcara siddha br̥ndama
vvaḷisire mūṟu lōkamane pōltudu mūneleyiṁ svayambaraṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ vidita vr̥ttānteyāgi draupadiya keladoḷirda sundaramāleyemba
cēṭi—

lg.l: na nijāṁsārpita lambahāranavabāhuvanā pāṇḍyaṁ manaṅgoṇḍu ni

p.s:
mattitta bīsuva cāmaraṅgaḷa poḷapinoḷamettida beḷgoḍegaḷa beḷpinoḷaṁ
desegaḷellaṁ dhavaḷisidannavāge pogaḷute varpavara saraṅgaḷoḷaṁ pāḍuva
pāṭhakāṟariñcaraṅgaḷoḷellaṁ digbhittigaḷ tekkane tīve maṇimaya pīṭhada mēle
kālanavaṣṭambhadiṁ nīḍi—

lg.l: ydila kāvaṁ tiruputtu moṁdanamādamamoḍanamōdananibar tammandiraṁ tannera
ḻkeladoḷ bandire nōḍi sōltu ninagā gēyakke sōltantevōl

p.s:
mattitta miñcaṁntaMkaṭṭimeḍaṟidante suttiṟida kālgāpina kaḍitaleya baḷasidagaṇya
paṇyāṅganā janada naḍuve maṇimaya pīṭhaṅgaḷanēṟi—
endu kiṟidantaraṁ pōgi—

lg.l: dbhrānta samīraṇōtthita viśāḷa viḷōḷa taraṅga rēkhe pa

p.s:
antu neredarasumakkaḷārumaṁ meccade maguḻevare drupadanidaṟoḷella
mēniṁ hōmāgni sambhavamappa divya cāpamanēṟisiyumīyaydu
śaradoḷākāśadoḷ‌ nalidu poḷeyuttirpa jantrada mīnanisalārpoḍe
bandēṟisiyumeccu gellaṅgoṇḍenna magaḷaṁ maduveyappudembudumāmāme
billanēṟisidapevendenibarānumarasumakkaḷ bandu—
mūṟu sūḻ balavandu poḍamaṭṭu—

āgi pōgi karṇana mogamaṁ nōḍidoḍe karṇanāḷdana siggāda mogamaṁ
kaṇḍu—

antā billaṁ piḍidavarellaṁ billumbeṟagumāgi siggāgi pōgi
tantammirpeḍe yoḷire pāñcāḷa rājanī neredarasumakkaḷoḷārumī billa
nēṟisalārtarillamī janavaḍeyoḷārānumī billanēṟisalārpoḍe bannimendu
sāṟuvuduṁ—

antu poṟamaḍuvarātikālānalanaṁ kaṇḍu kaḍḍuvanda doḍḍakaṇḍuvanda doddarellaṁ
musuṟi—

endu bāyge vandudane nuḍiye raṅgabhūmiya naḍuve nindu divya
cāpakke poḍavaṭṭadanavayavadineḍageyyoḷettikoṇḍu tanna bageda kajjamaṁ
golegoḷisuvantā billa goleyanēṟe nūṅki—

lg.l: dese kampaṅgoḷe koṇḍu divya śaramaṁ karṇādigaḷ kaṇḍu be

p.s:
āgaḷā piḍida billekarbinabillāgeyumambugaḷe pūvinambugaḷāgeyu
mecca mīnemīnakētanamāgeyuṁ sahajamanōjanaṁ manōjanende bagedu—

lg.l: naḍe kaḍegaṇ manaṁ bayase taḷtamardappale tōḷgaḷāseyoḷ
taḍeyade nīḍe māṇade guṇārṇavanaṁ sati māle sūḍidaḷ

p.s:
āgaḷ drupadaṁ baddhavaṇada paṟegaḷaṁ bājisalvēḻdu suratamakaradhvajanaṁ
draupadiyoḍane sivigeyanēṟisi dhr̥ṣṭadyumna yudhāmanyūttamaujaśśikhaṇḍi
cēkitānaremba tanna magandiruṁ tammandiruṁ berasu nelaṁ mūriviṭṭante bare
mundiṭṭu poḻalgoḍagoṇḍuvarpudumitta duryōdhanaṁ karṇa śalya śakuni
duśśāsanādigaḷoḷālōcisi pēḻimēgeyvamene karṇanintendaṁ—

lg.l: binamēṁ pōpame nāḍa kūṭakuḷigaḷgēdōsamēṁmeṁ banna monmen

p.s: ene śalyanintendaṁ—

endu keḷardu nuḍidu sayambarake neredarasumakkaḷellaranutsāhisimutsāhisimuttāḍisi nōḍe
nōḍe—

lg.l: tekkane tīvi banduvu rathaṁ puliviṇḍuvolādaḷurke kai

p.s: antu nelaṁ mūriviṭṭante taḷardu—

lg.l: kara karigaḷ teṟamboḷeva mīṅgaḷanuḷkuva kaidugaḷ nirā
karisire mēredappi kavidattu narādhipa sainya sāgaraṁ

p.s:
antu kavida ripubaḷa jaḷanidhiya kaḷakaḷa ravamaṁ kēḷdu poḻalaṁ pugalollade
ninda manujamāndhātanaṁ pāñcāḷarājanintendaṁ—

lg.l: dhanuvaṁ nīṁ tegedeccu mīnanaḷavaṁ keykoṇḍudarkaṁ karaṁ
ninagī kannike sōltudarkamerdeyoḷ kōpāgni kaigaṇme baṁ

p.s:
embudumarāti kāḷānaḷanidarkēnuṁ cintisalvēḍa nīmenna kāḷegamaṁ
peṟagirdu nōḍimendu tānuṁ bhīmasēnanuṁ divyaśarāsanaṅgaḷaṁ koṇḍu pūṇe
puguvarāti balamaṁ mārkoṇḍu tege neṟedise—

lg.l: saraḷa podaḷda balsariya kōḷgiralāṟade bil teraḷdu du

p.s:
āgaḷ karṇanārṇavaninādadindārdu guṇārṇavanoḷ bandu tāgi
śalyaṁ bhīmasēnanoḷ tāgi kiṟiduṁ poḻtu kāde—

lg.l: aridu gelalke pārvana śarāsana vidyeyanendu nondu ni
ttarisade pārvanoḷ kalahamāgadu ciḥ doreyaltidendu bhā

p.s:
āgaḷā balada naḍuvirda nārāyaṇaṁ baladēvaṅge suṭṭitōṟi
bhīmārjunarkaḷivaramōghamapparendavara sāhasakke mecci santasambaṭṭirdāgaḷuḻi
darasumakkaḷellaṁ karṇa śalyar‌ mogandiridudaṁ kaṇḍu manaṅgeṭṭu—

āgaḷ vikrāntatuṅgaṁ billa koppina mēle keyyanūṟi muguḷnage naguttuṁ
pāñcāḷarājatanūjegintendaṁ—

embannegaṁ drupadaṁ bandavar pāṇḍavarappudumaṁ tannaḷiyaṁ
vikramārjunanappudumaṁ tappilladaṟidu mahāvibhūtiyiṁ poḻalaṁ pugisi—

lg.l: ttaḷise vicitra kētutatigaḷ miḷirdāḍe purāṅganā janaṁ
gaḷa jaya jīyamāna ravamikkuva sēse manōnurāgamaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ drupadaṁ pacceya nelagaṭṭinoḷaṁ rājāvartada kambadoḷaṁ pavaḷada
janteyoḷaṁ padmarāgada bōdigeyoḷamindranīlada bhadradoḷaṁ karkētanada
jāḷarigeyoḷaṁ paḷukina citrabhittiyoḷaṁ candrakāntada candraśāleyoḷamoppuva
vivāha gēhamaṁ sameyisiyadaṟa naḍuvaṇārdra mr̥ttikā viracitamappa
caturāntaradoḷ muttina caukada naḍuvaṇa cembonna paṭṭavaṇeya mēgaṇa dugulada
paseyoḷ guṇārṇavananā drupadajeyanoḍane kuḷḷirisi hita purōhita
prājyājyāhuti huta hutavaha samakṣadoḷ keynīreṟedu pāṇigrahaṁ geyse—

lg.l: iḍidire mañjinoḷ tuṟugi teṅkaṇa gāḷiyoḷāda sōṅkinoḷ

p.s:
antorvarorvara kiṟu kuṇikegaḷaṁ piḍidu ratiyuṁ kāmadēvanuṁ
barpante bēḷveya koṇḍada modalge vandu kanakagiriyaṁ balagoḷva pataṅga
dampatiyantāpadambareyantāpataṅgana pimbarivantā dampatigaḷ saptārciyaṁ mūṟu sūḻ balavandu
nindimbaḻiyamāke purōhitana pēḻdōjeyoḷ lājeyanagni kuṇḍadoḷ
suridu—

lg.l: adaṟa podaḷdu nīḷda pogeyaṁ luḷitāḷakeki tanna vaktra pa

p.s:
antu sogayise pāḍuva maṅgaḷaravaṅgaḷumōduva r̥cegaḷuṁ parasuva
parakegaḷumeseye paseyoḷirdu—

lg.l: sarisuva hāramaṁ piḍidu nōḍuva kaṭṭida nūla toṅgalaṁ
tiripuva keytadondu nevadiṁ lalitāṅgiya śaṅkeyaṁ bhayaṁ
berasida nāṇumaṁ kramade piṅgisu bēsaṟadir guṇārṇavā

p.s: endu keladoḷirda daṇḍurumbegaḷ buddhivēḻe—

lg.l: kānte podaḷda nāṇa bharadindadharīkr̥ta candrabimba sa
ḻdante kadampinoḷ poḷeduvākeya hāra marīci mālegaḷ

p.s: antoppuva vivāha maṅgaḷadosageyoḷ maṅgaḷa pāṭhakareḻdu nindirdu—

endu maṅgaḷa vr̥ttaṅgaḷanōde kiṟidumbēgamirdettida bōnadoḷ
kalyāṇāmr̥tāhāramanārōgisi baḻiyaṁ yakṣakardamada keygaṭṭiyoḷ keyyaṁ
timirdu tambulamaṁ koṇḍu—
ā prastāvadoḷ—

lg.l: bēsaṟe lōkamaṁ taguḷdu suṭṭaḻalinde kharāṁśu nārakā
dhyā samayātta rakta ruci piṅge baḻikkudayādriyoḷ padaṁ
gāsida ponna puñjiyavolirdudu kaṇge himāṁśu maṇḍalaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ drupadaṁ nijāntaḥpura parivāraṁ berasudāramahēśvaranalligōlagakke
vandu nr̥tya vādya gītātōdyaṅgaḷoḷ kiṟiduṁ bēgamirdōlagamumaṁ
pareyalvēḻdu mattina nālvargaṁ kontigu bēṟevēṟe māḍaṅgaḷaṁ bīḍuvēḻdu
guṇārṇavanaṁ sejjege bijayaṅgeyyimene kāmaṁ kaḷanēṟuvante sejjeyanēṟi
seḍedirdanallaḷaṁ nōḍi—

lg.l: kūṭa sukhaṅgaḷaṁ paḍedanēṁ caduraṁ gaḷa baddedallaḻaṁ

p.s:
antā yiruḷa nālku jāvamuṁ kāmana jāgaradantavarge kendinoḷe
beḷagāge—

lg.l: rmana maṟigaḷ karaṁ palavumaṁseṟepeṟageydevinivendu tamma na
ṇpinoḷavanoppipante muguḷoḷ maṟasundida tumbi pāṟe kō

p.s: antu mārtāṇḍanuṁ pracaṇḍamārtāṇḍanumuditōditarāge—

lg.l: na caḷaccāmara vāta pīta nija gharmāmbhaḥkaṇaṁ draupadī

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
vara prasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitāguṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjunavijayadoḷ
draupadī kalyāṇa varṇanaṁ
tr̥tīyāśvāsaṁ

div.head: caturthāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
antu drupadana poḻaloḷ pāṇḍavar cāgakke būtuṁ bhōgakke poḻtuṁ
neṟeyadenisi sukhasaṅkathā vinōdadiṁ rājyaṁ geyyuttirpannegamittal—

lg.l: dhuradoḷ karṇananāntu geldavanavaṁ sandarjunaṁ taḷtu saṁ

p.s: emba mātaṁ dhr̥tarāṣṭra duryōdhanādigaḷ kēḷdu billumbeṟagumāgi—

embuduṁ bhīṣma drōṇādigaḷ niścita mantrarāgi viduranaṁ
karedāḷōcisi pr̥thātanūjaraṁ ninna balla māḻkeyiṁ nuḍidoḍaṅgoṇḍu barpu
dendu pēḻdaṭṭuvudumātanante geyvenendu rathārūḍhanāgi pāñcāḷa rājapurakke
vandu pāṇḍuputraraṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: adu piriduṁ pramādamaduvuṁ kururājanināytu pōytu saṁ
ḷduvudaneḷeyaṁ manaṁ basade barpudu nīmene pōpa kajjamaṁ

p.s:
ātana baḻivaḻigoṭṭa madakari karēṇu jātyaśva śaśitāśaśitōsasitōrahāra vastugaḷaṁ
keykoṇḍu drupadajeyanoḍagoṇḍu drupadananiravēḻdu katipaya prayāṇaṅgaḷiṁ
madagajapuramaneyde vandāgaḷ—

lg.l: ghana pathamaṁ paḷañcaleva saudha cayaṅgaḷināḍutirpa kē
ghana ravamenderutigettu nartisuva kēkigaḷiṁ kaḍu rayyamappa ha

p.s:
āgaḷā poḻala bīdigaḷoḷellaṁ gandhōdaka pañcagavyaṅgaḷaṁ taḷiyisi
guḍiyaṁ tōraṇaṅgaḷumaṁ tuṟugaluṁ bambalumāge kaṭṭisi dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ
duryōdhana karṇa śalya śakuni nadītanūja bhāradvāja kr̥pādigaḷverasidirvandu
yathōcita pratipattigaḷindayvarumaṁ nibiḍāliṅganaṅgeydu mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu
vandu poḻalaṁ pugisi munname sameda bīḍugaḷoḷ bīḍaṁ biḍisi sūḻsūḻoḷe
birdanikki vividha vinōdaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟi kelavu divasamirdu drōṇa bhīṣma kr̥pa
vidurarkaḷ tammoḷālōcisi enna naḍapidudarkaṁ kūrtudarkaṁ pāṇḍuputrarge
nelanaṁ paccukoṭṭu paṭṭamaṁ kaṭṭuvenene duryōdhananēgeydumoḍambaḍadire
bhīṣmar munidu—

lg.l: nuḍiyadiraṇṇa ninna nuḍigāṁ taḍedirpene pēḻ suyōdhanā

p.s:
adalladeyuṁ pāṇḍuputrarappoḍe pāṇḍurājaṅge besakeyyadudanenage
besakeyvarennendudaṁ mīṟuvarallarānavarge paṭṭamaṁ kaṭṭi nelanaṁ paccukoḍu
vāgaḷaḍḍaṁ barpa gaṇḍaraṁ nōḻpenendu bhīṣmar baggisidoḍe duryōdhananati
sambhramākuḷitanāgi nīmendudanendu bāḻvenendoḍappudendu—

lg.l: dharaṇī nārige pāṇḍuviṁ baḻiyamillāruṁ peṟar gaṇḍaraṁ
kkarasaṁ dharmajanakkumendu nayadiṁ niścaisi kalyāṇa kā

p.s:
kaṭṭi sētubandhamaṁ tāge gaṅgānadiya teṅkaṇa paḍuvaṇa nelanaṁ nīmāḷvudu
mūḍaṇa baḍagaṇa nelanaṁ duryōdhananāḷvudendu dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ pūrva sthitiyoḷ
paccukoṭṭu duryōdhananappoḍe pollamānasaṁ nīmuṁ tāmundeḍeyoḷire
kisuruṁ kalahamumenduṁ kundadadu kāraṇadindilligaṟuvattu yōjanadoḷindraprastha
membudu poḻalallige pōgi sukhadiṁ rājyaṅgeyyuttirimembudumante geyvemendu
samasta parivāra parivr̥tarāgi—

lg.l: toḍardopputtire lakṣmi danti turagaṁ śrī divyakāntājanaṁ
ḷaviraḷa kusumāvaḷi kampuvēvīṟe sogayipa kiṟu miḍigaḷoḷoppi tōṟe
lavaṇābdhiye baḷasidudenisuvagaḻa baḷasesedire kōṇṭeya celvu pogaḻa
laridenisire negedudu nabhamaneyde miḷirva patākāvaḷi divamaneyde
baḷasida kembonna madilgaḷoḷage maṇimaya bhavanāvaḷi toḷagi beḷage
rasa rasada bāvi mane manege bēṟe kisugalgaḷa rajada kaṇiverasu tōṟe
paradara pārvara sūḷeyara manegaḷavu dhanadana maneyumanēḻipa manegaḷavu
poḻala beḍaṅgaṁ mecci mecci nōḍi divijēndra viḷāsadoḷintu kūḍi
sūsuva śēṣākṣatamaṁ samantu piriduṁ mana santasadindamāntu
maṇi kanaka rajata vastugaḷanittu bēḍida nāḍugaḷanavayavadindadittu mittu
kari turaga balaṅgaḷ pebercuvantu maleyuṁ maṇḍalamuṁ bercuvantu
koṇḍāḍuva nālvarumanujaroḷage negaḻdarigana tējame toḷagi beḷage
nelanaṁ pratipālisi dharmasūnu sukhamirdaṁ ripubaḷa timira bhānu

p.s:
antajātaśatru śatrupakṣa kṣayakara karavāḷa daṁṣṭrābhīḷa bhujaṅga mūrti
viśva viśvambharādhāramappabhāranapparikēsariya tōḷvaladoḷ rājyaṁ geyyutirpannegaṁ
vikrāntatuṅganondeḍeyoḷirpiraviṅgummaḷisi digaṅganā mukhāvalōkanaṁ
geyyal bagedu—

lg.l: riṇiyaṁ tāṁ pōgi bāykēḷisade munijanakkiṣṭiṣṭappa vighnaṅgaḷaṁ dā
ruṇa daityar māḍe nīḍillade sale caladāṭandu kondikkadorvaṁ

p.s: endu vijigīṣuvr̥ttōdyuktanāgal bagedu—

lg.l: aṟipidoḍenna pōganiniyaḷge manaṁ maṟukakke nīḷda ka
lgeṟagire pōgu kegeṭṭapudu mōhamayaṁ nigaḷaṁ kaḷatrameṁ
daṟipade naṭṭiruḷ maṟedu sārcida nallaḷa taḷta tōḷgaḷaṁ

p.s:
mellamellane pattuviḍisi tanna toṭṭa divyābharaṇaṅgaḷellamaṁ kaḷedu divya
śaradhigaḷaṁ bigidukoṇḍu divyacāpamaṁ piḍidu prathama caḷita dakṣiṇa caraṇanāgi
nija nivāsadiṁ poṟamaṭṭu khāṇḍava prasthadinduttarābhimukhanāgi
kāmyakavanadoḷagane nīlaparvatada mēgane pōgi—

lg.l: sogayise pāydudintiduve bandhura kūṭa kuḷaṁ himācaḷaṁ
vilasatkallōla nādaṁ negaḻdire nija kūṭāgradoḷ pāyva gaṅgā
jaladiṁ mūrdhābhiṣēkōnnati nile camarī lōla lāṅgūla mālā
vali vikṣēpaṅgaḷiṁ taccamararuha mahāśōbhe kaigaṇme viśvā
cala cakrēśatvamaṁ tāḷdidudakhiḷa dharā ramya haimācaḷēdraṁ

p.s: endu mecci—

ene sogayisuva gaṅgādvāradoḷ munijanaṅgaḷa bēḷvegaḷgupadravaṅgeyva
niśāṭa kōṭiyaṁ niśita śarakōṭiyindamuccāṭisi kelavu divasamirdalli paḍemecce
gaṇḍana gaṇḍagāḍiyaṁ kaṇḍu phaṇīndrana kanne madanalateyemba nāgakanne
kaṇbēṭaṅgoṇḍu tanna lōkakkoḍagoṇḍu pōgal
ī bhāgavu gha. pratiyalli mātravide.—

endu nāgakanne nāgalōkada viḷāsaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟuttuṁ tanna keḻagaḷageṇa
nāgavimānakke vandu nāgakanneyaruṁ tānuṁ manambugisuvante majjanambugisi
rasarasāyanaṅgaḷanūḍuvante divyāhāraṅgaḷanūḍi—

lg.l: nnāgada bāsigaṁ bageda baṇṇada puṭṭige nāgajālameṁ

p.s:
antākeya mudduverasida todaḷnuḍigaṁ pūmāḷeverasida baḻalmuḍiga
malampuverasida nōṭakkamimbuverasida kūṭakkaṁ puruḍuverasida koṅkiṅgaṁ kaddavaṇigaddavaṇe (?) verasida sōṅkiṅgaṁ gāḍiverasida hāvakkaṁ nāṇverasida bhāvakkamoldu
moṟaldumireyire dēvēndraṅgamindrāṇigaṁ jayantanentante—

antu puṭṭuvudumātana bālakrīḍeyumākeya surata krīḍeyuṁ tanna
nōṭakkaṁ kūṭakkaṁ sogayise kelavu divasamirdalliṁ poṟamaṭṭu bandu
himavadgirīndra taṭa nikaṭavartigaḷappagastya vaṭamuṁ vasiṣṭhaparvataṅgaḷemba
tīrthaṅgaḷoḷōlāḍuttumā diśābhāgamanātmīya śāsanāyattaṁ māḍuttuṁ
bandindubimbavigaḷadamr̥tabindu durdinārdra candanānvitamumaśiśira kara ratha
turaga khura śikhara nikhaṇḍita lavaṅga pallavamumairāvata karalūna sallakī śabaḷa
mukaḷabamubaḷamudaḷamumappudayagiriyiṁ sogayisuva mūḍaṇa desege vandu nandeyaparanandeyaśvini
mahānandeyemba tīrthajalaṅgaḷoḷōlāḍuttumudvr̥tta ripu nr̥patigaḷa
nēsāḍuttumalliṁ taḷardu capaḷa kapibaḷa vilupta vigaḷita latābhavanamumadhika
baḷa naḷa karataḷagaḷita kuḷaśaiḷa sahasra santāna kaḷita sētubandhura mumappa dakṣiṇa
samudrada taḍiviḍidu bandu rāmacandraṁ viharisideḍegaḷaṁ nōḍi—

lg.l: ypiṁ daśakaṇṭhanaṁ tridaśa kaṇṭakanaṁ kolalendu rāmanā

p.s:
antu rāma janmōtpattiyoḷāda tannaya munnina sāhasaṅgaḷaṁ neneyuttuṁ
bandagastyatīrthamaṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: kkuḷisalkambudhi sāldudilla jagamaṁ tindirda vātāpi pomo

p.s:
endagastyatīrtha saubhadra pauḷōma kāmbhōja bhāradvāja
membaydu tīrthaṅgaḷoḷ vardhamānanemba r̥ṣiya śāpadoḷugragrāha
svarūpadoḷirdaccaraseyarumaṁ viśāpeyar‌ māḍi maḷayaparvatama
neydevandu—

lg.l: ttudu sirikaṇḍamuṁ padeḍedu tīḍuva gāḷiyumilli puṭṭilli pō
gadu posa suggi mūguvaḍadilliya kōgile bandamāvu bī
rpudu mādyadgaja gaṇḍa bhitti kaṣaṇaprōdbhēdadiṁ sārdu baṁ
didiroḷ kūḍuvudilli candana rasaṁ kembonna ṭaṅkaṅgaḷoḷ
negaḻdī karpūra kāḷāgaru maḷaya mahījaṅgaḷēḷā latāḷī
llage pārdārdāgaḷuṁ kinnara yuvati mr̥gī vrātamaṁ tanna nallaṁ
lvudu nīnendu kaḍaṅgi kālviḍivavōl tannūrmigaḷ banduvaṁ
didudaṟiṁ pōda tapōpaḷaṁbaḷaṁ(?) gaganamaṁ mārpoyye kaṇgoppi tō
vaḷana samuccaḷanmaṇigaṇātta marīci latā pratāna saṁ
vaḷayita vidruma druma viḷāsa viśēṣita bāḍavānaḷā
viḷa jaḷamaṁ manaṁ bayasi nōḍidanarṇavamaṁ guṇārṇavaṁ

p.s:
antu nōḍuttuṁ bandu mundondeḍeyoḷadabhrābhra vibhrama
bhrājitōttuṅgaśailamaṁ kaṇḍu
ī bhāgavu gha. pratiyalli mātravide.—

endabhinava jīmūtavāhanaṁ jīmūtavāhanana parōpakārada bīrada
pempaṁ meccuttuṁ bandu gōkarṇanāthanaṁ gaurīnāthananavani pavana gagana dahana
taraṇi salila tuhinakara yajamāna mūrtiyaṁ triḷōkaika saṅgīṁnuñcita kīrtiyaṁ
kaṇḍu keygaḷaṁ mugidu—

lg.l: sadigvaḷayayā bhuvājyayācyavājyavā sa giri sāgara dvīpayā
sa sarva jagatāṁ gururgirisutā patiḥ pātu naḥvaḥ

p.s: endu bāḷēndumauḷiyaṁ stutisi—

lg.l: sogayisi banda māmarane taḷtelevaḷḷiye pūta jāti saṁ
pageye kukilva kōgileye pāḍuva tumbiye nallaroḷmogaṁ
nagemogadoḷ‌ paḷañcaleye kūḍuva nallare nōḻpoḍāva be
nāgiyumēno tīrdapugamamēno tīrddapudode tīradoḍaṁ maṟidumbiyāgi mēṇ
ḍe manaṅgoṇḍire teṅkanāḍa maṟeyalkinnēṁ manaṁ barkumē

p.s:
endarikēsari teṅkanāḍaṁ nāḍāḍiyallade meccuttumānāḍanonde
billoḷuṇḍige sādhyaṁ māḍi paścima digvibhāgābhimukhanāgi bandu—

annegaṁ tanna maydunanappamōghāstra dhanañjayana baravina santasadosage
paḍemātaṁ munduvaridaṟipuvante—

lg.l: palavuṁ janmadoḷāda ninna keḷeyaṁ bandappanātaṅge beṁ

p.s:
antu dakṣiṇākṣi spandanadoḷaṁ sūcisuva śubhasūcaneyoḷaṁ
nārāyaṇanudāttanārāyaṇana baravanaṟidu baladēva sātyaki kr̥tavarmādigaḷappa
tannoḍavuṭṭidaruṁ vr̥ṣṇi kāmbhōjakuḷatiḷakarappa yādavaruṁ berasu madakari
karēṇu turagādi nānā vidha vāhanaṅgaḷanēṟi maydunaṅgidirvandu tammalampi
naḻkaṟina rūpane kāṇbante kaṇḍu dikkarikarānukārigaḷappa bāhugaḷindamōrorvaraṁ
tegedappi nibiḍāliṅganaṅgeydānandajaḷa paripūrṇa vistīrṇa vilōcanaṁ
gaḷindaṁ muhurmuhurālōkanaṁ geyyuttumuttuṅga matta vāraṇaṅgaḷanēṟi
poḻalaṁ puge—

lg.l: sura nara kinnarōraga nabhaścara kānteyarēvarendu māṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ moḻaguva baddavaṇada paṟegaḷuṁ piḍida kembonna taḷigeyoḷ
tekkane tīvida biḍumuttina sēseyuṁ berasu—

lg.l: ḍade paritandu sūsidudu sēseyanandu purāṅganā janaṁ
miḷirva kuruḷgaḷoḷ poḷeva kaṇgaḷa beḷpu paḷañci cinna pū
khaḷa kusumāstraniṭṭa goṇeyaṇaṇaṇeṇakkeṇeyāgire niḷki niḷki kō

p.s:
