mattorvaḷati sambhrama tvaritadiṁ mēkhaḷākaḷita ruciradidhi luḷitādhara pallave
nōḻpa daṇḍugaḷoḷaṇḍugoṇḍu sorkidāne barpante bandu—

lg.l: rpāyele nōṭa bēṭada konar taledōrpavolāge bāyoḷi
rdāyele kaṇgevandeseye kayyeyyale kayyoḷe bāya tambulaṁ

p.s:
mattōrvaḷ karvinabilla tiruviṁ barduṅki barpalarambu barpante
bandu—

lg.l: smaranaṁ rūpinoḷindranaṁ vibhavadoḷ pō meccenānāva gaṁ
dhara bandha pravibhāsiyappariganaṁ kāṇutte kaṇsōltu kā

p.s:
antu nōḍida peṇḍirellaṁ kāmadēvanemba bēṇṭekāṟaṅgoḍḍida
pullegaḷantaralambina monege pūṇe pokku pakkāgire poḻaloḷagaṇiṁ bandu divijēndra
viḷāsōpahāsitamappa nija mandiramaṁ puge—

lg.l: matigaṁ puṭṭuvinaṁ karaṁ parakegaḷ taḷpoyye sēsikkitiṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ nārāyaṇana taṅge subhadreyemba kanne kemmugila tereya poreyoḷ
negedu poṟamaḍuva vidyādhariyante tanna cembonna kannemāḍada mēgaṇa neleya
caupaḷigeya bāgiloḷ nindu—

lg.l: baḷasida gujjugaḷ nereda mēḷada kanneyarettamikke saṁ
caḷisuva cāmaraṁ kanaka padmada sīguri toṭṭa māṇikaṁ
gaḷa beḷagiṭṭaḷaṁ tanagoḍambaḍe dēse viḷāsamaṁ puduṁ
goḷise maraldu kanne naḍe nōḍi guṇārṇavanembanītanē

p.s:
endu tanna mēḷadākegaḷaṁ besagoṇḍoḍākeya pattida kaṇṇumanumuḻgida
manamumaṁ jōlda nāṇumaṁ nēldanīḷda saramumanaṟidu sahajamanōjana kulada
calada cāgada bīrada bhāgyada saubhāgyadaguntigaḷanantumaḷavallade pogaḻe—

lg.l: odavida tanna javvanada rūpina meyyoḷe tappuyoḷantuḷaḷuntuḷaḷartudappu nō
ṭadoḷe poḍarpurddu tappu bage tappu manōjana pūvinambu tī
vida doṇe tīvikīṟi tannanise jāṇane tappade tappudappa nō
ḍidudadaṟiṁ guṇārṇavananā sati tappade tappu nōṭadoḷ

p.s:
antu taḷataḷa toḷaguva dukūlada sakaḷavaṭṭeyoḷvaṭṭiyavolvaṭṭeyoṁvaṭṭeyayoṁ nimirci
dantānumaralda tāvareyesaḻgaḷoḷ pudidu puduṅgoḷisidantānu
manaṅgāmr̥tavarṣamanodaviḍarisidantānumerdeyoḷeḍevaṟiyada poḷapinoḷ
taḷpoydu kaḍegaṇṇa beḷpugaḷ sogayisuva kuvaḷayadaḷanayaneya nōṭaṁ tanna
manadoḷaḷḷāṭamaṁ paḍeye—

lg.l: naneyambambane karci pāṟidapudō śr̥ṅgāra vārāśi bhōṁ
binegaṁ sōlamanuṇṭumāḍe harigaṁ karṇānta viśrānta lō

p.s:
antu suratamakaradhvajana kaḍegaṇṇa nōṭaṁ kāmana kisugaṇcida
nōṭadantormodale tanna manadoḷaḷḷāṭamaṁ paḍeye—

lg.l: sōladoḷeyde pīrda teṟadindemeyikkade nōḻpa kaṇge kaṇ
pīlivolāge bandu peṟatondu manambuge patti cittadoḷ
būla karaṅkaṇḍa vāhiniya mēle neṟaldire bāle līleyiṁ

p.s:
āgaḷā nārāyaṇanumudāttanārāyaṇanumāneyindamiḻidu nava
kisalaya vandanayānandamāḷāḷaṅkr̥tamappa sapta tāḷōttuṅga ramya harmyaderaḍaneya
mogasāleyoḷiṭṭa ponna paḍigaṅgaḷoḷamikkida paḻiya sukhāsanaṅgaḷoḷaṁ kaṭṭida
cinnada bondarigeyoḷamesedirda maṇimaya pīṭhadoḷoḍanēṟi kiṟidu poḻtu
kuḷḷirdu majjana bhōjana tāmbūlānulēpana vinādibhūṣaṇa surabhi kusuma
dāmādigaḷiṁ santasambaḍisi dāmōdaranudaradoḷiṭṭukokēḷvanitaḻkaṟoḷapagata patha
pariśramanaṁ māḍi—

antenitānumandadoḷ seṟapugeydu vividha vinōdaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟi munne
badarikāśramadoḷ—

adaṟiṁ ninagamenagamētaṟoḷaṁ vikalpamuṁ vicchinnamumillendu
nuḍiyutirpannegamittal—

lg.l: tavane viyattaḷa bhramaṇa vihvalanāgi baḻaldu kāṟuvaṁ

p.s: ā prastāvadoḷ—

antu kamaḷavanaṅgaḷādityaṅge keyyaṁ mugivante mugiya jakkavakkigaḷ
suratamakaradhvajana subhadreya viraha paritāpamaṁ paccu koṇḍasuṅgoṇḍagale
sandhyārāgamavara manadanurāgamananukarisuvantuṭāge baḻiyaṁ kramakramadoḷ—

lg.l: masiyindaṁ jagamellamaṁ ditisutaṁ muṁ pūḻdanō kālamē
gha samūhaṁ deseyellamaṁ kavidudō gandhēbha carmaṅgaḷaṁ
pasaraṁ geydano śambhuvemba bageyiṁ taḷpoydu kaḻpēṟi sū

p.s:
āgaḷā tārāgaṇaṅgaḷ diśāvaniteyara makuṭa māṇikaṅgaḷantenituḍu beḷagiyuṁ
kaḻtaleyanaleyalāṟavāduvu kanaka prāsāda paṁṅktigaḷ paḻapaḻane beḷaguva
soḍargaḷanādityana naṇṭarendu tamōrājakaṁ muḷidu seṟegeydaydu beḷagina seṟeya
manegaḷannavāduvu madagaja gaṇḍasthaḷaṅgaḷoḷeṟagi moreva tumbiya bambalgaḷe
vimukhībhūtaṅgaḷāduvu taṇḍataṇḍadōlagakke puguva poṟamaḍuva vāraviḷāsiniyara
nūpuraṅgaḷa ravaṅgaḷoḷ nr̥pabhavanōpavana dīrghikāhaṁsakuḷaṅgaḷ taḷaveḷagāduvu
rājahaṁsa pārāvata mithunaṅgaḷuttuṅga prāsādaśikhara maṇigavākṣāntarāḷa vividha
gr̥hāntaragataṅgaḷāduvu udayagiri kaṭaka kuhara parikarniśākaraṁ haridaḷita nija
hariṇa rudhinikara harita nija hariṇa gaḷita nakharucira nicaya nicitamādante lōhitāṅganāge—

lg.l: caraṇālaktaka rāgamacciṟidudō mēṇ kāmigaḷgīva rāyāminī kāminīkāminigaḷdivā

p.s: āgaḷ tanna rāgamaṁ rāgigaḷgellaṁ paccukoṭṭante kempu pattuviṭṭāgaḷ—

lg.l: munidīśaṁ tave suṭṭu muṁ karuṇadindittaṁ punarjanmamaṁ
ninagendāradati pāpamuṁ paḍaṇamuṁ pōpante kāmaṅge maṁ
jjanakendettida candrakānta ghaṭadoḷ tandaḻtiyiṁ puṣpa vā

p.s:
antu sogayisuvacca beḷdiṅgaḷoḷ sudhādhavaḷitōttuṅga ramya
harmyaderaḍaneya neleya caupaḷigeya mundaṇa ramya harmyāgradoḷe
siriyōlagaya kūrpayo rūpaṅgoṭṭu vinōdaṅgaḷoḷ vikramārjunaṁ berasu—
āgaḷ—

lg.l: ddāni taguḷdu kaṇṇoḷe toḻalderdeyoḷ taḍamāḍe bēṭadu
manamārādhita hōma bhūmi paśugaḷ kāmāturar banda mā
vanituṁ sthāpita yūpakōṭi baḷavatkāmāgni hōmāgni caṁ
ninituṁ kāmana bēḷveyendu sugidaḷ tanvaṅgi beḷdiṅgaḷoḷ

p.s:
antu kāmadēvanemba mantravādiya divya mantradiṁ stōbhaṅgoṇḍa
divya grahadante kāmagraha gr̥hīteyāgire manōvaikalyanōḍinōṭa kalyanōḍi kalyanōṭi kalya rōmāñcaka stambhaka
kampasvēda vaivarṇya santāpānāhārarōmāñcaka stambhana kampa cāpaḷatā santāpanāhāra vyāmōha gadgadāśrumōkṣa mūrchādi
nānā vikāraṅgaḷanoḍanoḍane tōṟuvudumākeya dādiya magaḷ
cūtalatikeyembaḷ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: ṇmida bemarōḷivaṭṭa niḍusuy todaḷiṅgeḍegoṇḍa mātu kuṁ

p.s: endu tannoḷe bagedu mattamintendaḷ—

lg.l: gaḻiyise kempu kaṇgaḷa modalgaḷoḷoyyane tōṟeṟibāḍi pā
ḍaḻidu baḻaldu jōldiravu meyyoḷe meyviḍidenna kaṇgaḷoḷ

p.s:
adaṟinīkeya bageyanaṟiyalvēḻkumendu mellamellane kelakke vandu
kuñcadaḍapada ḍavakeya paricārikeyarellarumaṁ kaṇgetti kaḷedēkāntadoḷ
kanneyanintendaḷ—

lg.l: nagegaṇ sōrva kaduṣṇa vāricayadiṁ bimbādharaṁ suyya beṁ

p.s:
endu munname muṭṭi nuḍiyade poṟapoṟagane baḷasi kanneya śaṅkeyaṁ
kiḍisi mattamintendaḷ—

lg.l: vina pōḻandada kaṇge bāṣpajalamaṁ cittakke santāpamaṁ

p.s:
endu tanna manamanaṟidu muṭṭi nuḍida keḷadiya nuḍige
peṟatēnumanenalaṟiyade nāṇci taleyaṁ bāgi nelanaṁ bareyuttuṁ nīroḷ
muḻugidarantummane bemaruttummaḷike vandu beccane suydoḍe—

endu manada maṟukamumanerdeya kudipamumaṁṟupumumaṁḍipumumaṁṭipumumaṁ bageya
kuṟiṟupamumaṁ meyya baḍatanamumanaṟiye tōṟi nuḍidoḍe rāja haṁsi mānasa
sarōvaramanallade peṟatanēke bayasuguṁ kaḷahaṁsagamaneyā suratamakaradhvajananallade
peṟatanēke bayasugumendu manadoḷe mantaṇamirdu bageyoḷe guḍigaṭṭi
santasambaṭṭintendaḷ—

lg.l: ṇbanitaṁ māḍade padmajaṁ madananaṁ baidantuṭē bēḍamī
binadaṁ tappale kalpitaṁ pariyadātaṅgendu ninnī manaṁ

p.s:
nīnidarkēnumaṁ bageyalvēḍa ninna bageyaṁ bagedante tīrcuvenendanēka
prakāra vacana racanegaḷindākeya manamanāṟe nuḍiyuttirpinamitta vikramārjunanu
mōlagaṁ parediṁ baḻiyaṁ tanna pavaḍisuva māḍakkoḍanoḍanōlagisuttuṁ banda
paṇḍitarkaḷumanucita pratipattigaḷiṁ visarjisi subhadreya rūpu kaṇṇa pāpeyante
kaṇṇoḷe toḻale kaṇmuccade tanna jasadante pasarisidaccaveḷdiṁ gaḷanākeya kaṇgaḷa
beḷpina taḷarpenuttuṁ peḷpaḷisi candranaṁ nōḍi
106neya puṭadalliya 60neya padyadinda 108neya puṭadalliya 69neya padyavāda mēle baruva vacanadavaregū hindaṇa mudraṇagaḷalliyū mātr̥kegaḷalliyū hindumundāgi biddu arthasāmañjasyavilladidda ī bhāgavannu illi artha samañjasavāguvante kramapaḍiside [saṁ]—

lg.l: deyamadu nīḷa nīraja vanaṅgaḷa celvugaḷembuvā latāṁ
giya kaḍegaṇṇa beḷpugaḷa silkida silkina silkivallavē

p.s: adalladeyuṁ—

lg.l: ā navamāḷikā kusuma kōmaḷe rāga rasa prapūrṇaṁ caṁ

p.s:
endu tanna manamumanerdeyumanuṟe seṟeviḍidirdapūrva rūpeya
rūpumaṁ manadoḷe bagedu bhāvisi mattamintendaṁ—

lg.l: kusuriya rūpaneyde pogaḻalkaṟiyeṁ naḍu purvu bāse ka
rvasiṟane nōḍe mokkaḷamadār naḍe nōḻpoḍamantumintuṁ mū

p.s: endu sairisade—

lg.l: molegaḷ baṭṭiduvāgi kargida kuruḷ koṅkāgi kaṇgeyde nī
ḷdalargaṇgaḷ capaḷaṅgaḷāgi jaghanaṁ kāñcī kaḷāpa prabhō

p.s:
endu kiṟiduṁ bēgamaṟimaruḷantu palumbi pambalisi mattamākeya
hāva bhāva viḷāsa vibhrama kaṭākṣēkṣaṅgaḷ manamanonaliseyunoliseyunovarisiyunoliyisitumerdeyaṁ
kanaliseyumanaṅgamataṅgaja kōḷāhaḷākuḷīkr̥tānta raṅganāgi—

lg.l: jagamaṁ māḍida padmajaṁ paḍedanillī kanneyaṁ māḍuva
llige candraṁ maḷayāniḷaṁ maḷayajaṁ nīrējamimmāvu ma
llage sandaṅgajanembajaṁ paḍedanantā kāntiyiṁ kānteyaṁkāntegī kānteyaṁ

p.s:
antaltappandāantu tappadāantalu tappadā kānteyaṁ vidhātraṁ māḍuvandu kosagina kēsaraṅgaḷa
namr̥tarasadoḷaṁ śr̥ṅgārarasadoḷaṁ bhāvisi rasa siddhamappa ponna lateya meyyumaṁ
nīlada tale navirumaṁ pavaḷada bāydeṟeyumaṁ muttina pallumaṁ rājāvartada
seḷḷugurumaṁ dhūpada suyyumaṁ ratiya saubhāgyamumaṁ sīteya
sairaṇeyumanadrijāteya śr̥ṅgāramumaṁ manōmathana madanamōhana santāpana
vaśīkaraṇaṅgaḷemba kāmadēvanaydalarambina śaktigaḷumanondumāḍi lōkamellamaṁ
maruḷmāḍalendu peṇmāḍidanakkumendu mattamākeya nōḍida nōṭamaṁ bhāvisi—

lg.l: neṟegoḷe gāḍi nōḻpa bage barpudumāne dalalendu dantiyaṁ
niṟisi maraldu nōḍuvudumennumanā sati sōladatta ma
tteṟagi baḻaldu jōldaḷipi nōḍidaḷintele satta potta ka
ḷada keḷeyarkaḷillavaḷumappoḍeḷ mappeḍaḷamappoḍaḷamapeḍa javvana mattettanāṇa kā

p.s:
endintu nallaḷaṁ nenedu kaṇgāpane kādu cintā samudrāntara parivr̥tanāgi
sairisalāṟade poḻalaṁ toḻaldu nōḻpa bagedandu rājamandiradiṁ poṟamaṭṭu
bare tannaṁ kāṇaloḍamaṟidu nuḍiyisi mecci mēḷada nāgarika viṭa vidūṣaka
pīṭhamardakarkaḷverasu kāmadēvanōlagakke barpante sūḷegēriyoḷagane
barpudumalli—

lg.l: mr̥gabhūr̥ddhavr̥ viḷāsinī kabarikā bandhaṅgaḷaṁ pottu ma
lligeyoḷ bhāvisi dhūpadoḷ poredu tatkāntāratalasatti svēda biṁ
dugaḷoḷ nāndu kuruḷgaḷoḷ suḻidu mundondirda saubhāgya

p.s:
āgaḷāṟuṁ r̥tugaḷa pūgaḷanondumāḍi pūvinambugaḷaṁ paṇṇalendu
kāmadēvaṁ māḍidōjana sāleyirpantirda pūvina santeyoḷ
vasantakānteyarante—

nōḍi nāḍāḍiyalladākegaḷa jōḍe geytaṅgaḷaṁ kaṇḍidu maneyāṇmanaṁ
māruvandamallade pū māruvandamaltendu muguḷnage nagutuṁ
barpanondeḍeyoḷ maneyāṇmana kaṇṇemeye kāṇḍapaṭamāgeyuṁ bagemaneyāṇmana
kaṇṇemeye dūdaviyāgeyuṁ bagedeḍeyaneydi bageda bageyaṁ bagedante tīrci
pōpa jōḍeyaraṁ kaṇḍu vikramārjunanintendaṁ—

lg.l: kuṟupaṁ purvina jarve tōṟe bageyaṁ kaṇsannegaḷ pēḻeta
nneṟakaṁ tanna manakke kūḍe kelakaṁ ganaṁ kanaṅgaṇḍaṅgamoḷpaṁ karaṁ
meṟevā prauḍheye jōḍeyakkumeḍeyoḷ dūṇṭinde dūṇṭiṅge pe
rvaṟeyaṁ poysi kelakke nāṇci taleguttirpākeyēṁ jōḍeyē
jāreye jāre pāṟene karaṁ piriduṁ gaḻaputtumirpaḷaṁ

p.s:
endu pāṇbaraṅkusanā pāṇbeyara geyva geytaṅgaḷumaṁ tōrpa
sannegaḷumaṁ āḍuva miḻtugoḍḍaṅgaḷumaṁ kaṇḍu cōdyambaṭṭu—

enuttuṁ barpanondeḍeyoḷ manasijana naḍapida jaṅgamalategaḷante
manōjana kāpina kalpalategaḷante manōjanemba dīvagāṟana pullegaḷante tantamma
maneya mundaṇa pacceya jaguligaḷoḷaṁ maṇimaya matta vāraṇaṅgaḷoḷamaḷa
vigaḻiḻeda viḷāsaṅgaḷoḷaṁ taṇḍataṇḍade neredirda peṇḍavāsadoḷveṇḍiraṁ kaṇḍu—

embudaṁ kēḷuttuṁ barevare mattamā peṇḍavāsagēriyoḷage saubhāgyada
bhōgada cāgada rūpugaḷ mānasa rūpādante—

lg.l: sīguri cākāpi nāṇkuṇidu meṭṭuva guvajjarigaḻte bīramaṁ

p.s:
mattamalli kōṭi poṅge ghaṇṭeyaluguva kiṟukuḷabojaṅgarumaṁ
suṇṇadeleyanotteyiṭṭu madadāneyumaṁ māṇikamumanotte viḍisalaṭṭuva cibekka
pōrkuḷi bojaṅgarumaṁ katturi biyakatturi bīyakatturiya biyamaṁ meṟedu katturiyoḷ pūḻdu katturi
migadantirpa katturibojaṅgarumaṁ nōḍi poḻalabojaṅgara bibīyadaḷavige
manadoḷ meccuttuṁ barpanondeḍeyoḷ kaḷḷoḷakaḍaloḷamamardinoḷaṁ puṭṭida
peṇḍirante sogayisuva palarumoḷveṇḍirondeḍeyoḷirdu kāmadēvanemba
baḷamardukāṟana māḍida mardinante baḷedu daḷambaḍedu mūnūṟaṟuvattu
jātiya kaḷgaḷaṁ mundiṭṭu madhumantradiṁ madhudēvategaḷanarcisi ponna beḷḷiya
padmarāgada pacceya giḷiya kōgileya koñceyañceya kuntaḷikeya māḻkeya
sippugaḷoḷ tīvi madhumantraṅgaḷiṁ mantrisi neladoḷeṟedu taleyoḷ taḷidu
kaḷḷoḷ boṭṭaniṭṭukoṇḍu keladargellaṁ boṭṭiṭṭu kiṟiyar piriyaraṟidu
poḍavaṭṭu dharmagaḷguḍivargellaṁ mīsalgaḷḷaneṟedu ponna beḷḷiya sippugaḷoḷ
kiṟi kiṟidaneṟedu kuḍi bidira kuḍiya māvina miḍiya mārudiḍitina meṇasugaḍaleya
puḍiḷiyoḷaḍasidallavallaṇigeya cacisikkaṇaṅgaḷaṁ savisavidu—

lg.l: madhu sītuṁ kaṭu sīdu pō puḷita kaḷḷaltuṁtānuṁ kaḍu sītu sīdu puḷi kaḷ tānuṁ karaṁ kaytuba
rpudu mārīci toḍarpuḷinde saradiṁdaṁ kampilla sorkipparkoppalā
ppudu kaḷḷappudu tappadendu kuḍidar kāmāṅgamaṁ kānteyar

p.s:
antu kuḍiye kakkarageytadigeytudigaitu tudiṁ tudinālageyoḷ todaḷverasu nuḍiva
nuḍigaḷuṁḷumaṁ poḍarva niḍiya purvugaḷuṁḷaṁṇmaṁḷumaṁ niḍiyalargaṇgaḷoḷ vikāraṁ berasu
negaḻdabhivinayaṅgaḷuṁ maḷamaḷipa rūpu kaṇgaḷoḷ beḷpa naḷpaniḷupinaḻiye sōṅkuva
kempugaḷuṁḷiṁ tamma kempaṁ kaṇgaḷge koṭṭu kaṇgaḷa beḷpantamage māṟugoṇḍante
tanigegittuverasusibatti sogayisuva beḷarvāygaḷoḷimpaṁ tāḷdi poṟamaḍuva
taṇgampugaḷumamr̥tabindugaḷante negaḻva bemara bindugaḷumaḷavalladoppe
palarumoḷveṇḍirondeḍeyoḷirdalliyorvaḷ—

lg.l: beḷarta beḷarvāy karaṁ poḷeva pāṅge kaṇṇindaḷu

p.s:
mattamorvaḷūrvaśiyane pōlvāke tanna gambhīra nava yauvana
madadoḷaṁ madirāmadadoḷamaḷavigaḻiye sorki—

lg.l: ḷḷuḍe kaṭisūtradottinoḷe jōldire nāṇ‌ taledōṟe kūḍe kū
kiḍuvakiṟivaḍiḍiriva bikkuvāguḷi kukilva bikkuḷipa tēguva tanna toḍaṅkadeydebāguva pāḍuvanda nū

p.s:
antākegaḷ tūgi toneva tonepaṅgaḷumaṁ marasarigeviḍidu bilviḍidāḍuva
būtāṭaṅgaḷumaṁ nōḍi gandhēbavidyādharanintendaṁ—

enutuṁ barpanondeḍeyoḷorvaṁ pabaḻikeyda nallaḷanuḻiyalāṟade
suḻiye muḷidātana keḷeyanintendaṁ—

endu nuḍidu bisuḍisidaṁ mattorvaṁ tanageraḍaṟiyadolda nallaḷanē
taṟoḷappoḍamēvamaṁ māḍade bēṭamaṁ salisuvudarke santasaṁ baṭṭu muntaṇge
kāpaniṭṭintendaṁ—

endu nuḍidaṁ mattamondeḍeyoḷorva norvaḷa naḍeya nuḍiya
muḍiya gāmpiṅge muguḷḷage nakku tanna kaḷeyaṅge tōṟi—

lg.l: nayadoḷe nōḍi nōṭadoḷe mēḷisi mēḷadoḷappukeydu go
ḷeyara tukaṟumbu sūḷeyara melnuḍi sūḷeyarirpa pāṅgu sū
ḷeyara negaḻte nāḍe tanagaḻti dalakkaneleḷe sūḷeyāgaḷē

p.s:
ene kēḷdu muguḷnage naguttuṁ barpanondeḍeyoḷondu kandada
modalumaṁ vr̥ttada tudiyumanondumāḍi padamikkiyōdi paṇḍitikkige
muyvāntumāva kāḷegadoḷaṁ tāne ōḍiyārōḍidpoḍeyaarembante bī rakke muyvāypāntumondu vīsavanappoḍamārgamittaṟiyade cāgakke mayvāntuṁ tammaṁ naguvaranaṟiyadeṇbarēṟidakaḻteyante desedesege beseva paccapasiyeggarumaṁ
kaṇḍu—

lg.l: daṟiyada vidde sallada cadur neṟeravareva kallada kalpi kēḷa mā
taṟiyada mātu tamma baṟuvāṟumārimārumātugaḷoḷ pudideggareyde ka

p.s:
ene naguttuṁ bareyondeḍeyoḷ nālvarayvar‌ gāḻdoḻtirirdalli
gōrvaneggaṁ goṭṭige vandu kaṇṇaṟiyade sōṅkeyuṁ manamaṟiyade
nuḍiyeyumātananākegaḷ bāseyoḷintendar‌—

endātananākegaḷ kāḍi koṟacāḍi kaḷedar‌ mattamondeḍeyoḷorvaḷ
tannanuḻida posa bēṭadāṇmananēgeyduṁ pōgalīyade tannaḷipane tōṟi—
mattorvaṁ tanna sūḷeyoḷāda bēsaṟaṁ tanna keḷeyaṅgintendaṁ—
endu nuḍidu geṇṭādaṁ mattorva bēṭakārti tāya kaṇṇaṁ bañcisināyakaṁ tannaṁ vañcisi tanna mopināhipākeya manege pōpa bēṭadāṇmadōpanaṁ piḍidu—

lg.l: tappudu tappuppadenna tanu bēṭada kāṭadoḷintu kaṇḍumi

p.s:
endu karuṇambaḍe nuḍidoḍagoṇḍu pōdaḷ mattamondeḍeyoḷorvaḷ
kuṇṭaṇiyuparōdhakke piridīva mudupananuḻiyalañji tanna bēsaṟaṁ tanna
sabbavadākegintendaḷ—

lg.l: korevoḍe beṭṭugaḷ bikiruvuvuṇmuva lāḷeya lōḷegaḷ pona
lvarivuvu kemmi kummidoḍe tōḷoḷe jīva viyōgamappudeṁ

p.s:
endu nagisuttirdaḷ mattamondeḍeyoḷorvaḷ tanna nallanallige
dūduvōgi banda dūdavigēgeyva teṟanumanaṟiyade padedu paḍe mātaṁ
besagoḷvaḷaraṁ kaṇḍu—

lg.l: birariyisise bēṭadoḷ biriva nallaragaldu kanaldonaldulva na
tare tare banda sabbavada mātugaḷaṁ guḍigaṭṭi kēḷarē

p.s: antumalladeyuṁ—

lg.l: tina rasadoḷ konarvudu taḷirvudu pūvudu kāyvudantu kā
ytanitaṟoḷantu nindu manadoḷ todaḷillada nalmeyemba naṁ

p.s: antumalladeyuṁ—

lg.l: ṟana bagenilladinilla benillajikkegoḷagappudu niṭṭise bēṭa bēṭakā
ṟana ruci bambaluṁ tuṟugaluṁ koḷutirpudu nūṅke bēṭakā
ṟana manavaṭṭi pattuvudu bēṭavidēṁ viparīta vr̥ttiyō

p.s:
indumī dūdavarembar bēṭakāṟara bēṭamemba lategaḷaḍarpirpaṁ
tirdarentappa bēṭaṅgaḷumavar posayise posatappudu kiḍise kiḍuvudantu
malladeyuṁ—

endu nuḍiyuttuṁ barevare mattondeḍeyoḷorvaṁ garbhēśvaraṁ tanna
hr̥dayēśvariyanagaldu bandu peṟarārumaṁ meccadākeyaṁ nenedu—

lg.l: gane kanaluttumummaḷisi sairisalāṟade mēle vāydu ba

p.s:
endu sairisalārade tanna prāṇavallabheyoḍanirdandina muḷisosagegaḷaṁ
nenedu—

lg.l: bage gelalendu kāḍi pusi niddeyoḷānire lallegeydu la
llege maṟedirdoḍaḻkaṟinoḷondi mogaṁ mogadatta sārci be
ccage niḍusuyda nallaḷa mukhāmbuja saurabhadoḷ podaḷdadēṁḻdoḍēṁ

p.s:
endu tannoḷ palumbutirdanaṁ kaṇḍītanumemmandiganumemma
naṇṭanumakkumendu muguḷnage naguttuṁ barpanondeḍeyoḷ—

lg.l: olavinoḷāda kāypu mige kādalanaṁ bisuṭante pōpa kā
dalaḷaḻutuṁ teṟandiridu nōḍida nōṭadoḷeyde taḷḷa pe

p.s:
mattamondeḍeyoḷondu kāḷāgaru dhūpa dhūma malina śyāmalāṁlaṅkr̥ta
vicitra bhitti virājita ramya harmyataḷadoḷ palakāla magalda nallarirvarumondeḍe
yoḷ kūḍi—

lg.l: nname nāṇoḻkuḷkaḍivōgi sūsuva padaṁ gaṅgāmbuvaṁ pōle vi
bhramamaṁ kaṇṭharavakke tāḍaṭana ravaṁ tandīye tacchayyeyoḷ

p.s: antanēkaprakāra pura janajanita vikāraṅgaḷaṁ toḻaldu nōḻpannegaṁ—

lg.l: soḍarguḍiyomemaimayyanāge posa mallige mellage kampu nāṟekaṁmanāge ta
geḍegoḷe candrikāprabhe modalgiḍe nāḍe vitarkadiṁ bera
lmiḍidu guṇārṇavaṁ neṟeye niṭṭisidaṁ beḷagappa jāvamaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ tannoḍane toḻalva nāgararika viṭa vidūṣaka pīṭhamardakarkaḷani
ralvēḻdu rājamandiramaṁ pokku tanna pavaḍisuva māḍakkevandu haṁsa dhavaḷa
śayyātaḷadoḷ gaṅgānadī puḷina parisara pradēśadoḷ maṟedoṟaguvairāvatadante
pavaḍisi kiṟidānuṁ bēgadoḷ subhadreyaṁ kanasinoḷ kaṇḍu nanasendu bagedu
maṅgaḷa pāṭhaka ravaṅgaḷoḷ bhōṅkaneḻcanannegaṁ—

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
varaprasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitā guṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
caturthāśvāsaṁ

div.head: pañcamāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
antu naneya koneya taḷira niṟidaḷira muguḷa birimuguḷa miḍiya
kiṟumiḍiya bilmiḍigaḷoḷeṟagi tuṟugida banamaṁ pokkalliyuṁ meyyanāṟisalāṟade
pūta cūta lategaḷoḷ taḷpoydaydu posa muttina bāsaṇigeyoḷ bāsaṇisida biri
muguḷgaḷoḷ tuṟugidadirmutteya suttinoḷesedupāśrayambaḍeda sāndra
candrakāntada śileyanoḷagumāḍi—

lg.l: ttida pūmāle parāga rāgamuditāśā bhā samudyanmadhū
nmada bhr̥ṅga dhvani maṅgaḷa dhvaniyenal sālvanegaṁ tāne ta

p.s:
ā mādhavī latāmaṇṭapamaṁ kāmana ḍāmarakkaḷḷi vanadurgaṁ buguvante
pokkadaṟoḷage kappuravaḷukina jagaliyanagalitāgi samedu candanadeḷadaḷirgaḷaṁ
pāsi malligeyalargaḷaṁ pūvāsi mr̥ṇāḷanāḷadoḷ sameda sarigegaṅkaṇaṅgaḷumaṁ
yava kaḷikegaḷoḷ sameda kaṭisūtramumaṁ sāra karpūradoḷ viracisida
hāramumaṁ kariya neydila kāvinoḷ bhāvisida nūpuramumanadaṟa
birimuguḷgaḷoḷ citrisida karṇapūramumaṁ biḷiya tāvareyeḷagāvinasiya
nūloḷ kōda tōra malligeya birimuguḷa sarigeyumaṁ kappuravaḷukina
lambaṇamumaṁ toṭṭu kuḷirkoḻpa candana rasamanerdeyoḷaṁ meyyoḷaṁ
taḷkiṟidu kariya karbina kāvinenoḷa mainda vāḻeyeleya bijjaṇigegaḷiṁ bīsalvēḻdu
taṇpugeyye manada meyya santāpadoḷ bisusuyduyda bisupinoḷanitumaṁ geldu—

lg.l: kendaḷirvāsu sēkadaserkkida tovalgeṇeyāytu mr̥ṇāḷa nāḷavoṁkonarggetaḷirggeṇeyāytu nāḷavoṁ
doṁdaḍedoḍadaḍavotti pattiduvu sūsuva śītaḷa vāri maiyyane
ldandoḍedattidēṁ bisido bēṭada beṅkecinte mr̥gāṅka vaktreyā
arigana bēṭadonde posa bēṭada kēsuriyindameyde da
turipade sūsutuṁ keḷadiyar nadinaḍanerinaḍinediputtire nōḍe dāhamo
madana davānalārci tanuvaṁ suḍe taḷtemeyoḷ paḷañci bī
bugaloḍamā taḷōdariya suygaḷa beṅkeyoḷiccegeṭṭuṭṭu koṭṭu to
ṭṭage koḷe munde biḻdu maguḻdā satiyikkida kaṇṇa nīra dhā |

p.s:
antā bāle kāyda puḍiyoḷage bisuṭṭeḷavāḻeyante surata
makaradhvajanoḷāda bēṭadoḷ mammala maṟugurtirdaḷatta manuja manōjanuṁ
madananadaparitāpakkāṟadummaḷisi madhumathanana kaṇṇaṁ bañcisi vijr̥mbhamāṇa nava
naḷina parikarākr̥ṣṭa madhukara ramaṇīyapuḷina parisara pradēśa nivēśita virahi
jananicaya nicita mānasōnmatta kāminī gaṇḍūṣa sīdhu sēka puḷakita vakuḷa
mukuḷa vidaḷita manōharāśōka latā ramaṇīmaṇimaṇita ramaṇīya nūpurarava ramya mamānaviraḷa kusumadhūḷī dhūsaradūvi madhukara puḷina dhavaḷita dharātaḷamanutphulla
pallava līlāyamāna mattakōkilōllāsita śīkarōddāma durdina
vanamaneydevandu—

lg.l: kurumane karci biccaḻipa kōgile kampanavuṅki pottu ni
ttariperalembivēvuvo madīya manōgata kāma rāga sā

p.s:
enuttuṁ bandu birida birimuguḷgaḷoḷeṟagi tuṟugidaśōkalateyanaḻkartu
nōḍi—

lg.l: alaralargaṇ muguḷ nage maḍal toḍe tumbi kuruḷ taḷir taḷaṁ
gole molekempu kempukampu kampukempu kampukampu kempu kone seḷḷugurgaḷ kuḍi tōḷ nayaṁ nayaṁ
nele nele bhaṅgi bhaṅgipadavaṇ beḷarvāy peṟatallidentō kō

p.s:
endu kiṟidānuṁ bēgamaṟiṟe maruḷādantā lateyoḷ paḻiḻugāḷegaṅgādi
barevare kāmadēvanimmāvina naneyanambugaḷumanavaṟa balmiḍiyane miṭṭeyumaṁ māḍi tannanēsāḍi kāḍe—

lg.l: kṣisi manamellamaṁ kavardapaṁ tanuvaṁ baḍamāḍi kāḍi daṁ

p.s:
endu nandanavanōpakaṇṭhaṅgaḷoḷanaṅgaśaravaśanāgi toḻaldu nōḍuttuṁ
tanna manadoḷintendu bageguṁ—

lg.l: uriverdeyāṟe cintipa manaṁ guḍigaṭṭe maraldu nōḍuva

p.s:
endu bageyuttumākeyirda mādhavīmaṇṭapakke mogasi palara palavuṁ
teṟada bēṭada paḍemātugaḷaṁ kēḷdalliyārānumemmandigarirdarakkumenuttuṁ barpa
gandhēbhavidyādharanaṁ subhadre bhōṅkane kaṇḍu—

lg.l: rveḍegaḷinuṇmi poṇmidudu kaṇ naḍe nōḍade tappu nōḍi nā

p.s:
āgaḷ suratamakaradhvajanumanaṅgāmr̥ta payōdhiyoḷ mūḍi
muḻugāḍidarante kiṟidu bēgamanirdu tanniṁ tāne cētarisi subhadreya rūpanā
pādamastakambarameyde nōḍi tannoḷāda bēṭadoḷ baḍavaṭṭumēḻgevāḍivada
sasiyante sogayisuvasiyaḷaṁ kaṇḍu—

adaṟinīkeyumenageraḍaṟiyada nalla manandōṟuvudu salge dōṟuvudu
māvudu dōsamendāke kuḷḷirda taḷira sejjeyoḍane kuḷḷirpuduṁ nāṇci
pogalendeḻda kanneyaṁ cūtalatikeyemba keḷadi jaḍidu kuḷḷirisi gandhēbha
vidyādharananintendaḷ—

lg.l: madanana kāypu māṇge sarasīruhajanmana meccu tīrge kō
ṇṇiduverdegakke kendaḷira sejjeya jiñjiṇisiñjini pōke ninna kū

p.s:
embannegaṁ suratamakaradhvajana subhadreya viraha paritāpadoḷāda paḍemātaṁ
karṇaparampareyiṁ kēḷdu santasambaṭṭu cakri, cakrikāvartiyappudaṟindā
vanāntarāḷakkorvane bandu mādhavī maṇṭapamaṁ pokku avarirvara nāṇumaṁ
naḍukamaṁ pattuviṭṭu nuḍidu—

lg.l: baḍenīvaḻtiyadāgaḷuṁ ninage dal padmāsanaṁ tāne nē

p.s:
antu pōgevōge baladēvananumatadoḷ peṟagaṁ taguḷva yādava
balumuṇṭappoḍadanambugāṇisal nīne sālveyuḻidudaṁ māṇisalāne sālveniduve
muhūrtavāgi naḍevudendu śaibya baḷāhaka mēghavarṇa sugrīvaṅgaḷemba nālku
kuduregaḷoḷ pūḍida divya rathamanesagal dārukanemba sārathiyanīvudumā
rathamaṁ manōrathamberasēṟi cūtalatikeverasu subhadreyanēṟalvēḻdudātta
nārāyaṇaṁ nārāyaṇana parasida parakegaḷumaṁ keykoṇḍu bīḻkoṇḍindraprasthada
baṭṭeyoḷ sukha prayāṇaṅgeydanannegamitta baladēvaṁ subhadreyaṁ sāmanta
cūḍāmaṇiyuydanembudaṁ kēḷdu—

āgaḷ tanna pēḻda nāyakara sāvaṁ kēḷdu yādavabala jaḷanidhiverasu
viḷayakāla jaḷanidhiyante teraḷaltaḷaral bageda baladēvanaṁ vāsudēvanintendaṁ—

lg.l: jvala tīvrāstranighāta pātita ripuvyūhaṁ balambēḻe dō
rvaladoḷ kēḷ ninagaṁ balasthanoḍeyaṁ kūsiṅge koṇḍuyvuydudē
calamēmēṁdōṣamadarke nīn muḷivudē nīn pēḻvoḍān sālenē

p.s:
endu baladēvana manadoḷāda muḷisemba kiccaṁ tanna mr̥du madhura
vacanaracanā jalaṅgaḷaṁ taḷidujālaṅgaḷiṁ kaḷida nadipinandisinaḍipidanitta vikramārjunanuṁ katipaya
dinaṅgaḷindanēka sahakārāśōkānōkahanandanavanaprasthamanindraprasthamaneydevandu
munname tanna baravanaṟidu poḻaloḷaṣṭaśōbheyaṁ māḍi tanagidirvanda kontiya
dharmaputra bhīmasēnādigaḷa pādapadmaṅgaḷaṁ tanma karakamalaṅgaḷindarcisi
tadīyāśīrvacanaṅgaḷanāntu tanage poḍamaṭṭa nakula sahadēvaraṁ parasi punaḥ
punarāliṅganaṅgeydu muhurmuhurāḷōkanaṅgeyyuttuṁ bandu divijēndra
viḷāsadiṁ poḻalaṁ puge—

antu rājamandiramaṁ pokku dharmaputrananagalda panneraḍu māsavaruṣadoḷāda
digvijaya prapañcamumaṁ subhadrāharaṇamumaṁ puruṣōttamana parama
mitratvamumanaṟidu santasambaṭṭu tamma nibarumēkastharāgi—

lg.l: dharanuṁ yādava vaṁśajarverasu barpantaṭṭi māḻpaṁ manō

p.s:
aṭṭidoḍavar‌ pōgi baladēvanumaṁ vāsudēvanumaṁ kaṇḍu tamma
banda kajjamanoḍambaḍisi yādavarverasu mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu bare baravanaṟidu
pāṇḍavarayvarumidirvōgi yathōcita pratipattigaḷiṁ kaṇḍu poḻalgoḍagoṇḍu
bandu śubhadina nakṣatra yōgakaraṇaṅgaḷaṁ niṭṭisi—

lg.l: pasaraṁ geydavolappa poccaṟa mahā sāmanta sīmantinī

p.s:
antavarirvara bēṭememba lateya beḷasiṅge poynīreṟevante keynīrēṟedu
biyamaṁ meṟedu—

lg.l: toṭṭa tuḍuḍigegaḷ kaustubha ratnamanōronde masuḷise pālgaḍaloḷ
toṭṭa madanana pūgaṇegeṇeyāge gaṇikeyar gaṇidamaṁ bageyadintu

p.s:
antu baḻiḻuvaḻigoṭṭiṭṭambaḻiyaṁ dharmaputraṁ baladēvananenitānumucita
pratipattigaḷiṁ santasambaḍisi dvārāvatige kaḻipidanā vivāhōtsavānantaradoḷ—

lg.l: taḷirgaḷa pāsinoḷ poraḷutirdaḻaralaṁ kiḍe sōṅke sōṅkugaḷ

p.s:
antu kāmadēvanuṁ ratiyuṁ vasiṣṭhanumarundhatiyumīśvaranuṁ
pārvatiyumenisi samarūpa samasatva samarataṅgaḷoḷe samānunānurāgamaṁ paḍeye
sukhamirpannegaṁ subhadrege garbhacihnaṅgaḷ tōṟe—
antātaṁ puṭṭuvuduṁ tamage santasaṁ puṭṭi sukhamirpannegaṁ—

lg.l: agaruva meccuvacca sirikaṇḍadoḷaggalisittu sūḍu śaṣōḍaśaisōḍu sa
yyegaḷa biyakke jōmpadalarvālarda pāsugaḷoḷ nelasittu pūta go
ttaṁ madhu pettanī nelananintidu pattaḷepettiḷepettaḷepatteḷeyendu sāṟuvaṁtaṁ
daṁ mige karci pāṟiduvu kendaḷiraṁ giḷiviṇḍinōḷigaḷ
keḻagaṇa kendaḷir pudida mēgaṇa pandaḷirondidondu ke
ygaḻida pasurpumaṁ poḷeva kempumanāḷdire bēṭadoḷ kana
pareriye pasurpu beḷpaḍare balmuguḷoḷ poredōṟe tamberal
porevoreyaṁ saḍilce naḍu poṅgire malligegaḷ basantadoḷ
biridoḍe nallaraṁ neneda nallara mellerdegaḷ basantadoḷ |
kanada vanaṅgaḷoḷ suḻidu taṇṇannesamāgade kūḍe banda mā
vina posa pūvinoḷ poredu poṇmidakakempu mogaṅgaḷaṁ caḷi
llene koḷe poyye tīḍidudu teṅkaṇa gāḷi vasantamāsadoḷ
muguḷvadanādaḷada nāga sampage maḍaltadirmutte maraldaralda ma
llige nanegarci kākaḷiyoḷāṇati geyva madāḷi pō pugagil
pugalenutirpa pakki manamaṁ kavaruttire yōgigaṁ viyō

p.s:
antu bhuvanakkellamosagevarpante banda vasantadoḷondu divasamannavāsa
dōlagadoḷudāttanārāyaṇanuṁ nārāyaṇanumirdalligorvaṁ—
mattaṁ bēṇṭe jāṟakāṟarallade bēṇṭeya mātaṁ binnapaṅgeyveṁyyeṁ—

lg.l: kāḍa bēliyaṁ mārkāḍanaṟiyaluṁ mūḍige kakkukukkukukkambaṁ suḻisi jōmpaṁ
bīḍu biḍuvimbu kadaḷi teṅgina tāṇaṁ jāṇiṁ nīrdāṇamendeḍe yaṟiduṁ
māḍal māḍisal paḍe mecce nīṁ balle nīṁ mecce hariga kēḷāne balleṁ
mr̥gamaṁ gāḷiyanirkeyaṁ pakkeyaṁ gaṇidamaṁ kaṇḍiyaṁ mārkaṇḍiyaṁyiṁ
pugilaṁ pōgaṁ bāriyaṁ sanneyaṁ nūṟuvamarcuva nilveḍeyaṁ
bagedāgaḷarasaroḷella kēḷmariga kēḷ nīṁ balle bēṇṭekāṟaroḷellavāne balleṁ

p.s:
mattaṁ nelanuṁ gāgūḷiyuṁ keyyuṁ mr̥gamumanaṟidu kālāḷoḷaṁ
kudureyoḷamoḷagaṁ baralāne ballenidu pervēṇṭeyandaṁ dīvada bēṇṭeyaṁ
binnapaṅgeyvoḍe gāḷiyuṁ kaḻivumuḻivuṁ kāpuṁ mēphuṁ tōḍuṁ bīḍuṁ
deseyuṁ koseyuṁ meccuṁ beccuṁ pōguṁ mēguṁ bedaṟuṁkedaṟuṁ percuṁ
kundumanaṟidu kāṇaluṁ kāṇisaluṁ kaḍaṅgaluṁ kaḍaṅgisalumaḍaṅgisalumoḍḍalu
moḍḍisaluṁ pugisaluṁ migisaluṁ kāṇadudaṁ kāṇisaluṁ māṇadudaṁ māṇisalumē
ṟadudanēṟisaluṁ jāṇanāgi mūṟu kombumanāṟu nāṇpōgumaneraḻpajjeyumaṁ
mūṟu poḻtumaṁ mr̥gada mūṟiravumanāṟāraykeyumaṁ gāḷiyu
maneṟaṅkeya merukeyumeṟaṅkeyumaṁ ballanāgi nambida baravumaṁ nambada baravumanaṟidu
maleyadudaṁ maleyisaluṁ maledudaṁ tolagisaluṁ nambadudaṁ nambisaluṁ
nambidudaṁ biḍisalumoḷapuguvudarkeḍe māḍalumeḍeyāgada mr̥gamanavuṅkisalu
moldumollaballibalida nallarante miḍukisaluṁ paṇamuḍidaraṁ taḍḍaṁmāḍalumeseda
desegaḷgōḍisaluṁ kumārasvāmiya nimmaḍiyayara keladoḷāne balleṁ—
mattaṁ pandivēṇṭeya mātaṁ binnapaṅgeyveṁ—

lg.l: nelanaṁ niṟugeyaṁ naḍevondu padamumaṁ sōvaḷi mēvaḷi bisuvaḷiyaṁ
balamaṁ śakunamanoḷḷittupāyamaṁ piḍivandītane vandi kuruḍu kuṇṭeṁ
dalasadaṟidintu balmege beraletti pajjeyaṁ nelegaḷaṁ kiḍalīyade
sileya mēlādoḍaṁ śakunamaṁ niṟipante niṟisuveṁ pandiyaṁ nīṁ meccaluṁ

p.s:
mattaṁ pandivēṇṭeya nāyentappuvendoḍasiya naḍuvumagaluramuṁ
taḷtu kaṭṭida kiviyuṁ kavida purvuṁ tōramāginirmāṁsamappa kālgaḷuṁ nelanaṁ
muṭṭaṭṭidugurgaḷumanuḷḷudāgi jātyaśvadante bēgamāgi kōḷi kāḷikāṟanante
baḻiyaṟiviḍidu tumbina nīranumaturcidāgaḷaḍe pariduḷade saviduḷkaḍe paridu manneyarāḷante kādiḍiya
lasade sūḷeyante kōḷampaṭṭaṭṭikōḷaṁ pattikōḍaṁ paṭṭikōḷaṁ paṭṭalisade takkanante nambisiyumottaradantotti
yumuriyaḷurvantaḷurdukoḷvudidu pandivēṇṭeya nāy mattaṁ
kiṟuvēṇṭeya nāyaṅkoṇḍuṁ jāṟikondu bānikoḍuṁ jārikonduṁ bāliyuṁ nelanuṁ poḻtuṁ polanumanaṟidu
baḻiyoḷ posatuṁ paḻadumanaṟidu pariyisal nīne balleyadanāne ballenendu
binnapaṅge yvenantumallade balmelegaṁ basanakkaṁ saviyappa kiṟuvēṇṭeyuṁ pervēṇṭe
yumalla duḻida bēṇṭeyaṁ bēṇṭeyenneṁ—

endu binnapaṅgeyda bēṇṭeyātaṅge mr̥ga vyāyāma kārtikēyaṁ mecci
meccugoṭṭutovalanikkendu munde pēḻdaṭṭi nārāyaṇanuṁ tānumantaḥpura
parivāraṁ berasu bēṇṭege poṟamaṭṭu pariya tāṇakke vandu bēliya keladoḷallade
peṟagaṇulipiṇuriviṇa vipinaṅgamuḷḷoḷakkaṁ geṇṭāgi bīḍaṁ biḍisi bēṇṭekāṟana sameda
makaratōraṇamumaṁ guṇaṇeya bāṇasina majjanada rāṇivāsada manegaḷumaṁ
naneya pandarumargaḷuṁ taḷira kāvaṇaṅgaḷumaṁmāḍadamoḍedamāḍida neleya caupaḷicāvaḍigegaḷumanavaṟa
mēlirdeleyardeḷa aḍakeyumaṁ teṅgineḷanīrumaṁ koḷalimbappantire māḍi naṭṭa kauṅgina
teṅgina maraṅgaḷumaṁ paṇverasupaṇarverasu naṭṭa maindāvaḻegaḷumaṁ tovalverasu naṭṭālaṁ
gaḷumanamare māḍida biṭṭuḷiya kakukkumba toḍambeya mūḍigeya kadaḷikeya
kaṇḍajavanikeya kandajavanikeya kaṇḍapaṭaṅgaḷumaṁ palavuṁ teṟada palavuṁ poṟeyāgi kaṭṭida balegaḷumaṁ
papiḍigaḷa namarcilamarcilarci billuṁ kudureyuṁ kālāḷuṁ nāygaḷumaṁ tiṇṇamirisi keyyaṁ
nēṇumanaḷaviyoḷ kūḍi naḍeyalvēḻdu bēṇṭe vasadanaṅgoṇḍu kakhaṇḍiya
bāgiloḷudāttanārāyaṇanuṁ nārāyaṇanumirdu pugila pulleya modalu
ramumaṁ peṟagaṇa pulleyanaḍuvumanaydaṟoḷ mūṟumaṁ mūṟoḷeraḍu
maneraḍaṟoḷondumaneccu billa balmeyaṁ meṟedu—

mattaṁ berci poḷedu parivaparivaparidu poḷeva poḷevullegaḷumaṁ taleyaṁ kutti viśālambariva
karaḍigaḷumanaḍaṅgi pariva puligaḷumaṁ sōṅki pariveygaḷumaṁ taḍaṁmeṭṭi pariva
kataḍavina kāḍemmeya mareya piṇḍugaḷumanaḷavidappa dondondanisuvante
palavaneccu nelaṁ biriye gajaṟi garjisi pāyva siṅgaṅgaḷumaṁ kaṇḍu—

antu nara nārāyaṇarirvarumanavarata śarāsāra śūnyīkr̥ta kānanamāgeccu
mr̥gavya vyāpāramr̥gavyāpāradiṁ baḻaldu manadante pariva jātyaśvaṅgaḷanēṟi barevare—

lg.l: ṟuvudumidenna nallaḷa rati śrama viślathaviśruta kēśapāśadoḷ
rṇavaniḍaloldanilla haya valgana sañcaḷa ratna kuṇḍaḷaṁ

p.s: antu bēṇṭeyanāḍi baḻaldu bēsageya naḍuvagaloḷ vanakrīḍegaṁyiṁyaṁ jalakrīḍegamāsaktarāgi yamunānadī taṭa nikaṭavartigaḷādaralli—

lg.l: saraḷa tamāḷa tāḷa haricandana nandana bhūja rājiyiṁ

p.s:
antu kāḷindī jala śiśira śīkara vāri cāriyuṁ mr̥gayā paribhrama
śramōtthimasthita svēda jala lavahāriyumāgi banda mandānilakke meyyanāṟisuttumā
puṇyanadiyaneydevandu tanna bāḷa nīrante kaṟaṅgi kargida nīraṁ nōḍi
vikramārjunaṁ kāḷāhimathanana mogamaṁ nōḍi—

lg.l: tire kaḷahaṁse beḷgoḍegaḷantire beḷnore goṭṭi gāṇaraṁ

p.s:
endu bhāskara tanūjeyanubhaya taṭa nikaṭa kusuma nivaha tatparāgapaṭaḷa
piśaṅga tarattaraṅga sarōjeyaṁ mecci pogaḻdu jalakrīḍeyāḍal bagedu
tānumanantanumantaḥpura parivāraṁ berasu—

antu madanana manōrājyamejyamuṁjyaṁmuṁ barpante bandu taṇḍataṇḍade ramaṇīya
ramaṇījanaṁ berasu pañcaratnaṅgaḷiṁ kedaṟisi sāndina sausavada kuṅkumada katturiya
kadaḍaṁ kadaḍi—

lg.l: mī lalitāṅgiyara kaṇge pōltuṁ nāṁpoltuṁ mēṇpōltaṁ mīṇpōltāmiṁpōltumīṁka

p.s: antu pokkāgaḷ—

antu jaguneya maḍuvaṁ tammarasiyara vikaṭa nitamba bimbaṅgaḷa
ghaṭṭaṇeyoḷamare bagidogeda molegaḷaḷḷēṟinoḷaḷḷāḍi taḷḷaṅkakuguṭṭi
nīrāṭamāḍuvāgaḷ—

lg.l: bise sati berci peḷpaḷisi nōḻpudumākeya kaṇṇa beḷpugaḷ
asiyaḷavuṅki kendaḷadoḷottuva nīr mogamaṁ paḷañce baṁ
musuṟi nirantaraṁ karduke satkaviyoḷ samanāgi mārgamaṁ

p.s:
antu nāḍeyuṁ poḻtu jalakēḷī līleyoḷ meṟedu nimirda kuruḷgaḷuṁ
kempēṟida kaṇgaḷuṁ beḷpēṟida bāydeṟegaḷuṁ paḷañcida baṇṇaṅgaḷumeseye
sogayisuva nija vadhū janaṁ berasu poṟamaṭṭāgaḷ—

āgaḷ maḍiya bhaṇḍārada māṇikya bhaṇḍārada niyōgigaḷ tandu
mundiṭṭa ponna paḍaligegaḷoḷoṭṭida dēvāṅga vastraṅgaḷumananēka vidhada
tuḍugegaḷumanenitānuṁ teṟada sugandha dravyaṅgaḷumanarasiyargamarasumakkaḷgamittu
tāmirvaruṁ uṭṭu toṭṭuṁ pūsiyuṁ neṟeye keygeydu divyāhāraṅgaḷa
nārōgisi keygaṭṭigoṇḍu tambulaṅgoṇḍimbaḻiyamacyutaṁ vikramārjunana
keyyaṁ piḍidukoṇḍu tanna bāla krīḍeya sāhasaṅgaḷaṁ tōṟalendu—

lg.l: kondenavuṅki sanda khara dhēnukaraṁ muḷisindamilli kā
dandu guṇārṇavaṅge madhu kaiṭabha hārirāti toḻaldu tōṟidaṁ

p.s:
antā vanāntarāḷamaṁ toḻaldu tōṟuttirpannegamanūna dāniya
dānaduddāniya dānamanānalānallade peṟar‌ neṟeyarembante toṭṭane
kaṭṭidiroḷ—
antu varpanaṁ kaṇḍu sāmantacūḍāmaṇi tannoḷintendu bagedaṁ—

embannegaṁ sāmantacūḍāmaṇiyaneydevandu nālkuṁ vēdaṅgaḷoḷ
nālkuṁ r̥caṅgaḷaṁ pēḻdu sita dūrvāṅkura vimiśraṅgaḷappa śēṣākṣategaḷaṁ koṭṭu
munde nindanaṁ nimage bāḻteyappudaṁ bēḍikoḷḷimene—

lg.l: nnuṇisenagaḻti mey pasidu jommanejōmpane pōdapudenna vēḻpudaṁ

p.s:
kāṇaloḍamaṟidu śaraṇāgatajaḷanidhiyaneyde vandanī bakavēṣi
ninnanēnaṁ bēḍidaṁ nīnītaṅgēnanitteyene—

lg.l: kusuriya mātugāṇenene kēḷdu murāntakanēṁ taguḷde yi

p.s:
ītanajamukhavyāghraṁ śvētakr̥ṣṇakārakanītana mātu mātallavendoḍā
mātu tannaṁ mūdalisidantāge vidviṣṭavidrāvaṇanintendaṁ—

lg.l: otti taṟumbi ninda ripubhūjasamājada bērgaḷaṁ nabha
kkettade bandu tanna maṟevokkoḍe kāyade cāgadoḷpina

p.s:
endu maṟumātiṅgeḍeyilladantire nuḍida paḍemeccegaṇḍana gaṇḍavātumaṁ
nannivātumaṁ murāntakaṁ mecci—

lg.l: muniyisidaṁ karaṁ piriyanappudu bēḻpana bēḻpa vastu kāṁ
pina samakaṭṭu kaṇge doreyārarikēsari ninnavōl peṟaṁ

p.s:
endu tanage koṭṭa kōḍiṅgoḍambaṭṭa ditijakula dāvānalanu manarāti
kālānalanumananalaniṣṭārtha siddhiyakkumendu parasi manaḥpavana vēgadiṁ
pālgaḍalaneydi tanna baytiṭṭa divya sambhavaṅgaḷappa śvētāśvaṅgaḷoḷ pūḍida
divya rathamumaṁ dadhīci gaṇḍasthamappa gāṇḍīvavemba billumaṁ divya śaraṅgaḷoḷ
tekkane tīvida tavadoṇegaḷumaṁ tandenna pratijñeyaṁ tīrcuvoḍamindranaṁ
gelvoḍamivanamōghaṁ keykoḷalvēḻkumendoḍatirathamathananagnidēvaṅge poḍavaṭṭu
keykoṇḍu br̥handaḷanemba sārathiverasu rathamanēṟaloḍaṁ—

lg.l: nā vidha yuddhamuṇṭenute śaibya baḷāhaka mēghavarṇa su

p.s: antu dārukaṁ rathamaṁ cōdisaloḍaṁ—

anteydi yamunānadiya teṅkaṇa deseyoḷ nūṟu yōjana
dagaladoḷamanite nīḷadoḷaṁ neṟedu—

lg.l: prakaraṁ puṣpita hēma paṅkaja rajassaṁsakta bhr̥ṅgāṅganā
nikaraṁ sārasa haṁsa kōkiḷa kuḷadhvānōtkaraṁ celvanā
ytu karaṁ saktanāgasakalasaṅkatakkaniḷimpa dampatigaḷindā nandanaṁ nandanaṁ

p.s:
ene sogayisuva khāṇḍava vanamaṁ vanaruhanābhaṁ vikramārjunaṅge
toḻaldu tōṟi—

lg.l: orme toḻaldu nōḍi banamaṁ maghavaṁ śaci pūta cūtamaṁ
kūrmeya mātu meccuvanitarke baḷāri murāsurāriyēṁsurāri śauriyaṁmurāri śauriyaṁ......... surāriyaṁ

p.s:
embudumante geyvenenna sāhasamaṁ nōḍimendu vikrānta tuṅganuttuṅga
bhujaparighaderaḍu deseyoḷaṁ tavadoṇegaḷaṁ bigidu gāṇḍīvamanēṟisi nīvi
jēvoḍedu divyāstraṅgaḷaṁ piḍidu keytīvikoṇḍagnidēvanaṁ nōḍi—

lg.l: ōḍuge nimma meyya pasivānta virōdhigaḷenna keyyoḷa
ḻkāḍuge koḷḷimuṇṇimene kēḷdanalaṁ parasuttumā layasutte māleyasuttu māleya
māḍi taguḷdu nīḷdu baḷedarvisedurvvisidarvisi parvidanā vanāntamaṁ
phaḷa karpūra lavaṅga luṅga lavaḷī hintāḷa tāḷī tamā
ḷa ḷatā sundara nandanakkaḷurenaṅgaḷenenaṅgaḷane muṁ tannarcigaḷa babendu mo
kkaḷamettaṁ suriyuttumirpa rasamaṁ muṁ pīrdukoṇḍaṁ manaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷā banamanindrana besadoḷ kāva kinnara kimpuruṣa garuḍa gandharva
siddha vidyādhara balamanitumondāgi vikramārjunanoḷ tāge—

antu kāde vidviṣṭavidrāvaṇana moneyambinambēṟiṅgaḷki hatavihata
kōḷāhaḷarāgi siddharasiddharāgeyuṁ kinnararinnāra maṟeyaṁ puguvameneyuṁ kiṁ
puruṣar kāpuruṣarante bāyaṁ biḍeyuṁ gandharvar garvamanuḻidondorvaraṁ
migeyōḍeyuṁ vidyādhararadhararāgeyuṁ pannagar pannatikeyiṁ bandāntoḍe—

lg.l: bhaṅgaḷe gettoḷaṟi pāydu poge puge kaṇṇaṁ

p.s: mattamalli kelavu latāgr̥haṅgaḷoḷaṁ dhārāgr̥haṅgaḷoḷaṁ—

antu khāṇḍava vanamellamananalaṁ praḷaya kāḷānaḷanantaḷurdukoḷe baḷasi
bandu kāva nārāyaṇana sudarśanavemba cakrada kōḷumaṁ vikramārjunana
divāstraṅgaḷa kōḷumanagnidēvana śikhā kaḷāpada kōḷumanentānuṁ bañcisi bale
paṟida kōkanantorva vanapālakaṁ pōgi dēvēndrana kaṇḍu—

lg.l: dēva binnapamindu khāṇḍavamaṁ kr̥śānu taguḷdu nā
nā vidhaṁ suḍe nōḍalārade taḷtaḷtuḷdu dēvara kāpināḷ

p.s:
embuduṁ pauḷōmīpati tanna divyajñānadoḷ nōḍi cakriyuṁ
vikramārjunanumappudanaṟidu gajaṟi garjisi viḷaya kāḷāmbudadante
moḻagumaṁ siḍila baḷagamanoḷakoṇḍa drōṇa mahādrōṇa puṣkaḷāvarta
suvartakaṅgaḷemba mugilgaḷaṁ besasidāgaḷavu vindhyācaḷa kūṭa kōṭigaḷe
kiḻteḻdubarpante bandu desegaḷellamaṁ musuri kaḻtalisi kavidu—

lg.l: tuvo todaḷāytu dānamene māruta bāṇade mēgha mālikā

p.s:
antu puṅkhānupuṅkhamāge pāyva śarasandhānadoḷeḍevaṟiyadanteraḍuṁ
keyyoḷ tōḍuṁ bīḍuṁ kāṇalāgadantise tuṟugi kavivambina maḻeye maḻeyaṁ
māṇise divyāstraṅgaḷiṁ nūṟu yōjanadaḷaviya khāṇḍavavana mellamaṁ taṭṭi
meḍaṟi maśaka mātramappoḍaṁ misukal chidramilladantāge śarapañjaradoḷ
mucci musukidāgaḷabhinava jīmūtavāhanana divyāstrada kōḷgiralāṟade
jīmūtaṅgaḷellaṁ teraḷdōḍidoḍagnidēva nāvavigeya kircinantoḷagoḷagaḷurdu—

lg.l: vana khaga vana mr̥ga vana taru

p.s:
antā vana gahanamellaṁ dahanamayamāda prastāvadoḷ vismayamāge
mayanemba dānava viśvakarmaṁ negedurivurimālegaḷaṁ gadeyoḷ bīsuttuṁ
poṟamaḍe poṟamaḍalīyade—

āgaḷ mayaṁ vismayambaṭṭu poḍavaṭṭu pōdanāgaḷā
vanāntarāḷadoḷirpa takṣakana maganappaśvasēnanemba pannagaṁ tanna tāyaṁ tanna bālamaṁ
karcelvēḻdu dahanārcigaḷiṁ barduṅki negedu pāṟuvāgaḷadaneraḻkhaṇḍamappina
mākhaṇḍaḷatanayanisuvuduṁ tanna bālamberasuriyoḷ biḻdu miḍumiḍu
miḍukutirda jananiyaṁ kaṇḍu pāvugaḷuḷḷa pageyaṁ maṟeyavembudaṁ nannimāḍi—

antaśvasēnanardhāvalikamembamōghāstramāgi karṇana doṇeyoḷirdanitta
khāṇḍavavanadoḷage mandapālanemba munigamondu lāvagegaṁ puṭṭida nālkuṁ
lāvagegaḷagnisūktaṅgaḷanōduttumadiradidiraṁ bare mecci baravanagnidēvaṁ
bēḍikoḷḷimendoḍemmanvayakke nīn taṇṇideyāgendu bēḍuvuduṁ
tadastuvendanittalindraṁ tanna balamellamaḷkimeḷkidantādudembudaṁ kēḷdu—

lg.l: maganenagendu pēḻ piḍidu kaṭṭade māṇpene pārthanaṁ dhari
trige guruvendu vajradoḷuruḷcade māṇpene cakriyaṁ karaṁ

p.s:
antu dēvanikāyaṁ berasu yuddha sannaddhanāgi parasainya bhairavanoḷiṟivenemba
paḻuvageyoḷḻivaḻigeḷuvaḷige bhairavambāyvante bandu ninda purandaranallige sarasijasambhavaṁ
bandu mārkoṇḍu—
endu kamalāsananāsesaṁdōṟi nuḍiduḷḷudane nuḍidoḍante geyvenendu—

lg.l: dorekoḷe nilladalli kusumaṁ kelavalluge tanna ratna vi
sphurita kirīṭamaṁ kavidu tāne naraṅge kirīṭi nāmamaṁ

p.s:
antu pogaḻdu khāṇḍavana dahanadoḷāda pogeyoḷamalliya mahā
nāgaṅgaḷa viṣamberasu suyva suyya pogeyoḷaṁ kaṟaṅgi kaḻgida meyyumaṁ
pracaṇḍa gāṇḍīva vyāghātadoḷindranīlaṅgaḷanaḍasidantappa muṅgeyyumaṁ kaṇḍu
kr̥ṣṇanemba pesaraniṭṭanāgaḷ brahmaṁ brahmāyuvakkendu parasidanīśvaraṁ nīnudāra
mahēśvaranappudaṟiṁ ninagamenagamētaṟoḷaṁ vikalpamuṁ vicchinnamumillendanantu
mūdēvaruṁmūvattamūmūvattamūṟu parasi nija nivāsaṅgaḷge pōdarāgaḷ—

āgaḷ svāhāṅganāsvāhāgaṇasvāhāṅgaṇanāthaṁ sampūrṇa manōrathanāgi khaṭvāṅganembarasana
yajñadoḷātana tanda ghr̥ta samudramaṁ kuḍidoḍāda rōgamindu pōdudendu
nīroganāgi mahānurāgamberasu parasi pōdanāgaḷirvarumindra prasthakkeyde
vandu—

lg.l: idirvare dharmajaṁ berasu tannoḍavuṭṭidareyde taḷtu ka
ṭṭida guḍi raṅgavalligaḷe dāṅguḍiyantire sūse sēseyaṁ

div.trailer:
idu vividhavibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
varaprasādōtpanna prasannagambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitāguṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
pañcamāśvāsaṁ

div.head: ṣaṣṭhāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
antu khāṇḍavavana dahana prapañcadiṁ baḻiyamarāti vana dahana tīvra
pratāpa gahanakke munnamaḷki paramaṇḍaḷikarittuṁ tettuṁ besakeyye kelavu divasamirdu
nārāyaṇanaṁ dvārāvatige kaḷipi—

lg.l: tuṅga taraṅga bhaṅgura payōdhi parīta mahā mahītaḷā
liṅgita kīrti kēḷdu baḍa pārvana puyyalanorme kēḷdanā
vaṅgamagurvu parve javanoḷ seragillade pōgi tāgi taṁ
daṁ gaḍa vikramārjunane pārvara piḷḷeya pōda jīvamaṁ

p.s:
endu lōkamellaṁ pogaḻe vidviṣṭavidrāvaṇanuṁ bhīma yudhiṣṭhira
nakuḷa sahadēvarumayvaruṁ berasondu divasamōlagaṅgoṭṭire dharmaputranallige
mayaṁ pañcaratna hiraṇmayaṁ caturaśraṁ mūṟuṁ yōjanadaḷaviya
sabhāmaṇṭapamanondu lakka rakkasavaḍeyiṁ pottu tarisi tanna nalmeyaṁ balmeyaṁ
meṟeyalendu dēvalōkadiṁ tandu mundiṭṭu—

endennī prāṇamembudu vikramārjunana dayegeyda prāṇamenna
koṭṭudarke mārkoḷḷade koḷḷimendoḍante geyvevendu niścayisi dharmaputraṁ
gōlagaṅguḍaltakkudendadaṁ dharmaputraṅge koṭṭu parākramadhavaḷaṅge śaśāṅkaviśada
yaśame teraḷduruḷigoṇḍantirda śaṅkhamaṁ bāsaṇigegaḷedu—

endadaṁ vikramārjunaṅge koṭṭu munnaṁ ṣōḍaśa rājaroḷage
māndhātanembaṁ vidyādharanātana gadeyidu baḻiyamātanaṁ lavaṇanembasuraṁ kādi
kondu koṇḍoḍātanaṁ rāmacandrana tammaṁ śatrughnaṁ geldu tanage koṇḍu
samudrada naḍuvaṇa mainākaparvatadoḷ maḍagidoḍenagidaṁ varuṇadēvanitta
nintappudu—

lg.l: rudhira jaḷa sphurita raudramī gade pesariṁ

p.s:
antittu baḻiyamavara dānasanmānādigaḷiṁ mayaṁ rāga rasamayanāgi
santasambaṭṭu pōdanitta mattondu divasamā sabhāmaṇṭapadoḷ dharmarājaṁ
tanna nālvar tammandiroḍane dēvēndralīleyindōlagaṅgoṭṭireyire—

lg.l: vuḷiyaninnirimendu tannane niḷki nōḻpare kaṇge ka
ṇboḷepu tannaya meyya beḻpinoḷaḻdu nindoḍe vāḷemīnmeyyoḷoyyane beḷpinindeḷavāḷamīṁmeyyaḷoyyane beḷupinindamardirdu nindoḍe bāḷe mīṁ

p.s: antu barpāgaḷ—

lg.l: sarigeyoḷ samedakṣamālike ponna muñji toḷappa ka
ppurada bhasma rajastripuṇḍrakajaṁ. pappakaja. pappakamoppe piṅga jaṭāḷi tā
berasidavōdavōdavudavuṁdudulāytu cenna tapasiya keyyoḷcenna tapasi keyyoḷagāgaḷ

p.s: antu sākṣāt brahmaṁ barpante bandu—

antu dharmaputranabjajapunajapunabjaputranaṁ mundiṭṭoḍagoṇḍu bandu maṇi kanaka
racana vicitra vētrāsanadoḷirisi mahārghya guṇamaṇi vibhūṣaṇaṅge kanaka
pātradoḷarghyametti kanaka kaḷaśa sambhr̥ta śucijalaṅgaḷindamā munīśvarana
pādapadmamaṁ karci tatpāda pavitrōdakaṅgaḷiṁ mahā r̥ṣiya taḷida kanaka kamaṁ
ḍaluvinadivyadina tīrthōdakaṅgaḷindayvuruṁ pavitrīkr̥tamastakarāgirdu yudhiṣṭhiraṁ nārada
mahā muniya mogavaṁ nōḍi—

embudumā munīndranindralōkadiṁ bandemendoḍalliya
paḍemātāvudu—

embudumā munīśvaraniḷāraniḷānaraṁviḷānaraṁnadharēśvaraṁ besagoṇḍandadoḷe dēvalōkada
paḍemātellamaṁ pēḻdu pāṇḍurājana mātanintendaṁ—

āmumadaṁ nōḍalāṟadeyuṁ pāṇḍurājanennirdiravanenna makkaḷgaṟipi
rājasūyamemba yāgamaṁ bēḷvante māḍi bannimeneyumidanaṟipalende bandemā
makhada mahātmyamaṁ pēḻvoḍe munnaṁ kr̥tayugadoḷ hariścandranemba cakravarti
śatakratuvaṁ nirvartisi caturarṇava parīta mahītaḷamellamaṁ dharāmararkaḷge dakṣiṇe
goṭṭanappudaṟindamadaṟa phaladoḷīgaḷātanalligindraṁ niccamondu poḻtu pōgi
pūjisi barpaṁ nimmayyaṅge nīmumanitu mahimeyaṁ māḻpirappoḍe—

endu rājasūyāntaṁ kaḷahamembudaṁ bagedu tānuṁ kalaha
priyanappudaṟindamanitane nuḍidu māṇda munīndranaṁ narēndranintendaṁ—

lg.l: ggaḷike podaḷdu parvuvudu kīrti purākr̥ta puṇyadinde saṁ

p.s: embudumā mātaṁ nile nuḍidudarke mecci ninagadēviridu—

endu nuḍidu nāḍeyuṁ poḻtirdumin pōpemenda munināthanaṁ
naranāthaṁ bijayaṅgaiyyimene nāradanirade gaganataḷakkogedu mugila poreyoḷaḍaṁ
gidanitta dharmarājaṁ nijānujaroḍane rājasūya prapañcamanāḷōcisi
puruṣōttamananī padadoḷ barisuvudu namaguttama pakṣamendu—

lg.l: dvāravatī purakke cararaṁ taḍavillade bēgamaṭṭi paṁ
kēruhanābhanaṁ barisi majjana bhōjana bhūṣaṇādi sa
tkāradoḷaḻkaṟaṁ neṟeye māḍi murāntaka pāṇḍu bhūbhujaṁr

p.s:
embudumadellamaṁ neṟeye kēḷdu mundaṇa kajjada biṇpuma
naṟidambhōruhanābhaṁ śumbhadambhōdhara dhvaniyinintendaṁ—

lg.l: endu bigurtu dhīrarane kondapirentu samasta vārdhi pa
ryanta dharitriyaṁ vaśake tandapirentu dhanaṅgaḷaṁ prayō

p.s:
munnaṁ kr̥tayugadoḷ sōmananna varuṇana rājasūyada kaḍeyoḷ
dēvāsura yuddhaṁ negaḻe hiraṇya kāḷanēmigaḷ modalāgi negaḻteya daityarellamenna
cakraghātadoḷaḻgimaḻgidantādaradondu dharāvanisativanivatiteya bhārāvatāradoḷenitānuṁ
ghasaṇi pōdudadu kāraṇadiṁ rājasūyada mātaṁ kēḷdalliye maṟevudu
nuḍiyalvēḍene maṟumātuguḍalaṟiyade dharmaputraṁ maunaṅgoṇḍusiradire
parākramadhavaḷanintendaṁ—
endoḍe bhīmasēnanintendaṁ—

lg.l: lkenna bhujārgaḷame sālgumose mēṇ muni mē

p.s:
endu gajaṟi garjisuvudumamaḷarumī bēḷveya mātantetamaḷege
nuḍidoḍemma gaṇḍavāḍamāḍumātumaḷumbaṁ bhr̥tamakkbamakkubhr̥tamakkuumendu mey memeyimeyiyge
besasembuduṁ rājasūyamaṁ bēḷdalladirirappoḍe gaṅgānadiya baḍagaṇa taḍiya
maghamaghigamagisuva vāraṇāsi puramanāḷva br̥hadbaḷaṁḷaṅge putrōtpattinimittamappondu
divya piṇḍamaṁ tannirvararasiyarge peccu koṭṭoḍe puṭṭideraḍu
pōḻumanivēvuvendu bisuḍe jareyemba rakkasi kaṇḍu tinalenderaḍu pōḻumanondu
keyyoḷe piḍidoḍondondaṟoḷ sandisi mānasa rūpugoṇḍoḍe cōdyambaṭṭu
jarāsandhanendu pesaraniṭṭu br̥hadbaḷaṅge koṭṭoḍe jarāsandhanuṁ sālvalanulvanumemba
daityanumondāgi mūvatteraḍakṣōhiṇībalaṁ berasu madhurāpurakke vandennaṁ
muttikoṇḍoḍupāya baladoḷe sālvalanaṁ kondu jarāsandhaṅgaḷki madhurāpuramaṁ
bisuṭṭu pōgi dvārāvatiyaṁ samudrame nīrgādigeyāgi māḍideninnuṁ yādavara
seṟegaḷellātanallirdarātanuṁ bhīmana keyyoḷallade sāyanembudādēśamadaṟi
nemmicceyuṁyumaṁyumamuṁkṣemamaṁ samasta balamberasu bhīmārjunaraṁ pēḻvudendu
dharmaputrananoḍambaḍisi nuḍidu madhurāpuramaneydi br̥hadbaḷa tanūjanallige
dharmayuddhamaṁ bēḍiyaṭṭidoḍe—

lg.l: kalimārkoḷḷade koṭṭu meyyoḷe siḍil tāpantevōl tāge me
ygali bhīmaṁ peṟapiṅgadāntu palavuṁ bandhaṅgaḷiṁ taḷtu ta
tkulaśailaṁ kulaśailadoḷ kaluṣadiṁ pōrvantevōl pōrdu ne
ydila kāvaṁ tudigeyde sīḷva teṟadiṁ sīḷdaṁ jarāsandhanaṁ

p.s:
antu dr̥ḍha kaṭhina hr̥daya bandhanaṁ jarāsandhanaṁ kondumātana magaṁ
kṣēmadhūrtiyaṁ rājyadoḷ niṟisi jarāsandhanēṟuva rathamaṁ tarisi samasta
vastugaḷaṁ koṇḍu garutmanaṁ nenedu barisi rathamaṁ cōdisalvēḻdu yādavara
seṟegaḷumaṁ mundiṭṭu nārāyaṇaṁ bhīmārjunarverasu sukhaprayāṇaṅgaḷiṁ
dindraprasthakke vandu dharmaputranaṁ kaṇḍu—

antu bhīmasēnananindrana mēlevēḻvante pūrva digbhāgakke vēḻdu nakuḷanaṁ
yamananadirpalvēḻvante dakṣiṇadiśābhāgakke besasi sahadēvanaṁ varuṇananadirpal
niyamisuvante paścima digbhāgakke vēḻdu vikramārjunanaṁ kubēraniṁ kappaṅgoḷal
samarpisuvante uttarōttara māgaluttaradiśābhāgakke vēḻdāgaḷ—

lg.l: ari narapāla mauḷimaṇiyoḷ nelegoṇḍudu śaṅkha cakra cā
mara haḷa cihna cihnita padākr̥ti bīsuva cāmarāḷi suṁ
dariyara keygaḷiṁ barduki biḻduvu beḷgoḍe nōḍe nōḍe niṁ

p.s:
antu vijayaṁ tanna digvijayadoḷāda vijaya cihnaṅgaḷ
munname negaḻe vijayadaguḍiviḍisiyaṁ bēḍisi......bhēdisiyaṁ bhēdisi aricēdi nr̥paraṁ chēdisi pāñcāḷaraṁ
cāḷicāribārisi gāndharvaraṁ viratharmāḍi kauḷādhīśaraṁ sādhisi kimpuruṣaraṁ kāpuruṣarmāḍi
bāhlikaranananīkarenisinanēkarenisinekaranenisinekararenisijōkegiḍisi māḷavigaraṁ keḻagivigeyyalīyadāṭandu nija nāmāṅkita
sāyakaṅgaḷindeccu naccaṁ kiḍisi—

lg.l: neṟekoṇḍemmaya bāḻveyoḻgaḷoḷaḷoḷ niṟisuvaṁ nīnendu tandittu ke
yseṟeyaṁ koṭṭaḷavaṭṭaṭṭusāra dhanamaṁ mūviṭṭigaṁ pūṇdu kā
lgeṟagittantarigaṅge berci bhayadiṁ grāmaṁ kuḷaṁ rājakaṁ

p.s:
mattamalli kelaraṁ maitrāsana vr̥ttiyoḷaṁ niṟisi kelaranuddhatāddātaddatadāttapratima
hitarmāḍi kelaranuccāṭisi sarva haraṇaṅgeydu kasavaramellamanindraprasthakke kaḻipi
kāśmīra himavanta hēmakūṭa kaiḷāsa pāriyātra śvētaśr̥ṅga gandhamādana giri
nikaṭa vartigaḷappa parvata rājaranapagata tējarmāḍi kasavaramaṁ keygemāḍi
mēruparvatada teṅkaṇa taḻpaloḷ dvādaśa yōjana pramāṇamappa jambūvr̥kṣada
keladoḷaḍasi rasada toṟe parivante kanaka giriyanalerindu pariva jambūnadamemba
toṟeyoḷ puṭṭida jāmbūnadamemba ponna pāsaṟegaḷaṁ kaṇḍu—

antu kanaka rēṇugaḷ puṭṭida pāsaṟegaḷumaṁ kanakada piriya
selegaḷumanoṭṭi beṭṭāgi puñjisi—

lg.l: barisi ghaṭōtkacaṁ berasu dānava sēneyanīgaḷī balaṁ
berasivanintu pottu naḍe namma purakkene tadgirīndra kaṁ
ḷverasu kaḍaṅgi pottu naḍedattu ghaṭōtkaca raudrasādhanaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ parākramadhavaḷaṁ tanna parākramamaṁ meṟeyalendu kaiḷāsada mēgaṇge
vandu kubēraniṁ kappaṅgoṇḍu ponnaṁ jakkarekkeyiṁ pottu bare taḍeyadindraprasthakke
bandanitta bhīmanuṁ mūḍaṇa diśābhāgamaṁ bāykēḷisi dēvēndrana
vajramumindrāṇiya kaigannaḍiyumuḻiye samasta vastugaḷaṁ tandaṁ sahadēvanuṁ
paḍuvaṇa deseya maṇḍaḷikaranadirpiyumudirpiyuṁ koṇḍu varuṇana makaramuṁ
varuṇāniya koraloḷaydeydu minugumuḻiyeyuḻida vastugaḷellamaṁ tandu
mundiṭṭaṁ nakuḷanuṁ teṅkaṇa deseya maleparaṁ maṇḍaḷikarumanasiyarāge
kavardukoṇḍu laṅkeya mēge naḍedu vibhīṣaṇaṁ tanage bāykēḷadirdoḍe
vikramārjunaṅge pēḻdaṭṭidoḍe—

lg.l: koṇḍude tannumaṁ bisuḍu nīṁ balagarvamanā samudramēmēṁmeṁ
baṇḍamo pāydoḍendu nija sāyakadoḷ baredeccu kappamaṁ

p.s:
antu nālkuṁ samudraṅgaḷa nīruḻiye ratunaṅgaḷumaṁ diśā gajaṅgaḷuḻiye
gajaṅgaḷumaṁ ādityana kuduregaḷuḻiye kuduregaḷumaṁ dēvēndrana surabhiyu
mīśvarana nandiyumuḻiye gōvrajaṅgaḷumanindraprasthakke teraḷci baḻiyaṁ
nārāyaṇana matadoḷ hastināpuradoḷirda dhr̥tarāṣṭra vidura gāṅgēya
drōṇāśvatthāma kr̥pa bāhlīka sōmadatta bhagadatta bhūriśravaḥ karṇa śalya śakuni
saindhava duryōdhana duśyāsanādigaḷgellaṁ baḻiyanaṭṭi barisi śiśupālādigaḷa
ppanēkādhīśvararellarumaṁ barisi vyāsar modalāge brahmar̥ṣiyarellarumaṁ
parasi tuḻila parakeya samāna pratipattiyiṁ kiṟiviriyaraṟidu poḍevaṭṭu
parasiyappikoṇḍu nuḍiduṁ nōḍiyuṁ nakkuṁ keyyaṁ piḍiduṁ ballidire endu
priyadoḷaṁ birdinoḷaṁ santasambaḍasi śubha dina vāra nakṣatra yōga karaṇa
muhūrtadoḷindraprasthakke uttara digbhāgadoḷ sahasra yōjana pramāṇadoḷ
yāgamaṇṭapamaṁ samedu mayana koṭṭa sabhāmaṇṭapadoḷ brahma
r̥ṣiyarumanarasumakkaḷumaneḍeyaṟidirisi yajña dravyaṅgaḷellamaṁ nerapi
mahāvibhavadoḷ śamī pārśvataḷa dakṣiṇādīkṣaṇadikṣaṇā śāleyoḷ hiraṇyadānavaṁ
māḍi vēdinihitaṁdanigadanidhigagaḷappāhavanīya dakṣiṇa gārhapatyaṅgaḷemba mūṟuṁ
koṇḍaṅgaḷoḷuttara vēdiyoḷagni sandhānaṁ geydu vyāsa kaśyapa viśvāmitra
bhāradvāja
idu ka. pratiya pāṭhāntara. brahmādhvaryvāgnīdhra maitrāvaruṇāgni paricārakōdgātr̥ nētr̥
hōtr̥ jamadagnyādigaḷappa ṣōḍaśartvijarkaḷiṁbrahmadhairyāgnihōtra varuṇāgni paścārakoḷadgata nētri hōtri jamadagni yādigaḷappa ṣōḍaśa dvijarkaḷiṁ bēḷalvēḻdu dharmaputraṁ sapatni
yajamānanāgirdāgaḷ—

lg.l: oḍane diganta dantigaḷa kōḍa modalgaḷoḷeyde pokku si
nnaḍigeṇeyāytu bhānuvaḷayaṁ divijāpage nōḍe kūḍe ka
rpaḍardeṇeyādudā yamunegaggada yāgada dhūmadēḻgeyoḷrgeṇeyādudagnigaḷa dhūmadoḷā nr̥pa dharmaputranārgeṇeyādudagnigaḷa dūmadoḷā mahīśanaṁ
ḻade pēḻal parivante poṇme palavuṁ dhūmaṅgaḷā hōma dhū
mada gandhaṁ nasu muṭṭe divya makhaghamaṁ keykoṇḍu saggakke pā

p.s:
antu purōḍāśa pavitrōdaranuṁ sōmapāna kaṣāyitōdayadiṁ pānakapāyitōridayeyiṁ pānaka pāyitōdayadiyiṁ pāna kaṣāyitōdaranumāgi
mūvatteraḍu divasadoḷ kratuvaṁ nirvartisi mahādānaṅgeydu dakṣiṇā
kāladoḷ—

lg.l: ygaṭṭaḷe koḷḷimendu kuḍe ṣōḍaśa r̥tvijargittudarke bā
yviṭṭire vipra kōṭi maḍagalkeḍeyillade ponna rāśiyaṁ
dānāmbhaḥ pīna gaṇḍasthaḷa kari nikaraṁ bāḻteyō meccuvēḻā
dīnānātharge vr̥ddha dvija muni nikarakkandeḍar pōpinaṁ kaḥ
kēnārthī kō daridraḥ enutumanitumaṁ dharmajaṁ sūḻe goṭṭaṁ

p.s:
antu nija dhavaḷacchatra cāmara siṁhāsanādi rājacihnaṅgaḷuḻiye
sarvasvamellamaṁ dakṣiṇegoṭṭu vyāsa gāṅgēya vidura bāhlīka sōmadatta
bhagadatta dhr̥tarāṣṭra drōṇāśvatthāma kr̥pa kulavr̥ddharumaṁ duryōdhana duśyāsana
karṇa śalya śakunigaḷumanavaravara dāna sanmānādigaḷoḷaṁ santasambaḍisi dharmaputraṁ
pēḻimī sabheyoḷagrapūjegār takkarene gāṅgēyanintendaṁ—

lg.l: calamaṁ tandavanāvanātane valaṁ takkaṁ peṟar takkarē

p.s:
endu tanna manadoḷaccottidante nuḍida gāṅgēyana mātaṁ manadegoṇḍu
yamanandananānandamberasante geyvenendu puruṣōttamaṅgarghyamettidāgaḷ—
endanitaḷ māṇade gīrvāṇāriyasurāriyanintendaṁ—

lg.l: lana mane tuṟugārti ninage maneveṇḍati pa
paribhavamaṁ maṟededa ninna peḍageygaṭṭaṁgeygaṭṭigai kagai gaṭṭiṁ

p.s: antu nuḍidu kāypinoḷ piḍugi naḍanaḍa naḍugi—

āgaḷ sabhāsadarellamevellaṁ mērelaṁ mele miḍukade pandeyaṁ pāvaḍardavolusiradire
nārāyaṇaṁ śiśupālananintendaṁ—

lg.l:
dhananirdaṁ kēḷe pēkr̥pa kānīnarirdaratta pa
kha. ga. gha. gaḷalli tappugaḷu.ḻvarālambarāḷvudāballavaruṁ

p.s:
antu javanarghyamettidantirda śiśupālana śirōmbujamaṁ kaṇḍaḻaldātana
naṇṭarappaśvagrīva vidyunmāli nīlādigaḷappa prabhugaprabhr̥tigaḷeḷeḷanibarānuṁ murāntakanaṁ
bandu tāgidoḍe—

anitondu mahā praghaṭṭadoḷagrapūjeyaṁ nārāyaṇaṅge koṭṭavabhr̥thata snānadoḷ piridumosageyaṁ māḍi yāgavidhiyaṁ nirvartisi nereda
rājakulamellamaṁ pūjisi visarjisidāgaḷ murāntakanantakanandanananintendaṁ—

lg.l: hima sētu pratibaddha bhūvaḷayamaṁ niṣkaṇṭakaṁ māḍi vi
kramamaṁ tōṟi nijānujar nerapireduradudondaiśvaryadiṁ rāja sū
rti mukhaṁ kīrtimukhambolēnekīrtige pōlalendekīrti bālegenetānenalēnadēṁ meṟesedudō digdanti dantaṅgaḷoḷ

p.s:
endu nuḍida mandaradharanaṁ ninnanugrahadoḷadēviridenduḷādudemmoḷēnuṇṭendu vastu
vāhanaṅgaḷanittu dvārāvatige kaḷipi sukhasaṅkathā vinōdaṅgaḷoḷ rājyalakṣmi
yananubhavisuttirpanne gamattaṁ—

āgi duśyāsana karṇa śakuni saindhavaremba duṣṭacatuṣṭayadoḷ
mantaṇamirdu dāyigarappoḍe karaṁ percidaravara perciṅgēgeyvaṁ babesanaṅgaḷaṁ
samakaṭṭuvamappoḍe saptavyasanaṅgaḷayvarumanonduṁ gelvuvallavu rāṣṭra vyasanamaṁ
baḷavyasanamaṁ pārvamappoḍavu munnamilla paramaṇḍaḷa vyasanamanārayva
mappoḍittuṁ tettuṁ bāḻva maṇḍalamallade kīṟiyuṁ mīṟiyuṁ negaḻva
maṇḍalamilla puruṣamaṁ samakaṭṭuvamappoḍe pokkiṟiyalaṇmuvarilla rasa
dānādigaḷoḷ chidrisuvamappoḍavarāptatmavantaruṁ buddhivantarumāgi negaḻdarinnāva
māḻkeyoḷ pageyaṁ keyge māḍuvaṁ pēḻimene śakuniyintendaṁ—

lg.l: besasida ninna mātinitumantuṭe gellavu pāṇḍu putraraṁ

p.s:
endu nāḻavāsagegaḷaṁ munname samakaṭṭi tāmumāmuṁ kelavu devasaṁ
gōṣṭhiyoḷirpaṁ barkendu baḻiyanaṭṭidoḍavara manada pulvageyaṁ
pollameyumanaṟiyade samasta baḷōdyuktanāgi śakunaṅgaḷa kramamaṁ bageyade
niyatiḥ kēna laṅghyatē emba nuḍiyaṁ nannimāḍi madagajēndra puramaneyde bare
dhr̥tarāṣṭrādi kulavr̥ddharoḍane duryōdhananidirvōgi dharmaputraṅge poḍavaṭṭu
bhīmanaṁ samāna pratipattiyoḷ kaṇḍu tange poḍavaṭṭa mattina mūvarumaṁ
tegedu taḻkaisi parasi tanna tammandirellarumanayvargaṁ poḍavaḍisi poḻa
loḷagaṇgeṇiṅgevandu rājamandiramaṁ pokku—

lg.l: kūḍi yudhiṣṭhira prabhuge tāne suyōdhananuydu tōṟidaṁ

p.s:
antu suyōdhanaṁ tanna vibhavamumaṁ viḷāsamumaṁ pāṇḍavarge meṟedu
kandukakrīḍādi nānā vidha vinōdaṅgaḷiṁ kelavu divasamanirdondu divasaṁ tanage
sāvaṁ samakaṭṭuvante piṅgākṣanakṣakrīḍeyaṁ śakuniyoḷ samakaṭṭi pūḍalvēḻdu
pusiyane peṟaraṁ munnamāḍalvēḻdu tānuṁ dharmaputranuṁ keladoḷirdu nōḍuttire
śakuniyintendaṁ—

antu pūḍikoṇḍu nāḻavāsageyanikkalvēḻvuduṁ śakuni munne tanna māḍida
nāḻavāsagegaḷanarasāḷante kaṇṇaṟidu meṭṭi maṭṭamaṟidikkuvāgaloḍḍamaṁ pēḻimene
poḻtupōgiṅgamaḻtigamāḍuva tammutirvaruṁ palagege sāyira gadyāṇada ponnē
sālgumaggaḷaṁ bēḍendu duryōdhananokkalaṁ puḍiyoḷ poraḷcuvante
pāsaṅgeyaṁ poraḷci munnaṁ nettamanaṟiyadanantavara dāyamanāḍe
maḍimaḍiguṟuvududuṁ vadaṁ vaduva mondu patteṇṭu palageyaṁ meḷpamēlpanoḷpaḍisalendu sōltu
sōladoḷēvayisiyinnoḍḍaṅkoḷḷimendu—

lg.l: kula mati munde bhāratadoḷoḍḍuvudaṁ kaḍu nanni māḻpavōl

p.s:
antu kāḷiṅgāṅga vana sambhavaṅgaḷappa madāndha gandha sindhuraṅgaḷumanā
jānēya kāmbhōja bhūmijaṅgaḷappa jātyaśvaṅgaḷumanoḍḍidāgaḷ duryōdhanaṁ
bandikāṟanante seṟegeyduṁ vraṇavaidyanante koḍasāriyaṁ piḍiduṁ sūḷeyante
kaḻivuḻivanaṟiduṁ rasavādiyante ....... kaṭṭiyuṁ perjōḍeyante nuṇṇitaṁ
vēḻduvaṇugāḷante dāyambaḍeduṁ mēḷadaṅkadante suḻiyaḻiduṁ ḍombara
kōḍagadantāḍi geldāgaḷ tammaṇṇana sōlamaṁ kaṇḍāgaḷ bhīmasēnanintendaṁ—

endu kaype saraṁ berasu nuḍida bhīmasēnana nuḍigaḷ kiḍigaḷante tanna
manamanonaliseyumerdeyaṁ kanaliseyumēnumennade muntaṇa kajjamane
bagedusiradirda duryōdhananallige gāṅgēyanuṁ viduranuṁ bandu—

lg.l: sālade jūdu nimmoḷagidēṁ gaḷa māṇisimendoḍanya bhū
pāla kirīṭa tāṭita padaṁ yamanandananajja nāḍeyuṁ

p.s: dhr̥tarāṣṭranallige pōgi—

lg.l: ninage magaṁ purākr̥tada karmame puṭṭuvavōle puṭṭi ni
mminibarumaṁ rasātaḷadoḷaḻdidapaṁ page polla pāṇḍu naṁ

p.s: endu mattamintendar‌—

lg.l: kadana prārambha śauṇḍaṁ ripu nr̥pabala dāvānalaṁbaḍavāsyābaḍavānaḷaṁbaḍavālānalaṁśaradhi bāḍabaṁ vairi bhūbhr̥
nmadavanmātaṅgakumbhasthaḷa daḷa nakharōgrāsi pañcāsya dhairyaṁkarōgrāstranugrasva dhairyaṁkarōgrasthane grastha dhairyaṁkarōgrasthanagrastha dhairyaṁkarōgrasta pañcāsyavīryaṁ

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
varaprasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitā guṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
ṣaṣṭhāśvāsaṁ

div.head: saptamāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
endenitānu teṟadoḷe sāṟiyuṁ kīṟiyuṁ nuḍidoḍe dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ
maganallige vandu jaḍidu nuḍidumēgeydumoḍambaḍisalāṟadire yudhiṣṭhiraṁ talegavi
vayanalladeyumēvadoḷ talegavidu siggaṁ koṇḍāḍi nettamanāḍi—

lg.l: kēḷiyanā kēḷiyanitaṟoḷ māṇisidarḷidanitaṟoḷ kāṇisidaṁḷadanitaṟoḷ kāṇisidarḷadantadoḷ māṇisidar

p.s:
māṇisidoḍe māṇade rapavaṇamaṁ tōṟiyumotteyanuggaḍisiyumāḍi
mane peṟatēnumupāyamillademmāḷva nelanotteyendoḍe bagedu nōḍi geldiṁ
baḻiyaṁ mudugaṇgaḷ maguḻe kuḍisuvaremba bageyoḷaṁ vikramārjunanuṁ
bhīmanu yamaḷarumeḻedukoḷvaremba saṅkeyoḷamantaltu ninna nanniyoḷaṁ
varṣāḷayvarumedeḷvaruṣāvadhiyoḷallade nelananotteviḍiyenendoḍe dharmaputraṁ panneraḍu varuṣambaraṁ
nāḍaṁ pugadaraṇyadoḷirpantumajñātanyathāvāsamendondu varuṣadoḷārānu
maṟidarappoḍe mattaṁ dvādaśābdambaraṁ nāḍa deseyaṁ nōḍadantāgegi yonde
palageyoḷe gellasōlamappantu nanni nuḍidu nelananotteyiṭṭāḍi—

antu duryōdhananajātaśatruvina sarvasvamellamaṁ geldu gelda kasavaramellaṁ
bandudu pāñcāḷarāja tanūjeyorvaḷ bandaḷillākeyaṁ tannimendu yudhiṣṭhiraṁ
koṭṭa nanniya baladoḷ tanage layamilladudanaṟidu mēgillada goḍḍāṭṭāṭamāḍal
bagedu karṇana leṅkaṁ prātikāmiyembanumaṁ tanna tammaṁ duśyāsananumaṁ
pēḻdoḍavandirāgaḷe bīḍiṅge varidu rajasvaleyāgirdeṁ muṭṭalāgadeneyumottaṁ
badindoḷagaṁ pokku pāñcāḷiyaṁ kaṇgiḍe jaḍidu muḍiyaṁ piḍidu tanmadhyadiṁ
suyōdhanana sabhāmadhyakke tandu—

lg.l: ḍeneyuṁ māṇade toḻte toḻtuvesakegey pō pōgu nīnendu ba
tanagaṁ mellane mr̥tyu sāre tegedaṁ dhammillamaṁ kr̥ṣṇeyā

p.s:
antu kr̥ṣṇeya kr̥ṣṇa kabarī bhāramaṁ mēgillade piḍidu tegedu kr̥ṣṇōraganaṁ
piḍida beḷḷāḷantummane bemaruttumirda duśyāsananumaṁ kaṇke ṇgeṇṇetti kiṟunage naguva
kūradarakuruvarana mogamumaṁ tammaṇṇana binnanāda mogamumaṁ kaṇḍu kaṇgaḷiṁ nettar
tuḷuṅke—

lg.l: lōpama bhīṣaṇa bhrukuṭi munname raudra gadāyudhambaraṁ
caladiṁ kaṭṭuva sapta saptiyaniḷābhāgakke tarpondu tō
ḷvalamuṁ garvamumuṇmi poṇme manadoḷ kōpāgni keygaṇmika
ṇmalaroḷ bandire nōpūmāḍidaṁ kaluṣadiṁ gāṇḍīvi gāṇḍīvamaṁ

p.s:
antu viḷaya kāla jaḷanidhigaḷante mēredappal bageda tanna nālvar
tammandira munida mogamaṁ kaṇḍu tanna nuḍida nanniya kēḍaṁ bagedarendu kaṭākṣa
vikṣēpadiṁ bārise—

āgaḷ draupadi tanna kēśapāśamaṁ duśyāsanaṁ piḍidu tegedanemba siggaggaḷaṁ
perce sabheyoḷintendaḷ—
embuduṁ bhīmasēnanā mātaṁ kēḷdu sairisalāṟade—

lg.l: khaḷa duśyāsananaṁ poraḷci basiṟaṁ pōḻdikki bambalgaru
goḍeveṁ tadratna raśmi prakaṭa makuṭamaṁ nambu nambenna kaṇṇiṁ

p.s: endu pāñcāḷarājatanūjeya manamanāṟe nuḍidu mattamintendaṁ—

lg.l: surasindhu priya putra kēḷ kaḷaśajā nīṁ kēḷ kr̥pā kēḷa maṁ
daradiṁ vairi balābdhi ghūrṇise bigurtī kauravar kūḍe nū
rvarumaṁ kolvenidenna pūṇke nuḍideṁ nimmī sabhāmadhyadoḷ

p.s:
endu viḷaya kāḷa jaḷadhara ninādadiṁ giribhēriyaṁ tāṭisidantānuṁ nelaṁ
moḻagidantānuṁ gajaṟi garjisi nuḍidu mahāpratijñārūḍhanāda bhīmasēnana
nuḍiyaṁ kēḷdu kauravar kaḍala naḍuvaṇa parvatadantaḷḷāḍe kuruvr̥ddhanuṁ
buddhivr̥ddhanumappa gāṅgēyaṁ dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅgintendaṁ—

lg.l: ttarisuvudakkumende bagedirdoḍe kīloḷe kiccu puṭṭi bhō

p.s:
endaḻaldu dhr̥tarāṣṭranoḷ nuḍiye kumbhasambhavāśvatthāma kr̥pa vidurādi
gaḷ nīmenitu nuḍidoḍamāneya kōḍu bāgadembante duryōdhananudvr̥tta
teyumaṁ bhīmasēnana mahāpratijñeyumanārgaṁ bārisalbāradu keygaḻida
manevāḻte buddhivēḻaleḍeyilla tāmuṁ tāmumaṟivar bannimendu nija
nivāsaṅgaḷge pōdarāgaḷ bhīmasēnaṁ dharmaputraṅgendanuppikkidoḍe tuppada
meḷpaḍitembante namma kemmanirpiravidē kāraṇaṁ banniṁ pōpamendaramaneyaṁ
poṟamaṭṭu bare dhr̥tarāṣṭraṁ duryōdhananēgeydumoḍambaḍisalāṟadireyuṁ
draupadi parastrīyaṁ namma maneyoḷirisuvuducitamallendu kaḻipidoḍe
pāñcāḷarāja tanūjeverasu binna binnane poḻalaṁ poṟamaḍe purajanaṅgaḷellaṁ
neredavara pōgiṅge sairisalāṟade tammoḷintendar—

endirdarirdalliye tantamma kaṇḍudane nuḍiyeyuṁ kelaravara
pōgiṅgaḻaldu kaṇṇa nīranikkeyuṁ kelar parasi sēseyanikkeyuṁ poḻalaṁ poṟamaṭṭu
purada bāhigeyaneyduvāgaḷ gāṅgēya drōṇa kr̥pavidurādigaḷ kontiveraseyde
vandu kiṟidantaramaṁ kaḷiputtuṁ bare dharmaputranemage takka buddhiyaṁ pēḻdu
maguḻimendoḍanibaruṁ manaṁ bandhicōdisida mōhadiṁ gaḻagaḻane kaṇṇa nīrgaḷaṁ
suridu—

lg.l: ṭige pavaṇilla kalpigeḍeyāvudo pāḻiya baṭṭedappi muṁ
negaḻdeḍeyilla pōgu jayamakke śubhaṁ nimagakke maṅgaḷaṁ

p.s:
endoḍallirdu nimma manakke kokkarikkeyāgiyuṁ pāḻige geṇṭāgiyuṁ
negaḻvamallendu poḍavaṭṭu kontiyaṁ vidurana maneyoḷiralvēḻdu
subhadreyanabhimanyuverasu nārāyaṇanallige dvārāvatige kaḷipi nija parijanamberasu
gaṅgeyaṁ pāydadaṟa paḍuvaṇa deseya kāmyakavanada baṭṭeyaṁ taguḷdu pōge
vōge—

lg.l: dese pasurēṟi pacceyoḷe mucci musuṅkida māḻkeyādudā
gasamaḷinīḷa nīḷa gaḷakaṇṭha tamāḷa vinīḷa nīrada
ppire posa vēṭakāṟarerdegaḷ posa kāraragāṟeṟagāṟasagāra poḍarpugaṇḍadēvēṁ

p.s: adalladeyuṁ—

lg.l: bhava lālāṭavilōcanāgni śikheyiṁ bendaḷki mattaṁ manō
bhavaneḻcattoḍe kāma kānte baḻiyaṁ tannicceyiṁ mecci ba
lgaḷa kiṟugoṅku goṅkida ponalgaḷa kempu pasurpu karpu be

p.s:
antu tamagidiraṁ barpante banda payōdhara kāladoḷeraḍu taḍiyumaṁ
poydu pariva toṟegaḷumaṁ tovaltu sogayisuvaḍavigaḷumaṁ pasiya nēvētramaṁ
paccavaḍisidante pasurpuvaḍeda neladoḷ padmapacceya padmapacceya sire padmapacceya sele padmarāgada paralgaḷaṁ baligedaṟidante
upāśrayambaḍedapasurpeseva neladoḷupāpasurpina neladoḷupāḷaṅkarisuvindragōpaṅgaḷumaṁ kisugāḍa nelaṅgaḷeḷadaḷira baṇṇamaṁ
keykoṇḍu virahigaḷa manamanolisuvante jala jalane pariva jaribaṟibaṟubarivonalgaḷumaṁ
kaṇḍu tamma kaṇgaṁ manakaṁ sogayise payaṇaṁ bandu kāmyaka vanamaṁ
pugutandaradentendoḍe—

lg.l: rvisi pāyvarvigaḷiṁ madāndha vanagajavara gandhēbhaṅgaḷiṁ kaṇgagu

p.s:
antu saumyabhayaṅkarākāramappa kāmyakavanamaṁ pugutandalli
tadvanādhipatiyappa daityaṁ kimmīranavaraṁ pugalīyadaḍḍamāgire—

lg.l: posa miñcugra vilōcanaṁ divija gōpaṁ kāro mēṇ kāḷa ra
kkasanō pēḻene bandu tāge gadeyaṁ koṇḍeyde bhīmaṁ siḍi
ldu siḍil poydavolāge poydaniḷeyoḷ kimmīranaṁ vīranaṁ

p.s:
antu kimmīranaṁ kondu kāmyakavanamaṁ pokku tadvana tapōdhanara
gōṣṭhiyoḷamāṭavikaraṭṭaṭṭiyoḷaṁ tamagindraprasthada rājyaśrīyaṁ masuḷise—

lg.l: piriya maḍugaḷe majjanamāge posa nāre dēvāṅga vastramāge
pāsaṟe siṁhapīṭhamaḷinī ruti maṅgaḷa gīti bhūtaḷaṁ
bīsuva gāḷi cāmarada gāḷiyenal dorevettadēṁ sukhā

p.s:
antu kāmyakavanadoḷaydu varuṣamirdāṟaneya varuṣadoḷadaṟa
keladoḷondi sandisi gaganataḷamaṁ taṟumbuvantirda śikhariśikharaṅgaḷindaṁ desegaḷaṁ
taḍavarisi koḷvante baḷvaḷa baḷedu sogayisuva permaraṅgaḷindaṁ vanalakṣmiya
gōmaṇḍaladantirda kaḍavina kāḍermeya piṇḍugaḷindaṁ desegaḷgeḷe berci
mūmuṅkiṟiva vanamahiṣigaḷiṁ madahastiyante maravāyva puligaḷinati bhayaṅkarākāra
mappa dvaitavanakke bandu tadvanōpa kaṇṭhavartigaḷappa tāpasāśramaṅgaḷoḷ
viśramisal bagedu—

lg.l: pugalillī banamārgamimbu nelasal nāruṇṭuḍal melle kōṁnalkombugoṁnalkāṁ ......dalkombugoṁ
bugaḷoḷ paṇbalamuvuṇṭu mīye kuḍiyalvr̥kṣatatiyoḷmeyde kuḍiyal nīruṇṭu padmākarā
ḷigaḷoḷ taṇpugaḷuṇṭu hēmalatikā kuñjaṅgaḷoḷ natamma na
nnige bannaṁ baralīyadī banadoḷirdērdīṁ kālamaṁ pārevēremēraderave

p.s:
enda tammoḷayvarumēka kāryāḷōcanapararāgi daitavanadoḷadvaita
sāhasarirpannegamondu divasaṁ duryōdhanana maydunaṁ sindhudēśādhīśvaraṁ
saindhavanavaraṁ chidrisalendu meygaredu bandu—

lg.l: mr̥gayā krīḍege pāṇḍurāja tanayar‌ pōpannegaṁ bandu to
ymige bennaṁ paridetta pōpeyelavō pō pōgalendeydidar

p.s:
anteydi tadgadāghātadoḷaṁ bāṇapāghātadoḷamavana rathamaṁ śata cūrṇaṁ
māḍi jayadrathanaṁ kōḍugagaṭṭugaṭṭi bennaṁ billa koppinoḷiṟidu naḍeyendu
naḍeyisi pāñcāḷiyaṁ līleyindoḍagoṇḍu bīḍiṅge vandu dharmaputraṅge
tōṟidoḍe—

endu ninnaṁparibhavakke tandu ninna yaśamaṁ kiḍisidevin kondoḍēvaṁ
dapudendu duryōdhananallige pōgendu kaṭṭida kaṭṭugaḷaṁ biṭṭu kaḷedoḍe
jayadrathaṁ siggāgi kailāsadoḷīśvaraṅge tapaṅgeydu meccisi pāṇḍavaranondu
devasadanuvaradoḷ gelvenakkendu barambaḍedu pōdanitta duryōdhanaṁ samasta
sādhana sahitanāgi kāḍoḷ bēḍarante toḻalva dāyigara kandi kundida mogaṅgaḷaṁ
nōḍuvudumennanavariṁ nōḍisuvudumīyeraḍe saṁsāra phalamendu nāgapuradiṁ
poṟamaṭṭu duśyāsanādigaḷappa nūrvar tammandiruṁ bhānumatiyuṁ candramati
yumemba bēṭadarasiyaruṁ lakkaṇaṁ modalāge nūrvar makkaḷuṁ gāṅgēya
drōṇa kr̥pa vidura prabhr̥tigaḷumaśvatthāma karṇa śalya śakuni saindhava pramukha
nāyakaruṁ berasu bēṇṭeya nevadiṁ bandu dvaitavanada kelada nandana vanadoḷ
pāṇḍavarge samīpamāge bīḍaṁ biṭṭu pāḍisuttaṁ pogaḻisuttumirdanannegaṁ
pageyiṟiyabandara mūganaridarembaya bantanibaruṁ bāyaṁ biṭṭu nōḍe nōḍe
pūrvajanmada page citrāṅgadanemba gandharvanaṟuvattukōṭi gāndharvabalaṁ berasu
bandu duryōdhana duśyāsanarirvarumaṁ kōḍagagaṭṭugaṭṭi—

lg.l: miḍukade bhīṣma nōḍutiru kumbhaja surkiru karṇa mikku mā

p.s:
antuyvuduṁ negaḻteya bīrarellaṁ baḍavara pitararante miḷmiḷa nōḍuttire
mikkudaṇḍarante taleyaṁ bāgi bilgaḷaṁ mundiṭṭu billuṁ beṟagumāgire
suyōdhanana mahādēvi bhānumati bāyaḻidu puyyaliḍutuṁ bandu
dharmanandanana kāla mēle kavidupaṭṭu—

endu puyyaliḍuva bhānumatiya puyyalaṁ kēḷdu suyōdhanaṁ banda
vr̥ttāntamanaṟidu—

lg.l: piriduṁ kāypinūḷeyde kāyva samakaṭṭiṁṭṭeṁ dōṣamaltakka ma
para cintākara ēhi emba nuḍiyaṁ muṁ kēḷdenillāgadē

p.s: endu tannoḷe bagedu bhānumatiyanintendaṁ—

lg.l: rvare dal kauravarāmumayvare valaṁ mattorvaroḷ toṭṭa saṁ

p.s:
endu yudhiṣṭhiraṁ pāḻiya pasugeyanaṟidu nuḍidoḍā pūṇda besanaṁ
karamāsevaṭṭu tanna keladoḷirda sāhasābharaṇana mogamaṁ nōḍi—

embuduṁ mahāprasādamante geyvenellivokkoḍaṁ koṇḍu bandapenendu
bageyadidiraṁ nōḍuttirimendu tavadotavaḍotavadaḍoṇegaḷaṁ bigidu gāṇḍīvamanēṟisi nīvi
jēvoḍedu gandharvara pōpa baḻiyaṁ besagoṇḍu himavantadanalli rākṣasi koṭṭa
cakṣusiyemba vidyeyiṁ tanna kaṇṇanabhimantrisikoṇḍu pāṟuva gandharva balamaṁ
jalakkane kaṇḍu—

antalli padinālsāsirvar gandharvaraṁ kondoḍe citrāṅgadaṁ berci
koḷ ninna naccina seṟeyanendu bisuṭṭoḍe nōyalīyade neladākāśadeḍeyoḷaṁ
bugaḷaṁ tarataradindeccu sōpānaṁ māḍi duryōdhana duśyāsanaraniḻipi kaṭṭugaḷaṁ
biḍadoḍagoṇḍu bandu dharmaputraṅge tōṟidoḍe sāhasābharaṇana
sāhasamanaḷavallade pogaḻdu toḍeyanēṟisikoṇḍu bāyoḷbāyvāyoḷ tambulaṅgoṭṭaṁṭṭaḷṭṭā pāñcālarājatanūje pagevara kaṭṭuvaṭṭirdeḷi dikkege santasambaṭṭu
sairisalāṟadintendaḷ—

endu sāye sarasaṁ nuḍidu kaṭṭida kaṭṭugaḷaṁ tāne biṭṭu kaḷedu bhānumatige
ninnāṇmanumaṁ ninna maydunanumaṁ nīnoppugoḷḷembuduṁ duryōdhanaṁ
dāḍegaḷeda kuḷikananteyuṁ kōḍuḍida madahastiyanteyuṁ nakhamuḍida
siṁhadanteyuṁ
gha pratiyalli mātravide. gaḷita garvanāgi pāṇḍavara mogamaṁ nōḍal nāṇci
madagajapurakke pōgi jūdinoḷ gelda nelanaṁ nayajñanāgi tannoḷ pattisi
yudhiṣṭhiranaṭṭida kirāta dūtaṁ tāpasa vyājanāgi pōgi suyōdhana
vārteyellamumanaṟidu bandajātaśatrugintendu binnapaṅgeydaṁ—

lg.l: kiviginiduṁ nr̥paṅge hitamuṁ nuḍiyelliyumilla kēḷa bi
nnavanitaḷaṁ karātaḷadavōl tanagaṁgiṁ besakeyye keygeyde mā
ḍuva nayamānava nayamā.....nayamānayamumamāsavinuḍiyuṁ br̥haspatiyumaṁ gelevandudu dhārtarāṣṭranā
ṭṭida kāḷiṅga gajēndra dānajaladhārāsāradiṁ nōḍa kuṁ
ī padyavu gha. pratiyalli mātravide (gha1) ; ga. pratiyalli modalaneya pāda mātravide.negaḻdarigana sāhasamo
naṟinaṟenarinaṟiyeṁ piriduṁ gaḻapalgaḻapaṁ palavantāṁgaḻapala palavaṁ tāṁgaḷa palapa....

p.s:
endu binnapaṁ geydu kirātadūtaṁ pōpudumā mātellamaṁ kēḷdu
yajñasēnatanūje yamatanūjaṅgintendaḷ—

lg.l: pōgi suparvarēndra parvatada kāñcana rēṇutūṇetoṇegaḷaṁ parākramō
llāgaḷe kōpamaṁ ninage sañcita śauryadhanaṁdināviḷāsadiṁ dhanañjayaṁ
kāyaṁ paṇṇumanudirpi tindagaladeyaṁ manadoppitindanīnalladeyuṁ manadarppitindagalladeyuṁ manādirpi tindagalade niṁ
nīṁ manadoḷ neneyeyappoḍaṁ ninniḍinnuṁ niṁnaṁitara pratigaḷalli tappugaḷuravaṁ
llumambumaṁ bisuṭu tapake nīṁ bagevoḍe vi
tappēṁṁgaḷa nannigotappalegaḷa ninagadotappalegaḷa ninagoppatappilegaḷa ninagoppatappelegaḷa nannigoppappamalladamallabemadallade tappē

p.s:
enda pāñcāḷarājatanūjeya mātiṅge bembalambāyvante
bhīmasēnanintendaṁ—

lg.l: ninnavu kūrada‌r nelananoṭṭajeyiṁ koḷe koṭṭu muṭṭubaṇṭuvaṇṭumundage
munna me sōṅki kataṇmaleva mātugaḷellara pēḻva mātugaḷ
male maledurki sorki sabheyoḷ kula pāṁsulapāṁsananāriyanī śirīṣa kōnuddhatikkeyiṁ
maleyadeḷedu vilōla nīla kabarī bharamaṁ tegevāgaḷalli ke
pasuvaṁ mōduvavōle mōdeyumadaṁ kaṇḍante palgarci sai
ṣṇa sr̥sitāsr̥gjala pānamaṁ bayasi bāy tēraise saitirperippenē

p.s:
endu gadādaṇḍamaṁ bhujādaṇḍadoḷaḷavaḍisikoṇḍu pagevarirda
deseyaṁ nōḍi taḷaral bageda bhīmasēnanaṁ dharmaputraṁ kōpatāpadiṁ
masagida madagajamane māṇisuvantentānuṁ mr̥duvacanaṅgaḷiṁ muḷisanāṟi
sutirdanirpannegaṁ—

lg.l: neneyise nīla nīrada tanucchavi bhasma rajōviliptamaṁ
jana giriyaṁ śarajjaḷadharaṁ kavidantire celvanāḷdu bhōṁ

p.s:
antu nabhōvibhāgadiṁ dharāvibhāgakkiḻitanda kr̥ṣṇadvaipāyananaṁ
kaṇḍajātaśatru tannēṟida sphaṭika śiḷātaḷada paṭṭaṭṭikadindiḻidu nijānujasahitamidi
rvandu dharātaḷa niṣṭha lalāṭa paṭṭaṁ sāṣṭāṅgaveṟagi poḍavaṭṭu tadīyāśīrvāda
manāntu tacchiḷātaḷadoḷ kuḷḷirisi vana kusumaṅgaḷindarghyametti sarōvara jalaṁ
gaḷaṁ padmapatra puṭaṅgaḷiṁ tandu padapadmaṅgaḷaṁ karci tatpāda pavitrōdakaṁ
gaḷanani barumuttamāṅgadoḷ taḷidukoṇḍirdāgaḷ satyavatīnandanaṁ tanna
makkaḷa sāyasaṅgaḷge manyumikku kaṇṇanīraṁ negarepe mahā prasādamendu
dharmanandananintendaṁ—

lg.l: nāgado pēḻ bhavaccaraṇa padma nirīkṣaṇadiṁsarōvaradinda...... munīśvarā

p.s: ī vacanavu gha. pratiyalli mātravide.embudumā munīndranāmumantende bandevendune—
enduṁembuduṁ tanna vartanamuṁ mōhamanuṇṭumāḍeḍi mattamintendaṁ—

adu kāraṇadindavaraṁ gelvāgaḷ vikramārjunanallade gellanadaṟindātalvarillamātaṅgaṅge
divyāstraṅgaḷaṁ paḍeyalvēḻpudadaṁ paḍevupāyamumaṁ mantramumanupadēśaṁ
geyyal bandevendu yudhiṣṭhiraṅge vēḻdu vikramārjunaṅge mantrākṣaraṅgaḷanu
padēśaṅgeydu guhyakanembanaṁyakṣakanaṁ smaraṇa mātradoḷ barisi sāhasābharaṇananindrakīla
nagēndramaneydisi barpudendu pēḻvuduṁ dharmaputranā munīndraṅge
sāṣṭāṅgaveṟagi poḍavaḍe parasi payōdharapathakkogedanitta vikrāntatuṅganuṁ
dharmaputraṅgaṁ vāyusutaṅgaṁ poḍavaṭṭu besakēḷvekeyvenendāgaḷ pāñcāḷarāja
tanūjeyintendaḷ—

lg.l: bage kūḍuge ninna bageda bageyoḷ pārthā

p.s: endu buddhivēḻdu manadeṟakaṁ manōvēgadiṁ pariyeghavariye sairisalāṟade—

lg.l: baḷvaḷa nīḷda kaṇmalara taḷtemeyiṁ karegaṇmi beḷgaḍa
lgaḷvariyalkamāṭisidoḍoyyane maṅgaḷa bhaṅga bhītigīti bhītibhitti bhittigīti bhittigīti bhiktiyaṁ

p.s:
antu yātrōdyuktanāgi guhyakana pegalanēṟi gandhēbha vidyādharaṁ
vidyādharanante gaganataḷakkogedu mahēndrakīlābhimukhanādāgaḷ—

lg.l: lgiḍe śaradāgamaṁ neṟeye parbe samasta mahīvibhāgamaṁ
aḷi biridirda jādiyoḷe palmoreyuttire haṁse pūta pū
goḷadoḷe rāgisuttire śukāvaḷi bandhura gandhaśāḷi saṁ
kuḷadoḷe pāydu vāydu naliyuttire sāre cakōramindumaṁ
ḍaḷamaṁ parvida beḷmugil mugila beḷpoḷpokku taḷpoyye ba
ḷvaḷa nīḷdirda diśāḷi śāḷivana gandhāndhadvirēphāḷi ka
ṇgoḷisittormeye bandudandu śaradaṁ lōkakke kaṇ barpinaṁ

p.s:
āgaḷ vijayaṁ tanna vijayaśrīya baraviṅgidirvandantege nirgandhaṁge nirgandaṁge niggavaṁ bappante banda
śaratkālaśrīyanutkaṇṭhita hr̥dayanāgi mecci nōḍuttuṁ barpannegaṁ mundemunne śārada
nīradaṅgaḷellamondeḍege teraḷdoṭṭi beṭṭādantirda nīhāragiriyaṁ kaṇḍidāvudendu
besagoḷe guhyakanintendaṁ—

lg.l: vidaḷatkunda śaśāṅka śaṅkha dhavaḷaṁ gandhēbha dānāmbu pū
rṇa darī sundarakandaraṁ mr̥gapati pradhvāna garjadguhaṁ
ppidudaltē sura siddha dampati rati śrī ramyavyāptōru haimācaḷaṁ

p.s:
endu guhyakaṁ himavanmahīdharamaṁ tōṟuttuṁ bandu kailāsa parvatamaṁ
kaṇḍu—

lg.l: idu kailāsaṁ bhavānīdhavana nele manōjātanaṁ būdimāḍi
ttittadaṟoḷ dakṣādhvara dhvaṁsakana nosala kaṇṇātanoḷ tanna dōrga
rvadagurvaṁ prāprakaṭaṁ māḍuva bageyoḷidaṁ patti kiḻtoḷtetti potteḷto
ttidoḍittaṁ mecci laṅkādhipatibaravaṁ laṅkādhīśaṁge baravaṁ rāgadiṁ nīḷagā nīḷagāgaḷā nīḷa kaṇṭhaṁ
doṟeyane pottu gaurige kavaldoṟe geysidayīsidayisidanī pradēśadoḷ

p.s:
endu guhyakaṁ kailāsa śailadelleḍegaḷumaṁ vikramārjunaṅge tōṟuttuṁ
bandu—

lg.l: sāḷa tamāḷa kānana bharōddhata sindhura kaṇṭha garjanā
kamaḷāntargata gandha bandhu nayadiṁ bandappikoḷvante gā
ḷi manaṅgoṇḍire tīḍe bhr̥ṅgarutigaḷ māṅgalya gēyaṅgaḷaṁ
damanandīyē maḍaltu pūta lategaḷ keygeydu pūnīḍalkanīḍalkamapēḍalkamapre. ḍamaperccigaḍa

p.s:
āgaḷ guhyakanindra sutananindrakīla nagēndrada candrakāntaśilātala
doḷiḻipi bīḷkoṇḍu pōdanitta vikramārjunaṁ parantapaṁ tapōniyama
niyamitanāgi—

lg.l: bhasitaṁ karpūra kāḷāgaru bahuḷa rajaṁ valkalaṁ kalpavr̥kṣa
posatembantāge pārthaṅgosedu tuḍaluḍal pūsaluṁ sālvinaṁ sā
adirada cittamaḷkada manaṁ bagegoḷḷada mōhametti ka
ṭṭida jaḍe toṭṭa ratna kavacaṁ koraloḷ sale kōda bil praya
dade nile nōḻpa nōṭakarge saumya bhayaṅkaranādanarjunaṁ

p.s:
antu parāśaranandananupadēśadoḷ tapana prabhaṁ tapaṅgeyyal
taguḷdoḍe—

lg.l: kariṇiya sīyanappa molevālge taguḷdudu tatkiśōra kē
sariṇiya keccalaṁ tuḍukutuṁ paridattu kuraṅga yūdhadoḷ

p.s:
mattamā girīndra kandaradoḷ tapaṅgeyva tapōdhanara tapaṅgaḷellamātana
tapōmaya śikhigaḷiṁ bendu benda nulilliyantētarkaṁtakkaṁ muṭṭiṭṭillade muṭṭugiḍe
dēvēndraṁ tanagāda hr̥tkampadoḷamāsana kampadoḷaṁ narēndratāpasaṁ tannindratvamaṁ
kolalendu tapaṅgeydapanemba saṅkeyoḷ tapōvighātaṁ māḍimendu tanna
neccinaccaraseyarumanāṟuṁ r̥tugaḷumaṁ gandharvarumaṁ kāmadēvanaṁ
daṇḍanāyakaṁ māḍi pēḻdāgaḷ—

lg.l: vanaruha garbhanembavana munnina geyda tapaṁ tilōnumeytere geydu tapakkidunameytere geyda tapaṅkidonameyitare geyda tapantidottamāṁ
rvina kaḍeyondu jarvinoḷe tīrvuvavallade dēva bembalaṁ

p.s:
endu dēvāpsarōvr̥ndamanitānumandadiṁ purandarana pakkade pūṇdu
bandu gaganataḷamellaṁ tamma toṭṭa divyābharaṇa kiraṇaṅgaḷoḷ toḷagi beḷage
bandu mahītaḷakkavatarisi nada nadī puḷina parisara pradēśaṅgaḷoḷaṁ kadaḷīvanaṁ
gaḷoḷaṁ kanaka latāmaṇṭapaṅgaḷoḷamiḍideḍegoḷedaḍele pūta malligeya baḷḷigāvaṇaṁ
gaḷoḷaṁ naneya jompaṅgaḷoḷaṁ gagana gamanajanita śramamanā gajagamaneyarāṟisi
pālgaḍaloḷamamardinoḷaṁ puṭṭida kaḷḷa sorkinoḷamumamīnte naḍuguva baḍanaḍugaḷge
naḍukamumanunte poḍarva purvugaḷge poḍarpumanunte sogayisuva beḷarvāygaḷge
tanigegittumanunte poḷeva niḍiyalargaṇgaḷge maḷamaḷipa nōṭamumanunte
todaḷisuva nuḍiva nuḍigaḷge todaḷumanekkeyiṁ taḷeye neṟeye keygeydu
munnamāṟuṁ r̥tugaḷumaṁ nimma nimma svarūpaṅgaḷumanātanirdallige pōgi
tōṟimendāgaḷ—

lg.l: muḍiyaṁ sōgeyegettu sōge naḍeyaṁ peṇṇañcegettañce me
lnuḍiyaṁ kōgilegettu kōgile ghanōttuṅga stana dvandvadi
ṟaḍigettāṟaḍi suttutuṁ bare banaṁ barpante bandākegaḷ

p.s:
antu narēndra tāpasanaṁ sōlisalendu vandākegaḷ tāme sōltu
mundu mundane suḻiye—

lg.l: ḷduguḻdalaruttumirpa padadoḷ padavaṭṭu podaḷdu tōra ma
lligeya tuṟumbu rāhu tave nuṅgida candranoyyanoyyanaṁ
pada koralimpanappukeye koṅku nakuṅkumekūṅkunemuṅkoneyaṁ gamakaṅgaḷiṁ poda
ccida teṟadāsevaṭṭalasanisidetti davōl dorevettudaval doridettidavevoledettiravevol doledettisavitaladōri dūṟidā
ṟida dani muṭṭe mēnake sarasvati bāydeṟedante pāḍidaḷ
naḍu naḍugalke purvu poḍaralke kuruḷ miḷiralke bāy beḍaṁ
giḍideḷasal teraḷdukeraḷdi tuḍukalke taguḷdudu kendanīke kaṁ
odavidakekitta kaṅkaṇadagoṅkaṇaya purvina jarvu lanayakke lakka lelakkesalakkelelekkale
kkidaḷene kaḷgekaṇgekaḷdekeḷde cikkaṇamenippudu sāsōgenisalke sālva sa
ygūḍidudilla mārgamene vismayamāgire tanna munde baṁ

p.s:
antākegaḷeḍeyāḍiyuṁ manaṅgoḷe pāḍiyuṁ manujamāndhātanaṁ
sōlisalāṟade sahajamanōjana rūpiṅgaṁ surata makaradhvajana saundaryakkaṁ
gandhēbhavidyādharana gaṇḍagāḍigaṁ tāme sōlteydevandu—

lg.l: kaḍu tapadinde ninna paḍepāvudo gāvila saggamalte pō
nuḍiyavo mūrkha saggadaphalaṁ sukhamalte sukhakke pēḻoḍaṁ
baḍadavarāro peṇḍiroḷagār‌ peṟarāme dalāme bandu kā

p.s:
endenitānuṁ teṟadoḷaḻipina lalleya cellada puruḍina muḷisina nevada
paḍemātugaḷaṁ nuḍiduṁ kālviḍidumacaḷita dhairyana manamaṁ caḷiyisalāṟadacca
raseyaraccigaṅgoṇḍantāgeyuṁ gandharvar garvamanuḻidu pōgeyuṁ kāmadēva
nēvamaṁ keykoṇḍu sīntante moga māḍigaṁ bāḍigaṁ māḍe pōgi dēvēndrana mogamaṁ nōḍal
nāṇcirdanāgaḷindraṁ narēndratāpasana dhairyakke mecci dharāmaravēṣadoḷindra
kīlanagēndramaneydevandu—

lg.l: lkaṇiyaṁ kalhāra sārāmr̥ta śaśi viśadātmīya vaṁśakke cūḍā
maṇiyaṁ tīvra pratāpa dyumaṇiyaneredarthi vrajaṅgaḷge cintā

div.trailer:
idu vividha vibhudhajanavinuta jinapadāmbhōja
varaprasādōtpanna prasanna gambhīra vacana racana
catura kavitāguṇārṇava viracitamappa
vikramārjuna vijayadoḷ
saptamāśvāsaṁ

div.head: aṣṭamāśvāsaṁ

p.s:
antu manadoḷāda mōharasame kaṇṇiṁ tuḷuṅkuvante poṟapoṇmuva
nayana jalaṅgaḷanuttarīya valkala vasanōpāntadoḷottuttumatithigatithi
satkāramellamaṁ neṟeye māḍidāgaḷindraṁ narēndra tāpasananintendaṁ—
ene sāhasābharaṇanintendaṁ—

lg.l: ge nelaṁ jūdinoḷottevōge banamaṁ pokkaṇṇanendondu mā

muni pārāśaranoldu pēḻe hara barpannaṁ tapaṅgeydapeṁ
ī padyada mūraneya pādadalli ‘śaṅkarana’ embudu ‘śakranane’ endū nālkaneya pādadalli ‘hara’ embudu ‘hari’ (= indra) endū irabēkendu kelavara abhiprāya. ī viṣayadalli ī granthada upōdghātavannu nōḍiri.

p.s: antumallade—

lg.l: daradoḷaginte dal karagipeṁ peṟatēṁ paḍemāto mēṇ puraṁ
eneyene ratna raśmi jaṭiḷaṁ makuṭaṁ maṇikuṇḍaḷaṁ kana
tkanaka piśaṅga dēha ruci nīḷa sarōjavanaṅgaḷāgaḷu

p.s:
antu tanna sahajarūpamaṁ tōṟi manadaḻkaṟaṁ tōṟalendu
magananappikoṇḍu—

antugrōgratapaṅgeyye tattapastapanavipuḷa marīcigaḷ tamage
tapōvighātamaṁ māḍuvudumindrakīla nagēndrada tapōdhanarellaṁ neredu bandu
kailāsadoḷ viḷāsamberasu girijeyoḷ taḷtirda bāḷēnducūḍāmaṇige sāmanta
cūḍāmaṇiya tapaḥprabhāvamanintendu binnapaṅgeydar—

lg.l: dhārita kavacaṁ dhr̥tōgra śaradhi yugaṁ tā

p.s: embudumadellamaṁ kēḷdātanāvanembudanaṟiyalendu—

antu pōltu divyajñānadoḷ mahēśvaranudāramahēśvaranappu
danaṟidu beralaṁ miḍidu muguḷnage nakku nenedātaṅge takkudanāne ballenendu
munīndra vr̥ndamaṁ pōgalvēḻdu munna dēvēndraṁ tanage mūkadānavana
puyyalaṁ binnapaṅgeydudanavadhārisi mūka dānavanādivarāha rūpadoḷirdudu
manaṟidu manujamāndhātanindamā daityanaṁ kolisaluṁ sāhasābharaṇanoḷēnānu
moḍambaḍaṁ māḍi māyāyuddhadoḷātana sāhasada calada balada
billāḷtanadaḷavigaḷanaḷedu nōḍi varadanappenembudumaṁ bagedu—

lg.l: vanacaranāgi śambhu girijāteyanōtu puḷindi māḍi na
ccina guhana kirātabala nāyakanāgire māḍi bhūtamu
ḷḷanitumaneyde bēḍavaḍe māḍi yugānta payōdharāḷi bhōṁdamabdiyaṁdhi vārdhiyaṁda vārdiyaṁda vārddhiyaṁ
kene kavivandadiṁ kavidanā banamaṁ mr̥gayā nidhānamaṁnimittadiṁ

p.s: antu kavidoḍā kaḷakaḷakkēvayisi varāha rūpada mūkadānavaṁ—

lg.l: ī padyada bahubhāgavu ka. ga. pratigaḷalli lōpavāgide ; kha. pratiyalli pūra lōpavāgide.poraḷe vāridhigaḷ kalaṅkiduvurde meddamaddhemayyanudagramaṁ
takarade toṭṭane dāḍeguṭṭe kaḻaldu tāragegaḷ nabhaṁ

p.s:
antā varāhanādivarāhanāda murāntakanumaniḻisi nelaṅkappaṅga
viyumānelana......kaviyumāgegi bare peṟage kr̥takakirātanaṭṭuttuṁ bare tannatta mogade barpudaṁ
kaṇḍamōghāstra dhanañjayanondamēghāstramanakṣūkṣīkṣaṇa bāṇadhiyinda
murcikoṇḍu gāṇḍīvadoḷ pūḍi—

lg.l: tegedeccarjunanambu tīve tudiyiṁ bālambaraṁ pandi sau
yyage pārdecca vr̥ṣāṅkanambu tanuvaṁ paccante koṇḍattu to

p.s:
antu mūkadānavananā nevadoḷe kondu varāhāruṇajala dhārāruṇa
māgirdātmīya bāṇamaṁ parākramadhavaḷanoyyane koṇḍu bāṇadhiyoḷiṭṭu
pōgi pūgoḷadoḷ karacaraṇa prakṣāḷanaṁ geydu magaḻdu mekapāda tapadoḷ
nile gīrvāṇanāthātmajanallige guhananahibhūṣaṇanambaṁ bēḍiyaṭṭidoḍātaṁ
bandu—

lg.l: goravare būdiyuṁ jaḍeyumakke tapakke tanutramī bhayaṁ
mmarasara naccinecca śaramaṁ seragillade koṇḍu barpirē

p.s:
endu kirātadūtaṁ tannanatikramisi nuḍidudarke muḷidu parākrama
dhavaḷanintendaṁ—

lg.l: tēṟavu bēḍa bēḍadiru bēḍa calaṁ berasambanambanin

p.s:
endu banda kirātadūtanaṁ vikrāntatuṅgaṁ baggisidoḍā mātellamanā
māḻkeyoḷe pōgi kapaṭa kirātaṅgaṟipidoḍātanuṁ māyā yuddhamaṁ
poṇarcal bagedu hastyaśca ratha padāti balaṅgaḷanenitānumanidiroḷ
tandoḍḍidāgaḷ parasainyabhairavaṁ mahāpraḷayabhairavākāramaṁ keykoṇḍu
seragillade bandu tāgi—

lg.l: kedaṟe caturbalaṁ bedaṟe taḷta daḻaṁ keḍedaḻgi taḻgi mā
ṇade peṟagiṭṭa bāybiḍe ghaṭāḷi guṇārṇavanambu lakkale
kkade koḷe cāturaṅga balavantaḻidaḻge kanildonaldu mā
ṇade peṇedaṁ haraṁ digibhadoḷ digibhaṁ peṇevante pārthanoḷ

p.s:
antu śūnyahastadoḷirvaruṁ peṇedu palavuṁ gāyadoḷāyaṁ dappade
piriduṁ poḻtu santarpinaṁsal‌tarpinaṁ (?) pōre dēvarellarumambarataḷadoḷirdu tammaṁkamaṁkadanamaṁ nōḻpantē(?) nōḍe—
antu nelakkikki gaṇḍalaṁ meṭṭidāgaḷ—

lg.l: śiradoḷ toteṟe toṟeya keladoḷesedire peṟe muṁ

dorekoḷe mr̥ḍanaḍige hariganeṟagidanāgaḷ
ī padyavu gha. pratiyalli mātravide.

p.s: anteṟagi poḍavaṭṭu—

endu vinayavinamitōttamāṅganāgi karakamaḷaṅgaḷaṁ mugidu tanna
mundirda parākramadhavaḷana parākramakkaṁ vinayakkaṁ mecci meccideṁ baravaṁ
bēḍikoḷḷene mahāprasādaṁ peṟatēnumanollenenage nimmaḍi pāśupatāstramaṁ
dayegeyvudene ninna tapaśyaktigaṁ bhaktigaṁ meccittenendu—

āgaḷīśvaraṁ koṭṭudarke tellaṇṭiyendu gauridēviyumañjarikāstramemba
mōghāstramaṁ vikramārjunaṅge kuḍe mūvattumū dēvaruṁ tantamma
neccinambugaḷaṁ tandīye guṇārṇavaṁ sampūrṇa manōrathanāgirdāgaḷindraṁ
parākramadhavaḷana parākramakkamēgeyva teṟanumaṟiyadeyumatisnēhadiṁ
puṣpavr̥ṣṭiyumanānandabāṣpavr̥ṣṭiyumanoḍanoḍane suridu palavu divasa
mugrōgra tapadoḷ meyyaṁ daṇḍisida pariśramaṁ pōge kelavu divasamanemma
lōkadoḷ viśramisi barpe bā pōpamendu tannoḍane rathamanēṟisikoṇḍu
gaganataḷakkogedu tannamarāvatīpuramaneydi magaṁ bandosagege poḻaloḷaṣṭa
śōbheyaṁ māḍisi poḻalaṁ pokkāgaḷ—

lg.l: śvaranaṁ meccisi mikka pāśupatamaṁ pettātanē sāhasaṁ

p.s:
antu nōḍi kaḍegaṇṇa cecallamberasu sūsuva vāsava strīyara
mukhābjāsava sambandhigaḷappa śēṣākṣataṅgaḷanīśvaranaṁ gelda gellakke sēsēgoḷvante
sēsegoḷḷuttuṁ dēvarājanoḍane dēvāpsarōnicaya nicitamappadēva vimānamaṁ
pokkāgaḷ dēvēndraṁ tannoḍane majjanaṁ bugisi divyāhāraṅgaḷanoḍanārōgisi
tambulaṅgoṇḍu tanna tuḍuva tuḍugegaḷellamaṁ tuḍisi kirīṭiyaṁ kōṭi
māḻkeyiṁ koṇḍāḍi kelavu devasamanirdu tanagavadhyarumasādhyarumāgirda
nivātakavaca kāḷakēya paulōma taḷatāḷukarembaṟuvattu kōṭi rakkasaranenage
geldīyalvēḻkumendu mātaḷiyemba sārathiverasu vividhāstragarbhamappa rathamaṁ
koṭṭoḍadanēṟi pōgi—

lg.l: tta nijōgrāstrade daityaremba pesarillembantuṭaṁ māḍi baṁ

p.s:
antu dēvalōkadoḷ tanna māte mātāgirda parākramadhavaḷana
parākramakkaṁ gaṇḍāgāḍigaṁ rambhe sōltu sairisalāṟadēkāntadoḷ mēle
biḻdoḍe—

ittoḍentumān parastrīyara deseyoḷamaṇṇana nanniya
varṣāvadhiyoḷamōtu piḍiveṁmentuṁ nuḍiyeṁmentuṁ piḍiyeṁ ninna nuḍiyoḷēdōṣamendu tanna śaucaryada
mēgaṇa kalitanamumaṁ saubhāgyada mēgaṇa babillāḷtanamumanīndralōkadiṁ
pogaḻisi sukhamirpannegamitta vikrāntatuṅgana taḍedudarke yudhiṣṭhira bhīmasēna
nakuḷa sahadēvaruṁ draupadiyuṁ vyākuḷayumāḷa vyākuḷayaṁ māḷavyākuḷacittarāgi—
